column8:
After having played SH5(Homecoming) for almost 7 hrs no, and having enjoyed my time just as much as previous SHs, and knowing the bad reception this game had when it came out back then, I decided to check the user reviews to see if opinion was different. I was shocked to see the incredibly bad reception the game has here on Steam but than I read the reviews and it seems to be mostly about the games PC performance rather than about the game.

So the question is, if the game works is it good? Is it Silent Hill?

Well i'm here to report that so far the game runs near superb. I'm playing on Steamdeck and have yet to run into any of the performance complaints on here. Steamdeck is weird because alot of games don't run well on PC but for some reasons they run almost perfect on Steamdeck.

The issue I can report so far is that the game will sometimes do a mini-pause for a few miliseconds(less than half a second), it's noticeable but happens so quickly and doesn't interupt anything that it's not a convenience at all or impacts the game in any way, it rarely happens but, just seems to happens sometimes when you enter new areas.

Now about the game, is SH5 good? So far my time with the game has been great. When Homecoming first came out I skipped out on it because almost all the reviews were negative, calling it dated, a step down and not much like SH. Essentially this wasn't the SH5 we expected and were left wanting a true Silent Hill 5 installment. Well I was a fool, I've learned in todays gaming that professional reviews arent good anymore, so its todays gaming its better to rely on user reviews, but now that is starting to have its own problems, so using reviews has evolved to a point where you now have to look for user reviews who aren't emotional or unobjective in their reviews.

I was led to believe for yrs and yrs this wasn't a true sequel but now that ive finally tried it this truely is Silent Hill 5. The graphics are great for the time that it came out, and the graphics on this game was slept on, this game is clearly of the early adopters of complex lighting and shadows, something that you're not use to in SH games(not counting remake) The quality of the shadows is so good in some moments in creates tension, atmosphere and scares. I'm a big fan of horror games that use good use of shadows for visual storytelling and atmosphere. 

Homecoming is the natural next step/evolution of what SH3 and 4 did. Basically if you love the first 4 games, this game feel exactly like those game but slightly better with quality of life changes. And the devs Double Helix did not get the kudos they deserve for nailing taking over the reins and understanding and nailing the gameplay and atmosphere of SH, you cant even tell the change in devs. The camera here is better than the 4, giving you full control of movement now. The combat is exactly the same, its still clunky, simple and slow but thats the charm of it, SH isnt about combat, its about survival, they did however improve the quality of combat so that there's better ways to attack and aim, there's also variety with melee attacks now beyond just charging the attack. The game now has a dodge button now but isn't OP or makes things less difficult, it covers little space if you have a weapon drawn. The voice acting and dialogue is just as campy and weird and typical SH. The Story so far is interesting, this is more of a SH2 type story than part 1, 2 or 4. The characters are also weird in this game just like in previous games. The games music is great, they brought back the music conductor from SH1 and 2. So the game feels even more like the SH you want. They even nailed how the fog should work in this game! When I first read the reviews for SH5 when it came out they complained that the game was dated and felt the same with little evolution. This was during a time were ppl were fixed with franchises having to reinvent the wheel, making a sequel that did more of the the same was seen as bad or lazy. Which was weird because we came from an era where we wanted sequels to be more of the same because we loved how the games felt. This is why you have OG Megaman with 7 sequels that played exactly the same with only quality of life updates and new content, or Donkey Country 1-3 that dont veer drastically away from the formula. But for some reason during the PS3/360 era games were expected to reinvent themselves with modern mechanics, you can blame games like RE4, FF12, GTA4, Metroid Prime for this. Tomb Raider had a similar issue TR4-6 all got bad reviews for playing and feeling the same as the first 3 games. But now look at modern and retro reviews those games all have high praise now because they cater to ppl who loved the first 3 games and wanted more of the same experience, and TR4-6 delivers on that. Thankfully we're back to an era of gaming where we now love and welcome games that don't need to reinvent themselves, embracing games that give us more of what we loved.

All in all, ive loved my time with the game so far, I usually don't leave early reviews but seeing how much ived enjoyed the game, and how long ive spent wondering if it was worth trying because I love Silent Hill franchise and wanted more of what part 1-4 gave me, I understand the need to find a review that addresses what you're looking for, is Homecoming good and does it feels like SH? And thats a big yes, this feels exactly like what you imagined a Silent Hill 5 game should feel like, it feels like part 1-4 with some small steps forward in the design.

The only minor complaint is the uses a film grain style that's a little too gray and alittle too static-y.

All in all if you're a Silent Hill fan, this is a must have game so far. I'm sorry I skipped on it. Once I finish the game I went update my review incase it changes and that game ends up sucking.

column8: Injouable sur steam.

la verdad es que SH:Homecoming me parece un buen juego pero tuve tantos problemas con él que acabo estropeando mi experiencia con el juego. Por lo tanto, no lo recomiendo. A continuación pondré una recopilación de cosas  que me pasaron jugando y e apuntado:

1- sensibilidad bugeada (tuve que cambiarla desde las opciones de Steam del mando y luego no podía apuntar bien con las armas)

2- Bugs de iluminación y sombras (no muchos pero hay)

3- No aparecían los botones para hacer los quick time events (los tuve que hacer a pura chorra)

4- Rendimiento penoso (aparecen 3 libélulas con un perro y el juego quiere hacerse el harakiri)

5- La cámara clipeaba a veces cuando los enemigos me hacían un agarre.

6- Crasheo una vez y al abrir el juego de nuevo no le hacia daño a los enemigos (jaja gracioso)
7- Freezeaba en una zona que había un grupo de enfermeras (lo solucione literalmente a escopetazos)

8- en cinemáticas las pistas de audio de los personajes se escuchaban mucho más por el auricular izquierdo que por el derecho (no es tan grave pero molesta)

9- En las bossfights no había soundtrack (literalmente he peleado todos los bosses del juego en completo silencio pero lo que me molesta es que miré en Youtube las peleas con el ost y ganan un montón)

10-No había canción en los créditos (después de terminar el juego y ver los créditos completamente en silencio se me quedó el pecho bastante frío)

I recently completed Silent Hill: Homecoming, and I have to be honest, it's quite the buggy mess. The game crashed multiple times, forcing me to restart from checkpoints that are frustratingly sparse (because I keep dying haha), especially in the early segments. The lag and bugs were super annoying.

However, once I pushed through that rough start, I began to enjoy the game. The monsters are bizarre and unsettling, adding to the eerie atmosphere, and I found ammo to be rare which added to the challenge and annoyed me a little bit too. The combat system felt a bit clunky, especially during boss fights. I struggled against one boss who had this grab move that was nearly impossible to dodge. But after some practice with the controls and learning to switch quickly between combat and walking stances, I finally figured out how to dodge that loser boss.

If you’re a fan of weird ah horror games like I am, you might find Silent Hill: Homecoming worth your time. Just don’t expect the polished experience of a Resident Evil game; you might end up disappointed.

Peace. 👍🏻

column8:
Я вас категорически приветствую!
Это были далёкие времена, когда у меня ещё даже моего первого ноута не было, но я, уже не помню по какой причине, но поверхностно знал, кто такой "холм тишины".
  Тогда мой бывший одноклассник своровал в нашем местном магазине с дисками 32 или 33 диска (да, я это запомнил). Среди низкосортных сериалов и фильмов, разного сорта паршивости были и своего рода алмазы; сборник готики, сборник какой-то параши, из которого я помню только эту странную игру "the ball" и ставшую одной из моих любимых игр "Я не умер в конце zombie draver-а", а также сборник "холма тишины". Я точно не помню, сколько и какие именно части там были, но есть 2 которые отпечались в моей памяти мне кажется навечно: - Silent hill 3 и Silent hill: Homecoming. 
  Когда не было, на чём мне это запустить, я просто вечерами таращился и на скрины сайлента, перечитывая раз за разом краткое содержание игры и просто мечтал когда-нибудь это запустить, используя в своих мечтах коробку от конфет, которая открывалась как ноутбук. 
  Спустя некоторое время ноут у меня появился, и я установил тот самый Холм тишины 3. Я думал, что буду просто поглощать эту игру не взирая ни на что. Моё желание прикоснуться к Хизер... То есть к СХ 3 временами начало граничить с одержимостью. По - моему у меня на тот момент был уже небольшой игровой опыт, и поэтому я думал, что игра меня ничем не удивит... 
Знаете, моя история знакомства с СХ 3 похожа на этот прикол: 
 - Я тебя так отымею, что ты ходить не сможешь!
 - Да я только За!
 - А что это за татуха? 
 - Это п*зда.
Хотя я думаю, что даже последней фразой этого прекола можно охарактеризовать моё первое знакомство с СХ 3. 
 Прилетаю я домой со школы, даже не переодеваясь сажусь за ноут и врубаю ту самую игру мечты и... получаю страх всей жизни! 
 Видите ли, во время загрузки или первого запуска там есть момент, когда вам показывают чёрные карусели с видом сверху и что-то похожее на лошадиную голову, которою неистово колбасит. Тогда был солнечный день и солнце светило даже у меня в комнате, но после этой сцены я боялся даже срать идти без включенного на фоне телека. Я много раз смотрел прохождение этой игры и даже само это интро пересматривал несколько раз, ради так сказать адреналинчика, но сам я никогда решусь в неё вернуться. Это  прям мой скриптонит. 
  Ну а с Homecoming у меня связано одно из самых тёплых воспоминаний. Этого достаточно.  
 Помню как будучи мальцом, застрял на головоломке с проводами и поэтому просто удалил игру. Сейчас я, ничего не поняв, прошёл её вообще случайно. 
   P.S. Если кто-то захочет прикоснуться к этому музейному экспонату, хочу дать лишь 1 совет: Выключите зернистость плёнки. Напрямую в игре в этого никак не сделаете, придётся искать решение в инете, но оно того стоит. 
  Да, это не обзор, в привычном его понимании, просто я не сильно понимаю, кому вообще нужны обзоры на СХ в 2025 веке. Это просто личные воспоминания, записанные таким образом.
O jogo é legal mas tá carregado de bugs e toda hora trava e crasha,fechando sozinho.

Primera vez jugando un juego de miedo y empece con este por lo famoso que es el Silent Hill 2, por lo que queria empezar con uno anterior y la verdad que en lo personal no me gusto, al menos las primeras 4 horas de juego no pase por ningun susto y es lo que yo realmente buscaba. mucho recorrer, explorar y toparte con par de monstruos, a lo mejor mas adelante empezaba el miedo pero ya me aburri.

Można się oderwać i cofnąć w czasie dobrych kilkanaście lat, jednakże dynamika gry, walka i poruszanie się zostawia wiele do życzenia. jest sporo błędów, broń palna jest nieskuteczna (chyba jakiś błąd w grze). long time fan of this game happy to see on steam now i have to highly disagree with everyone on this game sure its not lore accurate and its inspired off the film silent hill which was not that good regardless don't let that keep you from a good time the game starts with a Jacobs ladder inspired seen i found that very interesting knowing the whole silent hill series/ franchise was inspired by that film. everyone getting into silent hill now not speaking about the long time veterans i question if they are horror fans this game has a great combat system its brutal it will put you through the hell of Alex Shepard and the atmosphere is truly a silent hill experience i was surprised to see a similar combat system come back in silent hill 2 remake and silent hill 4 and finally the soundtrack is amazing from the man himself akira yamaoka don't follow trends don't be salty enjoy if your a true horror fan and make your own authentic opinion.

column8:
Infelizmente mais um porte horrível pra pc...
- O jogo crasha toda hora.
- Fps travado a 30 e ainda da Stuttering...
- Áudio do jogo é todo errado no fone de ouvido, com inimigos na sua frente fazendo som no fone esquerdo.
- ícones de teclas/botões do teclado e mouse/controle totalmente errados. ( Clique esquerdo do mouse igual a ''1'' ??? )
E se já não bastasse, faz as pessoas baixarem um ''patch fix'' para ''corrigir'' o jogo, botando o computador das pessoas em risco... é sério que esse porte é oficial aqui na Steam? e ainda o ''fix'' não funciona direito...

Jogue no console.
Jogabilidade Péssima

Mais um dos piores jogos que já joguei no Pc. Fui revisitar esse game para jogar e tive a pior experiência possível. Em varias partes do jogo ele crasha simplesmente do nada.
Sem falar das dinâmicas de combate e esquiva que são horríveis. Os ataques e contra ataques são lentos demais.
Estava quase desistindo de jogar e deixar esse jogo de lado, até que  consegui instalar um patch de correções disponibilizado no Github chamado de unknownproject.
Alguns canais no YouTube ensinam como fazer a instalação e o patch tem alterações como: Fps e até bugs corrigidos.
Por se tratar de um projeto de terceiros, tive receio em instalar. Mas, funcionou tranquilo. Por que se for esperar pela Konami uma atualização é brincadeira KKKK
Não compensa comprar um jogo assim, atualmente no momento que estou fazendo essa análise ele está custando em preço cheio R$ 34,99 mas em promoção está R$ 6,99 e absolutamente não vale a pena. 
Sem uma atualização é impossível jogar e você vai se arrepender, mesmo que seja barato. 
Não valeria a pena jogá-lo por mais que seja dado de graça KKKK 
Tem que ser jogado literalmente no LIXO!
It's a beautiful game, however it's filled with bugs and glitches all over the place, it's almost unplayable

Nie ukrywam, że na początku moja wrażenia były, może i nie do końca pozytywne, ale też nie było tragedii. No właśnie "było", bo ta gra to niestety koniec końców jedna wielka tragedia. Na początek może jakieś plusy, bo o dziwo są takie: świetne designy potworów, bardzo klimatyczne lokacje na ulicach i naprawdę dobry soundtrack; no i w sumie to tyle... Bardzo denerwujące jest to, że gra nic nie tłumaczy: dostaje komendę otwórz drzwi, albo sprawdź przedmiot i nie wiem co zrobić; nic nie pisze jakiego klawisza mam użyć, co najbardziej widoczne było przy pierwszym przeciwniku - dla mnie oczywiste jest to, że atakuje się LMB, więc klikam i nic się nie dzieje... no dobra może RMB, też nic... Wszedłem se w opcje i okazuje się, że trzeba nacisnąć lewy shift żeby postać zrobiła gardę i zaczęła poruszać się z prędkością żółwią (nie obrażając przy tym żółwi). System walki jest strasznie toporny i drewniany, a hitboxy wrogów są przeogromne; uniki często nic nie dają. Lokacje poza ulicami są pozbawione klimatu horroru. Szczerze to przez większość czasu gra jest bardziej komedią niż horrorem, fabuła jest po prostu średnia i nie pomaga temu beznadziejna gra aktorska; jakieś 90% dialogów opiera się na tym, że główny bohater o coś się pyta, a druga osoba albo kompletnie ignoruje jego pytanie, albo go wyzywa od idiotów... co w sumie jest prawdą, bo gościu jest tak samo głupi na końcu jak i na początku. Nie które dialogi są ultra ciche, a inne za to mega głośne. A na deser powiem jeszcze, że gra zcrashowała się łącznie 8 razy. Moja ocena to 1/10. Całkowicie odradzam, omijać szerokim łukiem.
Très bon Silent hill n'en déplaise aux haineux, on retrouve une excellente atmosphère et une aventure bien 7/10. Nan franchement je comprend pas les évaluations négative, fin breeeef...

Simplemente no me gustó.

Me gustó Silent Hill de PS, pero este fue empezarlo y no me gustó.
不知道什么时候会闪退，这可比游戏本身恐怖多了，FXXK KONAMI！

column8:
Horrível. Um dos piores jogos que já joguei, e certamente o pior da franquia Silent Hill. E isso me entristece bastante.

Completamente mal otimizado para o PC, lotado de bugs. Você é forçado a baixar um patch feito por fãs na internet para deixar o jogo viável, caso contrário enfrentará vários crashs, graficos zoados e até audios mau produzidos.

A história do jogo é outra faca no seu estômago. Quando você finalmente entende o que está acontecendo, dá para perceber que tinha um potencial de ser uma ótima história, mas é tão mal executado que só resta tristeza, ódio e decepção. Os roteiristas e principalmente quem que estava a cargo de dirigir as cutscenes não faziam a minima ideia do que estavam fazendo, NADA é coerente, NADA faz sentido, NADA é bem executado, TODA e QUALQUER storyline do jogo que tenta te fazer sentir algo te faz sentir apenas nojo pelo jeito podre que é feito.

Os personagens, então? A maioria é inutil ou vazia de personalidade.

Os finais são uma palhaçada. São completamente do nada e há lógica minima em como pegá-los. Todos os finais são possíveis na primeira run, o que é um pecado enorme, visto que o final UFO (o final piada que tem em quase todos os jogos) pode ser pego logo de cara. E foi isso que aconteceu comigo. Imagina você pegar o final piada depois de todo esse sofrimento? Nada recompensador. Os outros jogos tinham seus finais principais, que eram os únicos que podiam ser pegos em uma primeira run, e os finais secundários que só poderiam ser pegos em futuras runs. Isso é justamente para evitar esse tipo de situação ridicula.

Outro aspecto que Homecoming faz questão de mudar para o pior, é na forma de obtenção dos finais. Ao invés dos finais serem obtidos baseado em como você joga o jogo, eles simplesmente colocam 3 decisões bem na sua cara e faz você escolher a resposta que você quer dar. Não somente tem nada a ver com nenhuma entrada anterior de Silent Hill como as escolhas tem pouca correlação com os finais, podendo dar a impressão de que você está pegando um final aleatório mesmo.

O jogo é tão ruim em sua narrativa que cria furos terríveis que entram em conflito com histórias anteriores, ferrando completamente o canone já complicado de Silent Hill, tanto que em um futuro jogo tiveram que tentar "consertar" as cagas desse (spoiler: não conseguiram). Chega a ser uma ofensa o quão despreocupados o desenvolvedores foram ao criar a história.

Os gráficos são ok para a época. Mas não tem porquê parabeniza-los por isso pois era obrigação deles, visto que é uma franquia de nome grande.

Os monstros são, surpreendentemente, interessantes. Há designs ali que são genuinamente bons, principalmente de alguns bosses, mas é apenas isso. Até alguns dos bons designes são na verdade cópias de outros monstros da franquia, o que não é exatamente algo bom em Silent Hill. Afinal, a franquia sempre prezou por monstros novos do que reaproveitados. 

A aparência dos monstros infelizmente é acompanhada do combate terrível. O jogos antes desse são conhecidos por terem um "combate ruim", mas a ruindade é intencional. Neste jogo, porém, eles tentam fazer o combate ser "bom" e "dinâmico", mas acabam falhando, fazendo ele ser ruim também. Esse é o problema: os outros jogos tem um combate ruim proposital e usam isso como parte do game design, girando em torno disso, e mesmo sendo "ruins" eles continuam sendo viaveis. Esse jogo entretanto trabalha na suposição de que o combate dele é bom e que você está se divertindo nas lutas, o que, infelizmente, é completamente fora da realidade. Se você era do tipo de jogador que evitava combate e fugia dos inimigos nos jogos anteriores, você vai intensificar esse comportamento ainda mais nesse jogo. Mas se você era do tipo que ia atrás de matar todos eles... bom, você provavelmente vai se decepcionar bastante nesse jogo aqui. Não é divertido, é torturante.

 As músicas são, finalmente, um ponto positivo genuino. A única parte boa do jogo. Mas esse não tinha como errar, afinal Akira Yamaoka sempre fez um ótimo trabalho em todos os jogos da franquia.

Resumindo: Não jogue isso caso você não seja um fã fervoroso de Silent Hill. Até eu que sou apaixonado pela franquia odiei com todas as minhas forças terminar esse jogo.

Silent Hill: Homecoming is an ambitious entry in the legendary survival horror series, blending the psychological terror the franchise is known for with a heavier emphasis on action and combat. 
While it has its moments, the game doesn’t quite capture the haunting magic of its predecessors, leaving fans with a mixed bag of eerie atmosphere and inconsistent execution.
The story follows Alex Shepherd, a soldier returning to his hometown of Shepherd’s Glen after receiving disturbing visions about his brother. 
The narrative dives into themes of family trauma, guilt, and buried secrets, providing a solid emotional core. 
As Alex unravels the mystery, he ventures into the fog-laden streets of Silent Hill, encountering grotesque monsters, twisted cults, and unnerving environments that keep you on edge.
Visually, the game excels in creating a chilling atmosphere. 
The foggy streets, decrepit buildings, and grotesque creature designs are deeply unsettling, staying true to the series’ tradition of immersive world-building. 
The lighting and sound design also deserve praise, with every creak, whisper, and distant cry adding to the tension.
However, where Homecoming stumbles is in its gameplay. 
The combat system, while more robust than in earlier entries, leans too heavily on action, sometimes at the expense of tension. 
Alex’s proficiency with weapons and dodging mechanics makes the encounters feel more like an action game than the survival horror experience fans might expect. 
While the puzzles provide some respite, they lack the creativity and challenge that defined earlier installments.
Another divisive aspect is the reliance on jump scares over psychological dread. 
While some moments genuinely unsettle, others feel cheap or predictable, pulling you out of the immersive horror the series is known for.
Despite its flaws, Silent Hill: Homecoming is not without merit. 
It introduces intriguing lore, expands on the mythos of Silent Hill, and offers a visually engaging journey for those willing to overlook its shortcomings. 
While it doesn’t quite reach the heights of classics like Silent Hill 2 or Silent Hill 3, it’s a decent, albeit flawed, entry that may appeal more to action-horror enthusiasts than die-hard Silent Hill purists.
A solid attempt that misses the mark but still offers a glimpse of the horror franchise’s potential.

column8:
Silent Hill: Homecoming is a vile stain on the Silent Hill name. It’s a betrayal to everything that made the franchise legendary. Whoever thought this was a good idea should’ve been banned from ever making a game again. The atmosphere? Nonexistent. The dread, the psychological horror that made Silent Hill a masterpiece? Completely butchered. What we’re left with is an embarrassing, soul-sucking mockery of a horror game that doesn’t deserve to share the same name as the classics.

The story is a convoluted mess that insults your intelligence, and the characters? They’re cardboard cutouts with as much personality as a wet rag. The combat is sluggish and frustrating, it’s like they took the most annoying parts of early Silent Hill games and amplified them to make you want to throw your controller at the screen.

This game is an absolute dumpster fire, a pathetic excuse for a Silent Hill title.  Avoid this trash at all costs. Silent Hill: Homecoming is an insult to fans and a disgrace to the genre.

2/10  
Pretend this game doesn't exist.

Jogo uns dois minutos e pronto, o jogo fecha. Estou tentando zerar com cheat e tudo, se não for assim, não passo nem da primeira fase. Mas, o jogo não quer que eu jogue, se fecha automaticamente a todo momento. Horrível. Pior Silent Hill, por isto ninguém joga esse lixo.

No começo desse ano, decidi que ia jogar todos os jogos da franquia silent hill começando pelos de playstation 2. Joguei o 2, o 3, o 4 e peguei o homecoming por uma promoção na steam. O jogo é de 2008, sétima geração de consoles, e impressionantemente, meu computador tava sofrendo demais pra rodar essa porcaria, e olha que eu tenho um PC com peças boas, que roda the witcher 3 com gráficos no alto, battlefield 1, dark soul s3 e basicamente qualquer jogo triple A de até uns 5/6 anos atrás. Óbvio, esse jogo é horrivelmente otimizado, com crashs constantes, o que te frustra muito, até porque é muito comum você avançar 30/40/50 minutos no jogo sem nenhum save, o jogo crasha do nada e pronto, todo esse tempo foi desperdiçado. Honestamente, não recomendo, eu vou tentar jogar mais um pouco, mas eu tô bem perto de dropar e ver a história no canal do sandman no youtube. Além disso, a gameplay é bem ruim, consegue ser pior que a de qualquer silent hill de playstation 2.
terribile pc port and optimisation, not worth it

column8:
[h1] AVOID THIS OR BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK  [/h1]
This game should not be listed on Steam. It's a pain in the ass to make it work properly. Has a lot of bugs and issues with resolution where you only get a black screen. Keyboard and mouse doesn't work well to play this, since it's an incomplete port from console. Even connecting a controller won't fix this. 
Steam should make publishers or developers have at least a decent and proper version of their game if they want it to remain listed on the Store.

column8:
Para empezar y ser claros
La única forma legal de jugar este juegos es desde PC o con una consola antigua

La versión de PC es mala, y no hay mucho más que decir (he tenido 1 crasheo por lo que recomiendo ir guardando siempre que puedas, en cambios de escenarios después de cinemáticas o al guardar partida puedes estar 15-20seg con la imagen congelada esperando a que responda. El audio es mono, así que con auriculares no está bien configurado…etc)

Pero hablando en si del juego
Me ha gustado y entretenido mucho, tiene muy malas críticas y es la oveja negra, pero lo he disfrutado y gustado.
Puede que no esté a la altura de sus predecesores como sh1 o 2 pero no es para nada un mal juego.

Tiene buenos personajes, buena historia, buena ambientación, como si fuera de ps2 con ese estilo retro y granulado. Con muchas representaciones y simbolismos 

Para mi vale la pena jugarlo y lo recomiendo por su historia/ambientación.

Not only is the worst mainline Silent Hill game, but it's also an abysmal port. It's a great example of what can happen when a studio is given a property they fundamentally missed the point of and created a worse copy of what came before.

column8:
I rarely give a negative review, but it is what it is.

I would like to commend the game on its monster and boss design, as well on its overall mood and music. That being said, those are the only redeemable qualities to it.

I am perplexed on how this barely playable mess of a game was release in the first place. The loading alone takes forever.

Should you finally manage to get the game running and stop it from crashing all the time (and in order to do so, you must disable the steam overlay, change the resolution to 1280x720, change the video quality from high to medium, subtitles must be off, and try using Windows XP/7 compatibility mode), I seriously doubt you will find this small victory rewarding.
This game has one of the worst gameplay mechanics I have ever experienced. 

The character you play as, Alex, is so sluggish when confronting enemies. The dodge mechanic is virtually useless, as it too is really slow, thus taking damage is, basically, inevitable. The fact that Alex steps away from enemies while fighting them with each hit, despite there being a lock-on mechanism, is also quite unfortunate.
The hit boxes are also a mess.

In conclusion – If you are a massive ‘’Silent Hill’’ fan and a completionist, then, I suppose, you’ll just have to suffer through.
If you are more on the casual side or, like myself, are getting re-introduced to the franchise – we have ‘’Silent Hill 2’’ the remake available on Steam now.
So, play that.

You are welcome.

Cheers!

[h1] Ну привет читатель)? [/h1]
Сегодня у нас САМОЕ ПРОВАЛЬНАЯ ЧАСТЬ Silent hill  и называется она HOMECOMING

[h1] Итак 2008 год [/h1] 
  Left for dead, П и з д е ц в России(как в 90-е), теракт в самолете ( бухой водитель, если интересно почитайте), И самое главное к чему мы пришли SILENT HILL HOMECOMING
Что это за игра??? щяс мы и узнаем)))

[h1] А что такое Silent hill Homecoming [/h1]
Silent Hill: Homecoming (с англ. — «Сайлент Хилл: Возвращение домой») — шестая игра серии Silent Hill в жанрах survival horror и приключенческого боевика. Вышла в 2008 году на платформах Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 и ПК.
[h1]Итак и поговорил о сюжете [/h1] 
Алекс обнаруживает, что его отец и младший брат Джошуа бесследно исчезли, как и множество других людей по всему городу. Он находит свою мать, впавшую в состояние депрессии и кататонии, и она сообщает Алексу, что его отец ушёл искать Джошуа. 

Алекс исследует город в поисках своего пропавшего брата, постепенно раскрывая причины странных событий, а также мрачные секреты близлежащего города Сайлент-Хилл, и по итогу он просрал: маму,отчима(отца), женчину, и мл брата пиздука
И потом он уходит в Рассвет
И

Алекс обнаруживает, что его отец и младший брат Джошуа бесследно исчезли, как и множество других людей по всему городу. Он находит свою мать, впавшую в состояние депрессии и кататонии, и она сообщает Алексу, что его отец ушёл искать Джошуа.

column8:
Ugh... ok here we go.
Conceptually and story wise the game itself kinda follows the events of Silent Hill.
The game isn't very pretty to look at, ik some reshade modes and even adding rtgi can help alot with making it look better, but ultimately the game is more boring than anything else.
Although having horrific imagery, it lacks the sustainable dread imo. The main character ws hrd for me to connect with and although i don't have alot of hours on steam, i played originally on xbox 360.
Important to note: Alot of the enemies can 100% stun lock you, some of the bosses can stun lock you, soft locking out of winning, some of the higher difficulties can soft lock you because it may not provide you enough ammo. 
If your gonna play the game, just never turn your flashlight on.
TLDR:
As a game its Mid as a Silent Hill game its bad, but if you just want a close enough story, its fine.

column8: good old memories

Honestly? I have mixed feelings about this game..

The story was really good and the plot twist was really good, caught me by surprise.
Gameplay wise.. i dont really know, the combat system is really bad and the enemies are really stupid, i mean they can keep u stun locked and you can't do anything.
You also have the ammo issue even on normal mode, by the time i got to the Scarlet boss fight (it was hell) i was low HP and left with only melee, struggled for 3 days to beat that boss fight. 

I would still recommend getting the game just to experience it, because the story was good and so were the characters, its just that combat system/Scarlet boss fight that made me annoyed with the game.

Nur als disclaimer es ist im kern ein gutes gyame der port davon ist aber arsch


diese probleme hatte ich während nicht einmal 3 stunden spielzeit:
Es stürzt ab wenn man raustabt, manchmal bekommt man auf ewig blackscreen wenn man die Grafik ändert, es stürzt allgemein ab wenn man es über 700 Pixel spielt was nicht nur manchmal oder nur bei mir der Fall ist, Legit ist es nicht möglich über 700 Pixel zu spielen da es sonst abstürzt und es gibt nichts was man dagegen machen kann, die Steuerung ist komplett schwammig, die Tastenbelegung ist einfach nur akward besonders auf Kontroller, der Sound ist komplett hinüber manche Dinge sind zu leise manche zu laut du Hörst den Charakter und andere npcs viel zu leise mit auf einem Ohr, manche Sounds tuen wirklich in den Ohren weh und zwar nicht weil sie zu laut sind sondern weil es einfach nur gottlos scheiße klingt, die Karte ist bei mir verbuggt es wird nur ein Achtel davon angezeigt und Neustartrn bringt nichts, die Maus ist bei mir ebenfalls oft verbuggt aka ich habe die normale Maus und die ingame Maus parallel ingame was bedeutet das du dich nicht umdrehen kannst was auch bedeutet das du leaven musst was auch bedeutet das du deine Speicher verlierst da man nur bei bestimmten Punkten speichern kann also nicht im Menü, du hast einen 30 FPS lock 




wenn ich das spiel durchhab werd ich die rezession bearbeiten und dann bewerten wie das game im kern ist aber eins ist sicher und zwar das es ein techniches desaster ist

column8:
I see lots of complaints about this game, but i play other games(EVIL WITHIM) with the same issues, glitches and bugs, and guess what? They(other games) have an overwhelmingly positive reputation, so my advice is, if you have a real decent and updated system setup, just put a very decent ssd on it, because 80% of these issues(problems) will disappear.


And here is a fix for the black screen:

if you still experience black screen on launch.

Go to <path-to-game>\Engine\
Open vars_pc.cfg file with a text editor.
Change ScreenResHeight=
ScreenResWidth= to the desired resolution.

Notes

Resolutions above 1920x1080 may cause the map and examined inventory items to not display properly.

if a vars_pc.cfg doesnt exist in engine folder create it and add desired screen resolution



OBS: It's the closest decent thing near the "OUTLAST" experience, but with guns. And if this isin't enough 4 u, then i advice you to watch a movie that goes by the name of, "House on Haunted Hill", the 1999 version, and look for a character that goes by the name of, 
Dr. Richard Benjamin Vannacutt, and not a RPG game claiming to be a horror game.

column8: É um bom jogo não vou mentir mas não é uns dos melhores mas serve.

Team Silent should never have stopped making SH games. I have been a fan of Silent Hill for 20 years, but I lost interest after Origins. I never played Homecoming or Downpour as the OG games (1-4) are simply king. I decided to try again, but Homecoming is a broken game to say the least. it does not support controllers, which for a start is scandalous, and trying to use the Steam Input Translation mapping does not work and leaves the combat knife constantly equipped, so I can't interact with the environment and just keep swiping the knife everywhere rather than reading documents or moving over obstacles etc. Also it appears that an equipped weapon cannot be unequipped, so I am immediately uninterested. Do yourself a favour and play the original and best games from the days of yore, and avoid this nonsense.

column8:
Análise sincera de um fã assíduo da série, levando em conta todos os pontos:

Prós:
1.	Atmosfera e Narrativa: Silent Hill: Homecoming mantém a atmosfera sombria e a narrativa envolvente que a série é conhecida. A história de Alex Shepherd e sua busca por seu irmão desaparecido é intrigante e cheia de reviravoltas.
2.	Design de Som: A trilha sonora e os efeitos sonoros são de alta qualidade, contribuindo para a imersão no mundo assustador de Silent Hill.
3.	Gráficos: Os gráficos são detalhados e bem trabalhados, especialmente considerando a época de lançamento do jogo. As criaturas e os cenários são visualmente impressionantes e perturbadores.
Contras:
1.	Problemas de Performance: A versão para PC de Silent Hill: Homecoming sofre com diversos problemas de performance. Muitos jogadores relatam quedas de frame rate, travamentos e bugs que podem atrapalhar a experiência de jogo.
2.	Controles: Os controles no PC são considerados pouco responsivos e mal otimizados. A falta de suporte adequado para controles de jogo e a configuração de teclado e mouse podem tornar a jogabilidade frustrante.
3.	Compatibilidade: O jogo apresenta problemas de compatibilidade com sistemas operacionais modernos, o que pode exigir ajustes e patches adicionais para funcionar corretamente (melhor maneira de se jogar é apelando para mods).
4.	Ausência de Atualizações: A falta de atualizações e suporte contínuo por parte dos desenvolvedores deixou muitos dos problemas técnicos sem solução, o que é decepcionante para os fãs da série.
Conclusão: Silent Hill: Homecoming para PC é um jogo que oferece uma experiência narrativa rica e uma atmosfera assustadora, mas é prejudicado por problemas técnicos significativos. Se você é um fã dedicado da série e está disposto a lidar com os desafios técnicos, pode encontrar valor no jogo. No entanto, para a maioria dos jogadores, a versão para PC pode ser uma experiência frustrante devido aos seus inúmeros problemas de performance e compatibilidade.
Buen juego xd

Great game and even better Silent Hill, don't listen to the haters, play and make your own opinion. 

Scarlett is one of the best and most immersive bosses ever and if you manage to fight her for the first time ever on hard mode with 30/40% hp in total with no medkits, you will understand what true terror stands for.

Play on hard for the best experience.

edit: I've just seen people crying about bugs or fan made patches and tbf I have no [REDACTED] idea wtf are they yapping about. Not even single game breaking bug (1 or 2 in total, fun ragdolls, nothing else) + 1 random crash after cut scene for the entire game and after restart worked perfectly. Yeah, I don't have any fan patches, maybe that's why it works for me.

column8: Played through the game on xbox, was curious if the PC version offered more fixes for the graphics. It did 'kind-of-sort-of,' but an already lame carbon copy of a silent hill game won't be fixed by graphics. I don't know how to sugar coat this; the games bad. I used to describe it as a fan game made by a generic western studio. Now that time's passed, even the things that were good or passable about this game have shrunk. It's just boring and insulting to both the player and to Konami. Easily the worst game in the series. 3/10 for the crashes and how poorly it's aged, it's still a complete experience but man you can be doing literally anything else with your time.

column8: Los esquives funcionan cuando quieren y hacia donde quieren, no te siguen. Los enemigos pegan de la nada, hay bugs donde los enemigos llegan a ser invencibles; cuando te atacan y hay que presionar el mouse rápidamente, no lo detecta. El juego crashea de forma aleatoria, se traba o decide simplemente no funcionar. Es un desastre.

Silent Hill Homecoming is the clear difference between a group of artists using a medium to create and realize a world otherwise not possible vs corporations using that identity to sell video games. This game is a desecrated corpse propped up in the pursuit of making money. 

The writing on this can be described as painfully literal in a world that has been built in the abstract. The art looks nice, but is mostly without thought and not relevant to the narrative at all. Certain stand-outs feel refreshing, but lack any punch when combined with a, frankly, boring and contrived world. It feels more like an amusement park where you're supposed to clap at the things you remember, rather than think about the things you see and hear. The star attractions don't do enough to distract from the fact that you're the product here. The ending doesn't really make any sense, and it feels as if it's constructed to try and replicate the highs of Silent Hill 2. It does not land at all, and weakens a lot of the themes regarding abuse. 

Silent Hill has never really been strong in the combat department, so I wouldn't hold it too much against this game normally. Sadly though, the combat seems to be the biggest focus here, so it should be important to note that it's somehow worse than the previous games. This game does it's best to try and replicate Resident Evil 4 in presentation while trying to play to the combat structure of the previous games. It fails on almost every single level. The camera and focus of the combat is very clearly focused on ranged combat, as Resident Evil 4 is, but the game restricts ranged ammunition much more than previous entries. As such you're left with a clunky combat system that ends up with just knife spam by the end of the game. 

Also Pyramid Head's inclusion in this game as Bogeyman just hurts the game. Not only is it lazy, but it's not satisfying at all. You can tell there was debate on the inclusion of "Bogeyman" which lead to just 2 occurrences that is very much not satisfying. Fan service drivel. 

P.S. the game does not work well at all. If you wish to play, you should download Unknownproject's patch. This was not a factor in the negative rating, but it would warrant one on it's own if the fix was not (relatively) easy.

column8: If, like me, the release of the Silent Hill 2 remake made you want more Silent Hill action, don't let this piece of garbage tempt you in. A broken and buggy mess, made only barely playable thanks to the excellent work of one fan made patch, this entry in the franchise is just an unbelievably dull and uninteresting game. The locations uninspired, the story and 'twist', flat and boring and the focus on melee combat completely missing the point of the SH games, Homecoming is a poor experience and no mistake. If you crave more SH brand horror, I recommend hunting around online and emulating any of the other earlier games rather than spending any time with this one.

童年的恐怖类游戏启蒙就是起源和破碎的记忆，之后从原版2一路体验到6，2是公认的系列巅峰，不过在我心里破碎的记忆可以说仅次于2，。寂静岭对后世恐怖游戏的发展起到了非常好的启蒙作用，寂静岭系列大概分两个时代，起初一直都是team silent来制作，科乐美从销售观察出这个系列在日本一直不温不火，主要盈利都来自欧美国家，因此科乐美在4之后解散了team silent，用外包的方式制作了起源，破碎的记忆，归乡，暴雨。但除了起源和破碎的记忆外，剩下的作品不管评价还是人气都惨不忍睹。例如归乡在ps3，xbox，steam都有，结果销量只有惨淡的20万，再加上盗版猖狂，科乐美就抛弃了pc，之后的寂静岭2/3HD，暴雨都只有PS3和xbox版本。
在体验过前面的作品后来到归乡就会感觉到风格从心理恐怖暗示变成了美式惊悚，玩家扮演退伍军人阿历克斯寻找自己弟弟约书亚，在游戏中需要紧跟他的脚步，随着剧情抽丝剥茧，逐渐接近真相，这和2詹姆士追寻玛利娅很像，但是5在这个过程中把很多暗示和解释做的很明显，没有太多2里的朦胧感，在游戏到一半就容易让人猜到真相。
在归乡中同样也有充满绣铁，发霉，血的里世界，并且在表里世界的切换表现上采用了电影里的创意，周围墙壁会有一块块掉落的效果，不过对比前面的作品还是能感受到不同，更像是废墟。其他地方也能发现很多和电影相似的，护士，教徒，以及只为客串来露个脸的三角头，感觉就像是电影的同人游戏一样。
在ui和战斗方面对比前面的作品也有了一些改变，武器可以蓄力，还可以连击，再加上闪避功能和终结，更像是个动作游戏，而且武器可以开各种锁，比如斧头可以劈开木板、小刀可以划开里世界的墙。而且这游戏小刀几乎无敌，成为继生化危机又一个小刀无敌的游戏。
而游戏的缺点也是非常明显且致命，各种bug，以及打齐了补丁都会崩溃，我的存档已经莫名坏了两次…
另一个问题就是大量的尸体，虽然说恐怖游戏几乎都爱用尸体来渲染气氛，但在寂静岭这个几乎每一个物品都是充满暗示的游戏中，归乡却没有详细说明尸体出现的原因，对比之下2在这一点就做的很好，而且从1到4，游戏里很少把尸体直接放在明面上，比如起源和2的停尸间，只会看到手或者脚。3的医院里，尸体上会用床单盖着，只能看到轮廓。当调查时候主角还会说:我不会想碰这东西。所以归乡这样大量的尸体放在明面上反而更像生化危机和死亡空间的感觉。
还有怪物的设定，前面作品里怪物都有其象征的意义，但是归乡里的怪物却几乎没有什么代表性，唯一让我印象深刻的就是娃娃boss，因为那段音乐做的很好…
1的怪物是阿蕾莎心理的恐惧映射所构成的。2是詹姆士和其他角色心理的恐惧或噩梦所具现而成的，厚布包裹的场景也是詹姆士用枕头闷死玛丽的潜意识表现。3是雪柔自身对过去的投射，蠕动的血和铁锈里世界更是造就寂静岭的经典；4的怪物都是牺牲者化身的，以及颠倒世界代表主角小时候去找妈妈时，对城市复杂的道路的恐惧。对比之下，归乡很多东西反而更像是为了恐怖而恐怖，尤其教徒这种完全算是普通人类的敌人，从理论上不管表世界或里世界，都已经脱离了现实，因为只有被这个世界拉进来的人才会出现在这里，所以历代出现的人类角色数量很少。
因为这些，归乡变得像生化危机4一样，变成动作冒险游戏了，可是生化危机转型得很成功，成功继承了生化危机的名号，归乡的话如果把寂静岭这个名字去掉或许还是个不错的新游戏，但保留了寂静岭的名号又没能继承寂静岭的精髓，就导致没法被所有人接受。

Vamos a empezar por las cosas buenas
-Por lo poco que pude jugar no esta tan malo el juego como me lo imaginaba
-El juego da algo de miedo como todo Silent Hill 
-Los enemigos tienen un diseño normalito, puede llegar a asustar (muy pocas veces), pero no es algo que incomode o llegue a ser ni remotamente comparable a los diseños hechos por Masahiro Ito
-La musica de Akira Yamaoka es excelente como siempre, y se podria decir que lo mejor del juego

...

Ahora vamos con la malo y en esto hablare de la calidad de este port
-El juego esta horriblemente porteado, se me ha crasheado mas de 5 veces y los fps son una mierda, yo no soy muy exigente con los fps pero por lo menos dame 30
-El juego tiene un problema con las voces, el audio esta roto en las cinematicas, haciendo que las voces de los personajes que no sean Alex no se escuchen, para poder jugar con las voces ien implementadas tienes que descargar un mod
-La saga Silent Hill siempre se a caracterisado por tener un combate incomodo ya que los protagonistas son humanos, pero lo de este juego es otra cosa. Combatir con enemigos en este juego es una tortura, es complicado esquivar a los enemigos ya que aveces esquivas e igual te dan, y que bajen los fps a la hora de pelear tampoco ayuda; algunos dicen que los fans de Silent Hill hipocritas por gustarles el combate del remake si es lo mismo que homecoming, pero la verdad es que el combate de Silent Hill 2 es infinitamente superior y mas comodo que este
-Los controles con super incomodos y horribles
-Como dije antes no pude jugar todo el juego, y eso porque el juego se trabo totalmente porque intente bajarle la resolucion para ver si iba mejor y de esa forma el juego murio totalmente, cuando lo abro ahora solo se ve una pantalla negra

Este juego y port an sido claramente olvidado por Konami, pero no solo por Konami, tambien a sido olvidado por los propios fans, por ejemplo, el Silent Hill 2 original de PC tambien salio horrible pero los fans se encargaron de hacerle parches e incluso hicieron las version definitiva para jugar al clasico que es Silent Hill 2 Enhanced Edition, pero encontrar parches que arreglen Silent Hill Homecoming es muy complicado ya que pocos se interesaron en hacerle parches para arreglarlo, ya que el juego es visto como uno de los peores Silent Hills, lo que es normal ya que es Silent Hill muy generico

The beginning of the end for the SH franchise, the one that started decades of mediocrity at best. I didn't really love it back in my PS3 days but i surely hoped the nostalgia effect could help me years later on PC but well...not really. The story is flawed and voice acting/animations not that great; bosses are the best part of the game in terms of design but nothing is on the level of the first 3 games of the franchise.

This port is trash, there is not much more to say unfortunately...it crashes roughly every 2-3 hours and when it doesn't fully crash it completely freezes for 20-30 seconds. I've tried both PC and Steam Deck with same results.

Unfortunately the gameplay feels incredibly dated, everything is so stiff, especially in boss fights or while facing enemies that get stuck in attacking loops spamming attacks.

Overall: 5/10

column8: Прошёл худшую часть Silent Hill (на концовку с НЛО. которая здесь почему-то не секретная), пробираясь сквозь баги, фризы и краши (эт ещё с фанатским патчем, без которого она в принципе не играбельна). Игра крайне линейная, будут гарантированно закрыты абсолютно все двери, кроме единственной нужной (и зачем здесь только карта, отметки на которой разрабы походу рисовали в паинте). Порой игровые условности, которыми обосновывается недоступность попасть в то или иное место, поражают: например, гг будут мешать пройти мешки с мусором, матрас или висящая цепь, зато когда надо, он может совершить невозможный прыжок. При этом игра злоупотребляет бэктрекингом. Когда нас заставили второй раз бежать обратно изъё6истой дорогой через кладбище, я полез в прохождение, на полном серьёзе решив что я делаю чёто не так, когда нас заставили бежать через это же кладбище в третий раз, я уже не удивлялся (ведь шорткаты в 2008 миядзаки ещё не изобрёл). Сюжет про сектантов тож никаких эмоций не вызывает, зато понавтыкали монстров из других частей (лысых собак, медсестёр, бабайку с руками-базуками, пирамидхеда ляять), являющихся персональными страхами героев этих частей. Я честно пытался найти в ней что-то хорошее, и знаете ли, нашёл! Здесь есть физика динамических объектов и работающие зеркала - две утерянных технологии прошлого. Ну окей, здесь ещё есть загадки (даже сраные пятнашки) и местами симпатичное окружение с литрами крови. В остальном я даже не знаю кому это можно посоветовать пройти.. разве что для составления целостной картины серии.

Borzalmas. Sorozatos Crash.  Max 30 FPS, mivel a motor és a többi elem forced 30 fps bármit is csinálsz. 
Save pointok a legrosszabb helyen. Nincs "game continued" csak load. Ha félbe kell hagynod, buktad azt a 40 percet. Harc rendszer botrányos, mintha nem is lenne. Fizikai sérülések nincsenek, bezzeg a szérum felvételt külön animálták, de hogy minek? Elnagyolt pályaelemek, felületes textúrák. Inventory kezelhetetlen főleg harc közben, ha fegyvert váltanál instant agyvérzés. Bugos ellenfelek, kitéréskor is eltalál, máskor meg akkor se, ha előtte állsz. Történet lehetne sokkal több és jobb. Mintha mindig készülne valami nagy dobásra, de mégsem történik meg. Szépen lassan véget ér. Nagyon nagy csalodás volt az egész. Mindössze azért vittem végig, mert pár éve belekezdtem és úgy tűnt valami nagy készül itt, de sajnos kiderült, hogy ez a játék kihagyott lehetőségek tömkelege és a grafikai és technikai megvalosítás kritikán aluli lett.

column8:
《寂静岭：归乡》(Silent Hill: Homecoming)[h1]★★★★★[/h1]

电子游戏发展至今，有一款恐怖游戏广为人知，即使你没有玩过游戏，也很大概率听说过它的名字——寂静岭。（评论区提供汉化方法）
[h3]F**K Konami[/h3]
众所周知，有钱不赚是傻蛋，而科乐美正是这样做的傻蛋。由于科乐美的原因，寂静岭系列目前在Steam上对中国区锁区且没有官方中文。早有耳闻寂静岭系列第五代《寂静岭：归乡》是寂静岭集大成之作，当我在steampy看到低价大甩卖的激活码时，就买了一个。然后在网上找到了汉化补丁。
[h3]痛并快乐着[/h3]
本作在视听效果上下了很大功夫，里面的怪物仿佛是从设计者的噩梦中逃出来的，光是造型就让人竖汗毛冒冷汗。不过，这些怪物基本上都是战斗力为五的渣渣，你大部分时候可以选择弄死它们或者撒丫子逃跑。因此，一开始的害怕感会逐渐消散，理智逐渐占据上风。优质的配乐，与场景的契合度没有百分百也至少有百分之九十了，有几次我甚至特意控制角色停下脚步，只为了多听一会儿。
[h3]高情商恐怖[/h3]
在游戏选择上，我不是一个只看外表的人。对我而言，游戏的画质并不是重点。所以我可以耐着性子看完每段CG，剧情给我感觉不是一般的那种无脑的恐怖游戏。随后在网上了解了一下游戏背景，是讲述邪教与类似于克苏鲁背景下，普通人的悲剧与救赎。寂静岭系列主打玩法是解谜，战斗是其次，但五代归乡战斗的占比感觉也可以说是主要玩法了。玩完本作之后，我发现其实我不会像之前那样，想要急切跨区购买，尝尝二代重制版咸淡。
[h3]后日谈[/h3]
本作故事上走的悬疑路线，同时满足了玩家猎奇的心理，但不是纯粹让人看个爽。至少是通过悲惨的故事让我意识到邪教和迷信可以有多可怕。通关后我想说，这游戏是我玩过最深刻的反邪教游戏。但是解谜对于我来说，在我一边爽玩的同时又在消磨着我的热情，所以我现在可以肯定的是，我能等到寂静岭2重制版打折时，甚至进包？的时候再出手购买了。

精选截图>>>>>>>>>>>>

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3345160934

Sim, eu gosto desse Silent Hill, é o melhor de todos? Não! Definitivamente. Mas tenho um carinho imenso por ele. Pode ser por na época eu ter interesse na franquia e ter tido a oportunidade de começar por esse no seu lançamento? Pode, mas eu gosto de outros aspectos nele que não são apenas pela memória de ser introduzido em uma das minhas sagas favoritas. Eu curto muito o enredo desse jogo, sua narrativa nem tanto, mas me interesso no mistério da família shepherd, o final recompensa com as revelações mas acaba de forma seca e sem sal demais e os personagens secundários são fds kkk (e tem toda essa patifaria de outra cidade além de silent que pow, pataquada do karai kkkk). A gameplay do jogo é bem truncada e alguns QTE não funcionam sempre mas no geral eu consigo ter uma gameplay minimamente satisfatória, e os gráficos pra época eram decentes, (as expressões faciais dos personagens em gameplay são HORRÍVEIS kk) o map design deixa muito a desejar mas não me incomoda muito. O que realmente quebra é essa otimização no PC que é INFAME, UMA NOJEIRA, jogo travado a 30 fps e com quedas bruscas, lotados de bugs e crashs que entendo quem desistir no meio por isso. diante disso tudo, sei que não é grande jogo, mas ainda assim me apetece muito e gosto da história dele.

column8:
As a fan of this game, it's disappointing to see such a broken and poorly optimized port sitting on Steam, asking for $40. On newer systems, it's nearly unplayable, with constant technical issues. The game crashes frequently, often setting you back far too much, I have crashed 2 times at the same point and it would put me back nearly 15 min of game-time and 1 fully unavoidable cutscene. 

The story itself is decent, but it's hard to appreciate when you're fighting through bugs and performance problems. Considering the success of the Silent Hill 2 remake, some might be curious about this other title on Steam, its seriously odd that THIS is the only other title on Steam. This port just isn’t worth the frustration and headache. If you're interested, wait for a steep discount—I picked it up for $9. At $40, it's just absurd. Steam needs to reprice older games if their this broken.

column8:
Not going to be one of those ultra negative reviewers. 
Look, it's 2008 Silent Hill from the XBOX 360/PS3 era. 

Decent game, but the port is definitely sub-par. Save often and you'll be fine. Here's the key things to do, to avoid a bad time.

Do NOT minimize the window, you'll crash when you try to reopen it.
Do NOT use the steam overlay, your cursor will get messed up and you'll have to minimize to fix it, and then crash.
There's a glitch where projectile weapons don't make collision, so test a save file. Shoot into a wall, bullet hole = good to go. No hole = reload the save file.

Above all, when the game freezes. DO NOT MOVE OR PRESS BUTTONS. Just let it load. Towards the end, the freezes take up to 60-90 seconds, but it will come back if you don't hit additional inputs.

An absolute trash heap at every moment. This game was one of the most miserable experiences I've ever had the misfortune of playing. I though resident evil 0 was bad. But holy shit compared to this ugly filth, resident evil 0 is amazing. Lets talk about what makes this game so bad. 

-Well first off the gameplay is janky, clunky, and aggravating. Why the fuk do I have to click shift from going from running to combat mode. I've played games with jank movement but this game takes the cake. 0/10 gameplay

-Secondly the graphics are something atrocious, certainly an eye straining hell. I get that it came out in 2008. But what else came out that year? Dead space. No excuse for this game to look worse than a fuckin PS1 game!!!!

-Third game freezes up at every save spot and at random occasions. Let's play a game of Is It GOnna CrASH?

-fourth unskippable dialog hell. Say you die. Well now there's a good chance u lost progress up to a certain point and gotta talk to characters. You have to listen to them all over with now way to skip. STFU and let me skipppp ffs...

-Fifth a $40 price tag. I mean I got it on sale for $8 and honestly that much was a rip. This garbage should be free but well.... EVEN FREE I'D NEVER PLAY THIS CRAP!!!

-The only redeeming quality is the atmosphere and story but it is ruined by how aggravated I was playing this trash. Oh a scary monster appeared? I'm not immersed or scared because the combat is so jank that the rage induced is burning my blood pressure so high that I'm gonna have a hard attack in my 30's.

Finally FUUUUUUUUUUU KKKKKKKK this game.

Gerçekten bunu yapmayı nasıl başarmışlar. Oyunun dövüş mekaniklerinin kötülüğünden bahsetmiyorum bile. Hikaye desen ilgi çekici değil. Kesinlikle alıp oynamayın. Bu oyun silen hill için bir yüz karasıdır.

column8:
Ta hra má dobrý příběh a hudbu. Ale má i hodně špatných věcí: 

Grafika 4/10 - Hra vypadá šíleně zastarale, má dost prázdné lokace kde je třeba 10 dveří ale vejít můžete jen do dvou, kde se někdy i nic nenachází. Proto hra vypadá dost nedodělaně

Gameplay 5/10 - Hra má alespoň trochu zábavný bojový systém, ale u hádanek někdy blbnou věci třeba když něco chcete přetáhnout tak to nejde atd... Ale to bych asi přiřadil k tomu špatnému portu.

Příběh 7/10 - Je to klasický Silent hill příběh o tom že se vracíte domů a začínáte si vzpomínat co se vlastně stalo.

AI 6/10 - Postavy nejsou moc chytré a jsou to dost blbci.

Ještě dodám, že hra má špatný port - Hra padá kdykoliv ji alt tabnete a někdy i když sama chce.

Shrnutí: Hra vypadá nedodělaně, občas padá a má špatný technický stav dávám 6/10

Despite numerous bugs and inconvenient combat system, the game is worth playing. The story is really interesting and the graphics is not that bad even in 2024... As a fan of Silent Hill franchise I'd say it's 7/10

Foi uma luta para terminar este jogo, crash após crash, mas consegui terminar e gostei muito. Mas se você quiser jogar um Silent Hill com um porte muito melhor, segue o link onde eu testei o jogo e pretendo jogar até o lançamento de SH 2 Remake:

combat is absolute garbage. you hit the enemy, monster hits you back, you fall down, you get up, monster hits again and makes you fall down again, you get up and manage to get a window to hit, you miss, because the game is buggy as hell, you try to dodge but it doesnt work, it hits you and you fall down again, rinse repeat. game is very buggy, 30 fps cap, film grain that you cant turn off, fixed save spots and no auto save, long loading times on a modern m.2 ssd? yeah, couldnt bother to finnish it.

column8:
A black sheep in the entry of the Western Silent Hill releases. For much of the good the game does, it takes two steps back in other places. 

The game itself is rather clunky, which is honestly to be expected of a Silent Hill entry, as the traversal nor combat are ever the main focus. Silent Hill is meant to be digested as a both, horrific yet cultish-ly-whimsical experience. Admittedly, this entry is one of the more gory, more slasher-esq entries, sparing no expense by featuring some of the franchises more gruesome body horror to date. Homecoming has three rather big things going for it, two of those being its creature designs with the previously mentioned 'body horror' Homecoming is ripe with. Arguably, Homecoming has some of the best boss designs IN THE FRANCHISE.

The latter in the same vain of design being the Otherworld. It's choice of reddish/brown/orange tones paired with the heavy, grime-y, rusty industrial foundation, paired with some clever sound design tricks and the like, Homecoming's Otherworld feels much more heavy ambiance-wise, while also looking neglected yet inhabited. 

On the topic of sound design, and the final real strong-sturdy bone this game has is in its music. Akira Yamaoka is known for the kind of work he's done, and his style is virtually unmatched, even deified by some, with how it's moved not just this franchise, but franchises Yamaoka has had involvement in with his various musical arrangements. If you want it in short; Homecoming's soundtrack is immaculate. It's some of the best music in the entire franchise, with Mary Elizabeth McGlynn's vocals tying it all together to create music that's never left my mind even after a decade and some change.

What causes Homecoming to be seen as a 'black sheep' to me is its attempts to be seen as a more defined entry, rather than a spin-off, making constant nods and attempts to tie in characters from previous titles into itself, and going further by having an incredibly lackluster story. The twist is delivered like a weightless punch, and too many of the supporting cast seem to not want to take this game seriously, causing some rather stilted, nearly bordering uncanny or strange line deliveries. 

Alright, onto the actual port of the game, being what actually holds this game back on PC at least; 

It's ABYSMALLY BAD. 

I had to patch my copy of the game using a patch from 'unknownproject', which luckily makes the game playable at least, but not fully remedying it of some issues, such as textures being messed up, certain audio like voice acting to play in only one ear, and the occasional crash. This game crashed three times over the course of an almost six hour playthrough patched, I can't imagine how far you'd get un-patched. I also still kept to playing the game in 1200x800, as I feared it may be more crash happy if I pushed the resolution too far.

On the topic of ports, which is where I'll conclude my ramblings, I really hope someday they refurbish this port officially. As of writing this review on October 2nd, 2024, there is now only TWO Silent Hill entries available on Steam, the other being the remake of Silent Hill 2 set to debut days after this review. The only other 'official' entry being on GOG, being Silent Hill 4. I hope that Konami maybe tries to bring forward the ports of other Silent Hill entries, both the Team Silent and Western entries, and works with a studio that can actually get it right.

Otherwise, Silent Hill Homecoming has all kinds of lovely eye-candy and ear-candy, but feels very heavy-handed, and falls very short due to its shortcomings. Play this game on a console, it's backwards compatible via the Xbox One, and that's probably the best way to even experience the game. I dunno how this game would handle being emulated.

column8:
I played on the PS3 and had a way more better experience than playing here on pc. I had to play the game through the Bin Folder because launching the game through Steam or the desktop. I couldn't really change the default 800x600p resolution. I got to play at 1920x1080p and for the most part works. 

But it crashes. Either by reloading a lot if you find yourself stuck on a boss or enemies. Technical issues aside, this is a good Silent Hill entry. But at the same time I did have issues with plot details. The Silent Hill movie was coming out at the same time and some elements from the movie carry over to this game.

I would not recommend the game at 40 bucks especially with all the trickery you need to do to get it working on modern systems. Konami really needs to fix it or remaster etc. So get it on sale. I spent like 8 bucks for it and I got to relive the past playing this game again.

column8: Game crashes a lot on PC. As the saving system is so few and far between, this requires you to replay bits (sometimes including unskippable cut scenes) again and again. Game is also capped at 30 FPS (no matter what I try) and some of the puzzles don't work properly, requiring endless clicking or repetitive dragging of the mouse until it does what you need it to. Sound for cut scene voices is incredibly quiet. The game in itself is not bad for it's time and has some decent jumpscares and moments, I just wish the performance of the game was better as it ruins the immersion.

This is my refund review and requesting for refund. 

""""I'm going to share my experience and I'm going to be here. I know Silent Hill 2 remake is coming out on Sept 7th, which I'm extremely exciting for. I love Silent Hill. I was extremely disappointed and wish I didn't buy PlayStation 4 when it first came out for new Silent Hill sneak peek in P.T. demo game. Kojima promised us for new Silent Hill, and it fall apart because Kojima having issued with Konami company. The point is, I have so much love for Silent Hill growing up. However! This game was on sale for 8 dollars, and I was like"Sure". Brought the game, download it, it bring back some nostalgia. I don't mind a shitty outdated graphic. I left it on idle when it started out okay. I didn't think it will be a issues. WRONG. When I got back on the game, it brought me SOOO much troubles! There is one puzzle that happened to be part of GOING FORWARD in the game. But it bugged and I was puzzled. I thought I might need to look around for some puzzle piece for the puzzle I'm struggle with. It have a part where it say "Confirm" and "Back" in puzzle game. Click on confirm dozen time, it does nothing. Knowing Silent Hill, puzzle play a big role in Silent Hill games. Walked around, couldn't find it, head to other location where I haven't explored, it got nothing important. I was like "Fuck it" maybe I should go back to that house where the puzzle piece at. I say to myself might I missed something. New problems showed up. It starting crashing the games. 4 or 5 time. I'm too stubborn and I wanna play Silent Hill. I get even more determined! I got frustrated. I decided to youtube it how to complete that chapter. Maybe if I finished the chapter, I might get out of annoying level. I youtube it up, somebody play it and that part where I say "Confirm" and "Back" Option? It worked for that person because he's playing it on Xbox. I was like "Okay, I should go back to that Puzzle." You thought the problem stopped there? You're wrong. Now I went back to that puzzle, it wont let me interact with it!!! Now I can't I processed the game. Reading other people negative reviewss, a lot of people have problems with this game. I knew the game have mix review. Some people say it worked, other have some trouble. This game... is dysfunctional. It shoudn't be on the market. It doesn't sound like the game company have any intention on fixing this game, therefore it shouldn't be on the market. I was exciting, now i feel robbed and it wasted my time. Silent Hill 2 remake look promising, Silent Hill: Homecoming is dumpster fire,"""""""


Please do not buy this game. My computer can run Elden Ring on high. Silent Hill: Homecoming  isn't worth your money or your time. Not even for quarter or time you spend waiting for it to completed download. It not worth it. I took a risk knowing there is bad reviews. You don't need to risk it when someone else already done it.

Alors voilà, j'ai grandi avec Silent Hill: Homecoming et j'avoue, j'y rejoue surtout par nostalgie.
Déjà, l'ambiance du jeu reste vraiment top. La vibe inquiétante, le design des bestioles… tout ça me plonge directement dans les souvenirs. 

Problème, l’optimisation sur PC est clairement à la ramasse. J'ai passé plus de 2h à essayer de le configurer et finalement, j'ai juste l'impression d’avoir plus galéré pour le faire tourner que d'y avoir joué. Les crashs pendant les chargements sont tellement nombreux que ça en devient juste ridicule. À chaque fois que je pensais enfin pouvoir relancer le jeu, bam, un plantage qui m’oblige à recommencer le tout. 

Si vous êtes un.e fan hardcore de la franchise et que vous tenez à l'acheter sur Steam spécifiquement, attendez les soldes, et essayez de trouver un patch, un mod, ou une boisson chaude pour pouvoir y jouer sans trop rager. Je ne recommande pas le jeu en l'état. Là j'arrive à peu près à le faire tourner, mais les crash sont réguliers. 

Update après 7h de jeu : Mon cerveau avait oublié les phases de combat de Silent Hill: Homecoming, et j'avais aussi oublié que le couteau reste la meilleure arme du début à la fin. (Le système de visée des armes à distance n'est pas efficace, et les autres armes de mêlée "lourdes" sont trop lentes pour les ennemis. Spammer avec le couteau permettra d'interrompre la plupart des adversaires). Les QTE marchent une fois sur deux, et le bouton d'esquive ne sert à rien puisqu'on se prend toujours les attaques. Il vaut mieux sortir du mode "combat", et courir "normalement" pour échapper aux attaques ennemis. 

Le problème que j'ai avec ce jeu c'est que je peux voir toutes les idées des dévs qui ont tirés ce jeu dans plein de directions différentes (et parfois des bonnes idées en plus, j'adore vraiment le design des monstres, et l'OST est, une fois encore un putain de banger) - mais malheureusement le produit final ressemble, pour moi, au Tupperware dans le frigo où il faut mélanger tous les restes, et où le résultat final n'est vraiment pas ouf et a un goût bizarre.
Maravilhoso esse Silent Hill Homecoming, só foi injustiçado. Falaram e reclamaram tanto do ângulo de câmera por que era novo na época,  hoje o remaster é a mesma coisa, o mundo da voltas.

Alex Shepherd jest postacią przygłupią, [spoiler]widać to w większości rozmów[/spoiler], twórcy dokładając tu piramidogłowego, odebrali mu jego symbolikę w SH2, radio dostaje pierdolca bez powodu,a jedyne o czym się marzy podczas ładowania czegokolwiek, to żeby komputer to jakoś przetrwał

column8: Epic

The game itself is NOT BAD. If you enjoy the Silent Hill series and just want to experience all parts of it then sure you might like it too. I would say if I could ignore the issues then it would be a solid 6.5/10 game. 

However, for $40 this game is not worth a fraction of the price on Steam. The PC port for this game makes me more nervous about the game crashing than a monster being around the corner. If you try to alt tab out of the game and back in, the game will always crash. But that wasn't a big deal because I just knew not to do that, but if you get random popups from your computer, this will also make it crash. FPS is always at 30, but constantly drops to 1 FPS at random times and every time you click the save icon. Sometimes, when this happens the game just quits itself and you will lose 30 or so minutes of game play. The fighting mechanics arn't the best, and I got soft locked on the 3rd boss because I got pinned to the wall and no matter which way I dodged, it just hit me until I died. Many times I would just need to take a break from the game because I couldn't deal with all the bugs and still enjoy myself. 

The story is not as bad as people have made it out to be, and it did have a twist, although predictable. I liked the connections to the original games, there are many endings to get (although limited choices and not all endings are great) and although I saw many people say it didn't feel like Silent Hill due to there being so many side characters, I don't agree with that. The side characters were only for small sections and didn't really say too much, and the majority of the game play was Alex by himself (I would say that Silent Hill 2 had similar amounts of side characters although they weren't revolved around the main character like Homecoming). 

Overall, if you just want to experience every Silent Hill game, then sure play it and have fun. But if you are looking for a cool game to play and don't like the series enough to be dealing with all of the issues and annoying moments the game carries, then don't waste $40. (unless they finally fix the game or it becomes $5!)

column8:
*** DO NOT BUY IT ON PC ***

This game has been broken since release and will never be fixed, I was also unable to get a refund as I bought it on disk in store but then linked it to my Steam account, bad idea.

My history says I have played 18 hours, but this is only since game time was being recorded. I bought the game on release and never been able to play it all the way through, most of this time is trying to play it after an upgrade, often starting from scratch.

I have experienced all of these bugs on every machine I have tried to play it on, and on Windows XP,. 7, 10 and 11. In the interest of fairness, the only CPUs I have tried to run it on are a Pentium 4, and the rest are AMD (Athlon, AthlonX4, Gen 1 Ryzen 7, Gen 3 Ryzen 5, Gen 5 Ryzen 9).

"Minor" inconveniences :
- keyboard mapping is not persisted between save points
- gamepad mapping is not saved/used in any capacity
- all mappings will often reset themselves without reason or warning
- sound often does not work as expected, or at all
Game breaking bugs:
- there are frequent load screen crashes throughout the game
- I cannot get past the Shepherd house as the loading screen crash is consistent, this is common
- new ones after applying unknownprojects patches, it is still better than unpatched:
  - wire mesh for level visible from certain points in Nightmare
  - Using numpad 6 for straif right in config seems to be ignored (I'm left handed)
  - pushing 1 CPU core to 100% and framerate frequently dropping to ~7FPS for some reason. Running a 5950X and an RTX3060 that plays cyberpunk like butter
This game is still worth playing and I do enjoy it on other platforms, and it has some of the best death scenes ever, DO NOT BUY IT ON PC, look for an Xbox360 or PS3 version if you can.

column8: Nope not for me. Wanted to give this game a fair shake after recently playing Silent Hill 4 but that ain't happening. From what I experienced with the story, it seems very interesting so far so I think that aspect seems good. However the game is just frustrating to play. The combat felt more clunky compared to Silent Hill 4 and some of the enemies are just annoying as all hell to fight. While there are manual save points like in previous games, they are very few and far between. meaning if you die to one of the bullet spongy enemies. then you lose a lot of progress. Plus the game crashes constantly. I did know about this going in, which is why I downloaded a fan patch and while that did help run the game a bit better, it still crashed on me enough times that I just gave up. I'd rather just go watch a story retrospective for this game on YouTube.

[h1][i]★★★★★★★☆☆☆

Данный релиз настолько ничтожен, что во время прохождения мои глаза и сердце заливались кровью. Установка разных патчей способна лишь частично устранить кривизну и никчёмность данного издания. Да и сама игра в целом далека от шедевра, хоть и имеет свои положительные моменты. Хорошо, что в далёкие годы проходил её именно на XBOX 360. Положительный отзыв только потому, что это хоть какой то Silent Hill и дань уважения легендарным предыдущим частям.[/i][/h1]
Um Silent Hill decente, mas um port nojento.

Errores de jugabilidad, de rendimiento, pésima historia en comparación con los juegos anteriores y todo lo que posiblemente ya se ha mencionado; es importante mencionar que es un pésimo port, ya que cuenta con múltiples bugs y ni hablar de la pobre optimización, NO RECOMENDABLE en lo absoluto, la mecanica de combate no llega a encajar del todo, no se siente ni como un juego de acción ni uno de horror, la historia con una trama completamente predecible de inicio a fin, con personajes con poco desarrollo por no decir nulo, se le pudiese quitar el nombre de la franquicia y seguiria siendo un juego simplemente recordado por lo malo que es, sin embargo este es recordado por la decadencia de la franquicia y por ser un terrible juego.

DO NOT BUY IT
Actually Horrible I'll give 5/10

column8: Otrasné ovládanie

Cannot recommend this one, though its engine does support 2160x1440 and supposedly works at my monitors native framerate of 170 the engine still chugs. It was nice to look at when I got it back in 2k9 but it hasn't aged gracefully. It's also very finicky about what hardware it runs on because it does not like come CPU's and some GPU's nor combos of the two that offend its senses. I was surprised I could run it on my new setup at all because of its finicky engine but nice to see once again. I would only recommend you get this on sale and refund it if it doesn't run on your system immediately.
Though if it does run you'll probably see the glaring flaws with this title right away when you get into the game as it immediately starts you off seeing the knife of Pyramid Head, then the first enemy you face is a Nurse, directly after the sirens blare and you're sent into the nightmare.
This was obviously made as a hack job of assets from the earlier games to play fan service to no one. This was my first Silent Hill game so I didn't notice these flaws back when I played it but certainly notice them now.

column8:
[h1] A Hauntingly Beautiful Journey into Madness [/h1]
[h2] Rating: ★★★★★ (5/5) [/h2]



"Silent Hill: Homecoming" is an atmospheric masterpiece that successfully captures the essence of what makes the Silent Hill franchise so compelling. From the moment I stepped into the fog-laden streets of Shepherd's Glen, I was greeted with a chilling sense of nostalgia. The game expertly blends haunting environments with a gripping narrative that kept me engaged until the very last moment.

The graphics are stunning for its time, with disturbing yet beautiful design choices that bring the town’s eerie ambiance to life. The character designs, especially the terrifying creatures, are both inspiring and unsettling. Every monster tells a story, adding layers to the unsettling atmosphere that the series is known for.

The gameplay mechanics are well-balanced, providing a satisfying mix of exploration, combat, and puzzle-solving. The combat system is more fluid than in previous entries, and I found myself enjoying the adrenaline rush of facing off against nightmarish foes. The puzzles are challenging but fair, requiring thought without becoming frustrating.

What truly stands out, however, is the narrative. The story dives deep into themes of guilt, trauma, and the search for redemption. The character of Alex Shepherd is relatable and deeply flawed, and watching his journey unfold was both heartbreaking and captivating.

Additionally, the soundtrack perfectly complements the haunting visuals, drawing players deeper into the experience. Akira Yamaoka's score is as memorable as ever, evoking a sense of dread and urgency throughout the game.

While it might not be everyone's favorite in the series, "Silent Hill: Homecoming" stands as a worthy entry that deserves recognition. Whether you're a long-time fan of the franchise or new to the series, this game provides a thrilling ride that will resonate with those who enjoy a deep, immersive horror experience.

In conclusion, if you're looking for a game that combines psychological horror with an engaging story and atmospheric gameplay, look no further than "Silent Hill: Homecoming." It's a journey that will leave you pondering long after the credits roll.

column8: I would recommend this game to people who enjoy the first Silent Hill movie because they share a lot of similar elements. The game is drastically different than the Team Silent games (except for the monsters and music) but it's not the awful game is it known to be. It's quite enjoyable for what it is but! the only issue is the poor optimization, after every boss you have to lower the resolution to 800x600 to proceed with the game. You basically have to switch resolutions (from 1280x720 to 800x600, the game supports 720p only) if the game crashes on loading screens and always exit the game after a savepoint to save memory and not deal with crashes later on. It's a 6/10 experience for me as a whole.

column8:
If You Want To Experience It As It Was, Prepare For Some Crashes And Unfair QTE (Dog is bugged). Highly Recommended To Play In Mono And Windowed Mode In This Case.

But If You Want To Just Experience The Story With A Functioning Game, There Is A Lovely Patch That  Fixes Many Things.

The Game Itself Is Underrated In My Opinion. The Twist Reveal Was Great, The Gameplay Is Like Early Dark Souls Or God Of War, And The Boss Design Is Amazing.

Easily 8/10 Although The Good Ending Sucks.
