Luckly I got it for a couple of Euros, cause at full price I would be pissed off like a blue-haired weirdo-activist playing Hogwarts Legacy. 

Also I'm playing it on my Steam Deck which seems to run a lot better than Windows, so no glitches or weird crashes. 
Lately wanted to experience again those Silent Hill vibes that I loved when I was a kid, and since I do not recall to have ever played this chapter, thought to give it a chance even if I knew it wasn't one of the most beloved chapters in the series. 

The main problem that I have with this game is with the attitude of the protagonists and how improbable the dialogues unfold, like, I can't really immerse myself into it since no human being would act, respond or approach that kind of situation like the characters in this game ( especially the main character ). I mean, in the first 15 minutes you come back in your hometown, which is completely empty, roads suddenly disrupted, your mom walks into the house completely wet and in state of shock, and you don't ask why the fuck she looks like that and why she's soaked in this greenish wet stuff and dangles in shock with a gun on her lap. And instead of creating some sort of dialogue that would resemble any kind of real human interaction, you simply get out of the house and start stabbing monsters that for no reason are living in your backyard, no line of dialogue or thought about what the heck is going on, nor any kind of facial expression that would show how the protagonist is shocked to find out that his hometown is now hell, a normal Friday in Shepherd's Glen I suppose. 

You do not even have to worry about finding any fancy weapon to fight monsters, 99% of the time you're okay with your knife and smash combos like in Dragon Ball Xenoverse and literally stun and kill whatever you will find on your path, doesn't even matter if there are multiple creatures. 

So in the end you go on just cause you spent some money on it, hoping to find out if there's a finale where you can somehow kill that unsufferable brother of yours, just cause would be fun to ruin the miserable life of the main character as much as the developers tried to ruin yours if you bought it at full price. 

It is worth mentioning the musics and sound effects, those are really good and overall help to immerse a little bit into the situation and the city.

This version doesn't have achievements so thank God I do not have to play it all over again for another five times just cause I have OCDs and need to complete whatever I start. 

4 out of 10

column8:
Wow, even if I wanted to like this game for the amount of backlash it gets.... This is a horrible port. Locked at 30fps. Awful texture glitches, Playing in 2k resolution and all the images that load up (puzzles, etc) get cut off because the upscaling is so poorly done, not to mention it constantly dips below 20fps and I have a pretty high-end pc. If you want to give this game a try, definitely don't play this version. Get a copy for the X360 instead.

*EDIT 7/21/24
Just for fun, (not actually, more like a curiosity) loaded up on my new PC with an RTX 4070TI, 96GB RAM and an Intel i9 12900K and this game is still locked at 30fps at the highest settings, texture glitches are even worse. Unplayable regardless of what kind of PC you're running

column8:
A trama de "Silent Hill: Homecoming" apresenta um novo herói, Alex Shepherd, um soldado ferido em combate que está a caminho de casa, na pequena cidade de Sheperd's Glen. Assombrado por pesadelos que giram ao redor de seu irmão mais novo, Josh, Alex encontra o lugar tomado por uma estranha névoa e sua mãe em estado catatônico. Para tornar a situação ainda mais intrigante para ele, o ex-combatente descobre que o pai desapareceu ao sair em busca de Josh.
Logo Alex passa a ser atormentado por visões aterrorizantes de figuras célebres da franquia, além de outras referências ao passado que só fãs da série irão reconhecer. Tudo piora quando ele se vê explorando a cidade de Silent Hill, que é vizinha de Shepherd's Glen, e começa a desvendar um grave segredo ocultado por sua família a respeito das origens do lugar.

"Silent Hill: Homecoming" é mais ágil, mais intuitivo e mais simples que os anteriores. Tais mudanças, ao menos para certos fãs mais ardorosos, podem ter justamente acabado com o grande charme da franquia, o que não é de todo justo. Embora não seja especialmente inteligente ou tecnicamente corajoso, o jogo ainda preserva qualidades suficientes para intrigar uma boa parcela de seu público-alvo e manter a franquia respirando com dignidade.

column8: Don't buy this if you plan on actually playing it. This game is no bullshit unplayable and I don't understand why it's even on steam. The only way to play this is with Unknownproject's 2.50 patch. It's sad cause I'm a big fan of Silent Hill and while this isn't the best Silent Hill game this is the only one that I can get on PC without using an emulator. I downloaded the patch it's very easy to install there's a bunch of videos on YouTube on how to install it. Anyways I'd give this game a 6/10 and I'm being generous. If you've played any other Silent Hill game this is at the bottom of all of those... I'd still recommend playing it though since it is a Silent Hill game.

-Crash during the loading screen, closing the application altogether.

I know my PC can handle this game just fine, in fact I have a 1080TI graphics card, 16GB ram, I7, etc.
If I cannot get the game to work, at the very least a partial refund should be required. This is beyond disappointing,

column8:
Silent Hill Homecoming, Konami tarafından geliştirilen ve 2008 yılında piyasaya sürülen bir hayatta kalma korku oyunudur. Oyun, Silent Hill serisinin bir parçasıdır ve birinci şahıs bakış açısından oynanır. Oyunun ana karakteri Alex Shepherd'dir, Amerika Birleşik Devletleri Ordusu'ndan emekli olmuş bir askerdir.

Oyunda, Alex'in genç kardeşi Joshua'nın kaybolması sonrası, doğum yeri olan küçük kasaba Shepherd's Glen'e dönmesi konu edilir. Shepherd's Glen kasabasında, Alex hayatında bazı tuhaf olaylar yaşar. Ayrıca Silent Hill kasabasında bir hastanede uyanır ve kardeşini aramak için buradan çıkması gerektiğini anlar. Oyunun amacı, Alex'in kardeşini ararken kasabanın sırlarını keşfetmesidir.

Oynanış açısından, Silent Hill Homecoming diğer Silent Hill oyunlarından farklı değildir. Oyuncular, kasabayı keşfederken, etraftaki nesneleri toplayarak, ipuçlarını birleştirerek ve gizemleri çözerek ilerlerler. Oyunun mekanikleri, oyunun korku ve gerilim unsurlarının etkili olmasını sağlayacak şekilde tasarlanmıştır. Örneğin, oyuncuların karşılaştıkları canavarlarla savaşmaları gerektiğinde, düşmanların korkunç tasarımları ve müzikleri, oyuncuların gerginliğini artırmaktadır.

Silent Hill Homecoming'in grafikleri oldukça iyi seviyededir. Oyunun atmosferi, karanlık ve kasvetli bir atmosfere sahiptir ve oyuncuları gerilimli bir şekilde tutar. Oyun ayrıca, önceki Silent Hill oyunlarından farklı olarak, daha fazla aksiyon odaklıdır. Bu, bazı hayranlar için hoş bir değişiklik olabilirken, diğerleri için serinin önceki oyunlarından daha az korkutucu olduğu hissine neden olabilir.

Genel olarak, Silent Hill Homecoming, oynanışı ve hikayesi ile birçok Silent Hill hayranını memnun etmiştir. Oyunun korku ve gerilim unsurları başarılı bir şekilde kullanılmıştır ve oyuncuların kasabanın sırlarını keşfederken gergin bir atmosfer içinde tutulmalarını sağlamaktadır. Oyun, Silent Hill serisine yeni bir şeyler katmak isteyenler için ideal bir seçim olabilir.
Está Bueno

column8: Incluso con parche instalado sigue crasheando.. una pena por que lo poco que estaba jugando me estaba gustando bastante.

I went into playing Silent Hill Home coming with a heavily optimistic mind. Playing the game of course the combat system is clunky, very clunky, the story is stiff, as in characters feel mechanical, they just don't deliver dialogue, or show enough personality to even appear human. It's almost like a robot wrote the story. 
The monsters are stupid looking, why does everything have a 'sex-pun' attached to it? It's ridiculous, and you have no idea how funny and stupid it is to be running from a butt-naked monster that looks like they have a head coming out of their crouch, I'm not joking, that's what you'll be fighting. Devs, that's not scary, that's just silly!

Here's a tip: you can spam the knife, I don't even use the shotgun with the same results as going in with a knife, I can take down over 8 feet tall monster bosses in this game...With just  a simple knife in a couple seconds. Even a gun is ineffective against the bullet sponge enemies that a knife can take down quickly. It's because of the flawed combat system, the faster you swing, the more time you have to inflect damage, rendering using useless.

 It's like that with Homecoming, and it's insanely immersion breaking, and kills the fear factor.

The locations do have this creepy factor, yes, but once you recognize that everything you encounter is so weak, you can beat them with a butter knife, the fear of the unknown completely disappears, and traversal just becomes a chore.

But that's not what broke the camel's back. What broke the camel's back was the game's mediocre endings in the game. You'll make seemingly trivial choices, and receive an outcome you didn't want, which makes playing the entire game seem fruitless, and pointless. You played this game for 15 hours, not realizing that the choice you made doomed you to an ending outcome you wish you can take back, but can't without playing the entire crappy game from the start. Trust me when I say you will cringe at the thought of having to sit through playing this game trying to get 'the ending you want' all over again, it feels like torture.
And you should know, the main character's love interest you finally rescue whenever you do manage to get the 'good ending' you don't kiss at the end, or nothing, it's wooden, and fruitless, you get nothing in return, and you'll waste your time trying to get it, it's just not worth it. Just so you know. Just look up each endings on youtube.
The puzzles were insanely hard with a bunch of moon logic thrown in, and you will find yourself using wiki to find out the solution, just so you can see how everything ends. 

The game has no replay value, regardless whether you're wearing a different outfit or not, because the experience is unbearably linear, the story is disjointed and uninspired, the endings are unfruitful, leaving you feel like you wasted your time trying to get them, and the maze-like go here, go there's will have you yawning as you battle weak monsters that I honestly found myself just running past instead of fighting.

Don't get this game, even if it's just 10 bucks, it is one of the worst Silent Hill games I ever played, next to The Room, and don't get me started on that one. Woo wee was this game a stinker! It's a little charming when you play it for the very first time, but sucks at the end once you realize the game just never did take itself as seriously as you'd like.

It's because of the flawed combat system, the faster you swing, the more time you have to inflect damage, rendering using useless.

 It's like that with Homecoming, and it's insanely immersion breaking, and kills the fear factor.

The locations do have this creepy factor, yes, but once you recognize that everything you encounter is so weak, you can beat them with a butter knife, the fear of the unknown completely disappears, and traversal just becomes a chore.

But that's not what broke the camel's back. What broke the camel's back was the game's mediocre endings in the game. You'll make seemingly trivial choices, and receive an outcome you didn't want, which makes playing the entire game seem fruitless, and pointless. You played this game for 15 hours, not realizing that the choice you made doomed you to an ending outcome you wish you can take back, but can't without playing the entire crappy game from the start. Trust me when I say you will cringe at the thought of having to sit through playing this game trying to get 'the ending you want' all over again, it feels like torture.
And you should know, the main character's love interest you finally rescue whenever you do manage to get the 'good ending' you don't kiss at the end, or nothing, it's wooden, and fruitless, you get nothing in return, and you'll waste your time trying to get it, it's just not worth it. Just so you know. Just look up each endings on youtube.
The puzzles were insanely hard with a bunch of moon logic thrown in, and you will find yourself using wiki to find out the solution, just so you can see how everything ends. 

The game has no replay value, regardless whether you're wearing a different outfit or not, because the experience is unbearably linear, the story is disjointed and uninspired, the endings are unfruitful, leaving you feel like you wasted your time trying to get them, and the maze-like go here, go there's will have you yawning as you battle weak monsters that I honestly found myself just running past instead of fighting.

Don't get this game, even if it's just 10 bucks, it is one of the worst Silent Hill games I ever played, next to The Room, and don't get me started on that one. Woo wee was this game a stinker! It's a little charming when you play it for the very first time, but sucks at the end once you realize the game just never did take itself as seriously as you'd like.

column8: Вполне не плохая игра на один раз можно пройди
uff clasico juego0 que no defrauda :D

He escuchado y leído muy malas críticas del juego, en especial por los bugs. Así que decidí descargar el juego e instalar los parches que arreglaban dichos bugs. Pude descargar el juego y al día siguiente, justo sufrí un corte total de internet en todo el vecindario, así que ya no pude instalar los parches. Pero decidí comenzarlo a jugar de todas maneras. Y la verdad que, fuera de que el juego me funcionaba a 30 FPS y que al hacer ALT+TAB y que al volver al juego, el mismo se crashee y cierre, no encontré grandes bugs que hagan "injugable" a este maravilloso título de survival horror. Casi una semana después pude instalar el parche y si bien me arregla los fps (no del todo porque los puse en 144 pero sin embargo funciona en 60), hay cosas que quita de antes, como por ejemplo una serie de QTE en momentos donde algunos enemigos te agarran, el QTE que era simplemente hacer click muy rápido del ratón para evitar una insta-kill, desaparecen, por lo que hace el juego un poco más fácil de lo que intentaba ser. Aunque por lo visto, la mayoría de la gente odia los QTE pero yo la verdad sí los prefiero excepto cuando te agarran desprevenido en juegos como Resident Evil 3(remake), 5 o 6 en medio de cinemáticas.
Fuera de bugs y parches. El juego es fantástico. No tiene los mejores gráficos como para el 2008 pero son bastante amigables y buenos. La historia te permite sumergirte muy bien en el ambiente de Silent Hill y Sheperd's Glen (un pueblo vecino), en un principio no entendemos nada pero a medida que avanza la trama, vamos atando los cabos sueltos y se nos va complicando la situación cada vez más. El sistema de combates es dentro de todo sencillo. Solo hay dos botones diferentes para golpear, uno para esquivar y otro para encender o apagar el modo "en guardia" (en lo personal me gustaría que haya que mantener apretado el botón de "en guardia" ya que a veces al intentar apagarlo para hacer una huída rápida al estar rodeado de enemigos, nos ponemos nerviosos y lo apretamos más de una vez y al final no sabemos si ya podemos correr o no). Si bien, luego de jugar casi 15 horas, aún no domino a la perfección el esquive, no es una metodología súper complicada de combate. (Mi reseña marca que jugué 9 horas pero Steam no me está considerando las horas que he jugado durante toda la semana sin internet, así que le calculo que serán entre 13 y 16 tranquilamente)
Por otro lado, el diseño de bosses es fantástico. En lo personal, el segundo boss [spoiler](Scarlet)[/spoiler] me ha costado muchísimo, es bastante complicado de esquivar, y sobre todo para alguien que aún no ha dominado del todo el sistema de combate. Pero ese boss en particular me ha tocado mucho. No quiero dar spoilers pero solo diré que desde chico, ver vivir y/o animarse a [spoiler]muñecos o maniquíes[/spoiler] ha sido una de mis mayores pesadillas, así que sí, ese boss me hizo sufrir psicológicamente. También tiene puzzles bastante sencillos pero que sí te harán pensar un rato. Por ejemplo había un rompecabezas sencillo en la [spoiler]casa del protagonista para poder abrir un cajón[/spoiler], pero me hice un lío mental y estuve casi dos horas para resolverlo.
Ya estoy por finalizar el juego, me encuentro en la última parte. Decidí jugarlo directamente en dificultad alta a pesar de ser la primera vez porque a veces soy salvaje en ese sentido. Al principio cuesta, pero a medida que vamos encontrando mejores armas y mejorando nuestra curva de aprendizaje para los combates y tomando conocimiento de los mounstros, todo mejora. Eso sí, para armas a distancia, la munición no es que precisamente sobre. Muy eventualmente llegamos a un punto en el que no se nos permite recoger más munición, pero no me ha pasado más que un par de veces. Cada mounstro tiene su propia técnica para matar, y lo bueno (o malo dependiendo el punto de vista) es que los tips para hacerlo sólo aparecen durante pantallas de carga y en especial para los bosses, en la pantalla de carga una vez que nos han matado a nosotros y se está cargando de nuevo para volver al ataque.
Por otro lado, para los speedrunners, las cinemáticas se pueden saltear (excepto algunas excepciones donde hay diálogo y opciones de diálogo para seguir con la trama). Y por último pero no por ello menos importante. El juego sí que nos hace dar varios julepes (sustos). En lo personal no soy tan fan del survival horror, sino más bien prefiero el terror psicológico, onda outlast, amnesia, entre otros donde para sobrevivir solo podemos correr y escondernos. El hecho que un juego de terror te dé las posibilidades de matar a tus enemigos, le disminuye un poco la sensación de horror para mi gusto. Me gusta mucho más sentirme indefenso.
Lo negativo que tengo es el soundtrack. La verdad no es una banda sonora memorable, excepto tal vez la canción del menú principal y la canción de los créditos finales. Pero bueno, eso es un tema totalmente subjetivo. Pero por lo general siempre tengo presente las bandas sonoras de los juegos de terror. Esta entrega de Silent Hill es una excepción a la regla lamentablemente.

A la espera de la salida de Silent Hill 2 remake, terminaré este juego y luego jugaré Silent Hill The Room que se encuentra en la otra plataforma de juegos. Es una lástima que solo estén disponibles (al menos en tiendas oficiales) solo Silent Hill Homecoming (creo que es la sexta entrega) y The Room (creo que es la cuarta) para PC, ya que es una de las sagas de survival horror más alabadas de todos los tiempos.
100% recomendado, y si quieres mejorar la experiencia de juego, instala los parches que no son tan complejos de instalar. Van a mejorar algunas cosas como el brillo y la luz ambiente, además de los FPS.

For most of the time the game was working for me fine. It's a shame that's the only Silent Hill game on Steam, because if someone would like to start their journey with SH franchise and this is the first game they reach for, then I'm sure they wouldn't be staying with it for long time. Game didn't crash or lag much for me, FPS isn't brilliant but it's a game from 2009 after all... 
What I had the problem with is how unprepared the player is most of the time during the gameplay. The game doesn't help, prepare or even warn us that some bigger battle is coming. You kind of wander around pointlessly, hoping not to get killed. When you actually get killed and would like to go back a few saves - you can't. Only the most recent save is the most important for the game, so if the game has autosaved once you entered the area before a big battle, you're basically fcked if you haven't prepared yourself. 
The story isn't worth playing, there's nothing really that can defend this game. It's not worth playing in my opinion, however it isn't the worst game in the world, so if you're on a quest to play every single Silent Hill game, then I suppose it's playable but wouldn't recommend it in general.

column8:
[h1] Nunca había jugado algo semejante; lo he disfrutado como una niña. [/h1]

[b] Advertencia: el juego está lleno de problemas críticos y de bugs graves que de no ser solucionados o de no estar prevenido de ellos, pueden arruinar por completo la experiencia. [/b]

Debo decirlo, este juego está lleno de problemas varios de todo tipo, algunos menos serios, y otros que lo son tanto, que te pueden estropear totalmente la partida; desde fallos fácilmente solucionables, como una mala configuración de sonido, hasta crasheos al minimizar el juego o en las pantallas de carga que te pueden hacer perder el progreso y obligarte a volver a empezar desde el último punto de guardado manual.

Sin embargo, pese a todo esto, solventé lo que era resoluble (en la comunidad hay multitud de guías de como optimizar el juego), y he de confesar que me ha encantado poder formar parte de la experiencia [i]Silent Hill[/i], aun si es desde uno de los juegos menos queridos de la franquicia. 

Ha sido de lo más interesante, pues si bien no he jugado a otras entregas y solo las he visto en videos, las sensaciones que me transmite el juego son las mismas, una especie de atmósfera inefable envuelve al juego que me ha cautivado y que ha hecho que me merezca la pena hasta el último de los sinsudores que me han causado los bugs.

Asimismo, el precio es desproporcionado, especialmente al tener en cuenta la calidad del juego, así que si tienes intención de adquirirlo te invitaría a hacerlo de rebajas, lo que hará que te sientas más satisfecha con el producto que vas a encontrar cuando lo juegues.

Resumiendo: incluso con todos sus errores y desaciertos lo recomiendo, pues es la única manera actualmente de sentir en primera persona el efecto [i]Silent Hill[/i] desde Steam y, si tienes la paciencia de tolerar sus múltiples dificultades y disfrutas el terror y el misterio, es posible que lo disfrutes tanto como lo he hecho yo.

column8:
Look, I can't completely fault the game, but it just isn't that scary compared to the first 4 games, plus the port is buggy as hell. Streamers beware: if you want to stream this game (as I have been) it will give you problems if you need to alt-tab, and getting your broadcast software to even capture the game is a nightmare. I figured it out, with some difficulty, but most of the time it didn't want to capture it at all. 
Overall, not completely terrible, but as a SH fan I can't totally recommend it either.

column8:
Se você tem amor ao seu dinheiro, NÃO compre essa bomba. Se um dia a Konami quiser consertar essa versão podre de PC, tente pegar de graça, porque gastar com esse jogo é o maior desperdício de dinheiro que você terá na vida, mas sabemos que essa empresa de merda não faz nada com as franquias consagradas dela além de matá-las então fique longe desse jogo pro seu próprio bem.

A história em si é OK, a gameplay é como se fosse um RE4 mal feito, as mecânicas de combate e principalmente esquiva são uma porcaria, o Alex é extremamente lerdo na hora de desviar de golpes. 
A ambientação do jogo é até bacana, talvez o único ponto positivo desse jogo horrendo. 

Só joguei esse lixo porque estava maratonando os jogos da franquia e acabei me deparando com essa atrocidade que chamam de jogo. Odiei cada segundo jogando isso daqui e quando terminei eu não quis nem saber de pegar outros colecionáveis, se um dia eu voltar a jogar isso é porque estou sendo pago, porque todo mundo tem limites, até pra se torturar.

Caso você não consiga pegar esse jogo de graça, não vale nem a pena gastar 1 real nele, guarde pra comprar um lanche ou dê uma força pra empresas que realmente se importam com os jogadores. 

Não sei nem como a Konami acordou pra vida e anunciou 3 Silent Hills em 2022, talvez seja um milagre, mas consertar esse port aqui? Nem espere deitado, sentado vai cansar e se esperar é capaz de você morrer e ela não ajeitar essa bizarrice...

Do not waste your money on this game. I love the Silent Hill franchise, but this game is a poorly made port to the PC. If you can get it to work with a controller you've pulled off some kind of miracle. The controls with keyboard and mouse are unresponsive making you click two or three times to get the desired action. The fight mechanics are broken and your character moves like molasses on a cold January morning in Green Bay.  As I said before: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS GAME!

column8:
Amazing game, awful port. All the negative reviews about this game talking about bugs are not exaggerating. This is easily the most buggy game I have on Steam. In order to look at your map you have to play at 720p because that UI wasn't rendered properly at higher resolutions. There's also audio bugs where the dialogue and some sound effects will only come out of the right or left side of the headphones but then most audio comes out of both.

That being said, the actual game is amazing. The story is good, the environments are creepy, and the monsters look really cool. The combat is pretty clunky but out of the Silent Hill games it's the best combat. In terms of scariness I'd say it's mostly scary in the beginning, and then it gradually has more action segments after the first boss fight. However, the story is still engaging and it's overall pretty fun.

If you're willing to tolerate the bugs then this game is pretty good, but definitely wait for a sale because this is not worth $40.

column8:
I really wish there was an "indifferent" option here but either way, GOSH I CAN'T BELIEVE HOW BAD THIS PORT IS. 

As a big fan of the Silent Hill series I really wanted to give this game a shot. The fact that it wasn't made by Team Silent is very visible, it clearly "misses something" - but it's not what made me dislike the game.

The controls are weird and they also happen to not work during significant parts of the game - mostly during quick time events. It makes the battle with the third boss absolutely unbeatable as not smashing the buttons = instant kill. I don't know, this is where I finally gave up. Fuck you Asphyxia.

The combat isn't great either, it took me half of the game to get used to it (and to realise that I can DODGE the attacks). And of course the constant crashes, oh the true horror.

Story-wise the game's not bad. It's not OG Silent Hill good but good enough to get me invested. I wasn't a big fan of the location design though. I think the only one that I liked was the "Hell Descent" one, it really gave me the creeps. The fight with the boss that appears in that section was also my favourite - Scarlet is the best designed monster in Homecoming imo, the battle with her sure is hard but satysfying. 

If it comes to other monsters, their designs are okay-ish, don't have any special thoughts about them apart from them being hella annoying to fight. [spoiler]And let's not talk about Pyramid Head being in the game, I don't have the patience for this one lmao.[/spoiler]

To sum up, the game is not as bad as I thought it'll be but the port absolutely ruins the whole experience. I just hope it'll get fixed someday. Or, in case they plan to put the other SH games on Steam, I pray they won't ruin them as much this one ):

The fight with the boss that appears in that section was also my favourite - Scarlet is the best designed monster in Homecoming imo, the battle with her sure is hard but satysfying. 

If it comes to other monsters, their designs are okay-ish, don't have any special thoughts about them apart from them being hella annoying to fight. [spoiler]And let's not talk about Pyramid Head being in the game, I don't have the patience for this one lmao.[/spoiler]

To sum up, the game is not as bad as I thought it'll be but the port absolutely ruins the whole experience. I just hope it'll get fixed someday. Or, in case they plan to put the other SH games on Steam, I pray they won't ruin them as much this one ):

[h1]Silent Hill Homecoming: „Dobrý alebo špatný pc port?“[/h1]

V [b]SHH[/b] sa oboznamujeme s [b]Alexom Sheperdom[/b], ktorý sa vrátil do svojho rodného mesta, aby vyšetril záhadné zmiznutie jeho brata. Ako poznáme [b]Silent Hill[/b], tak i tu budete čeliť klasickými hmlistými ulicami [b]Shepherd's Glenu[/b]. A ešte k tomu, ukážu sa tu aj záhadne a typické [b]Silent Hill príšery[/b]. Ale ak máme ísť k veci, tak to rýchlo pôjde dole vodou. [b]SHH[/b] nie je až tak špatný titul, ale má svoje otravné chyby. Grafika je fajn na tu dobu, ale [b]uzamknutie 30 fps[/b] je hrozné. Taktiež, keď hráte na sluchadlách, hlasy určitých postáv sa prejavujú na opačnej strane sluchadla ako napr. [b]Alex[/b] stojí na pravej strane a hlas sa ozýva z ľavého sluchádla. Hratelnosť je pomerne zložitá ale dá sa na to zvyknúť. Atmosféra je tiež celkom na chuja, pretože nejde o horor ale skôr akciu. Dokonca som hru ani nedohral, pretože ma po chvíle [b]prestala baviť[/b]. 

[h1]CELKOVÉ HODNOTENIE:[/h1]

[b]KLADY:[/b]
[b]+[/b] Dej
[b]+[/b] Grafika
[b]+[/b] Rôzne príšery
[b]+[/b] Rozmanité lokácie
[b]+[/b] Hudba

[b]ZÁPORY:[/b]
[b]-[/b] Uzamknutie 30 fps
[b]-[/b] Hlasy postav sa ozývajú z opačnej strany sluchadla
[b]-[/b] Pomerne zložitá hratelnosť
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/upsilonsk][b]-[/b][/url] Atmosféra je skôr akčnejšia ako hororová 

SHH je len špatný port na pc. Je mi tohto titulu aj ľúto ale čo sa da robiť. Ak by ste chceli uzamknuté FPS zvýšiť odporúčame si pozrieť návod ako ich zväčšiť inak si hru neužijete.  
[h1]Bohužiaľ, titulu dávam [b]42%[/b][/h1]
[b]Ⓒ ✏ Recenziu vytvoril [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/43162347/]kurátor - rovyx[/url][/b]
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/upsilonsk]＞ Kurátorská stránka ＜[/url][/b]

column8:
The game itself is fine, the issue is the *port* to the computer. It crashed extremely often, caused strange bugs while playing (for instance, I had to quit out and restart because of a glitch where it wouldn't read my mouse clicks when having to do a frantic tap to get out of a grapple, which I realized after I died to the thing 4 times and it became clear it was not gamer error), and because of the sparse saves in the game itself, finishing it became a slog. If it ran correctly, the save areas would be perfectly spaced out, but when the thing shuts itself off in the middle of a load screen, it becomes a problem. I was still able to beat the game, but the crashes and glitches easily added another 3-4 hours to it in repeating parts of levels, having to restart because of glitched out fights, and just straight up closing on me if I ever clicked out of it for any reason.

If those issues get fixed, then it would get a thumbs up, because the game itself isn't bad. The story is a little weak, but the actual fighting mechanics (especially melee) are pretty fluid, the voice acting is great, and the creature and boss designs are pretty darn cool. This port is just *awful* and quickly overshadows the good. It sorely needs some patches. Buy it on sale if you're wanting to play at some point, hopefully they'll patch it so it's playable without all the frustration.

column8:
Don't buy this game - this is a horrible port which additionally crashes all the time. Tried to give it a go, but, honestly, it is not worth it. Just requested a refund, the game is not worth a single penny.
The story could be interesting if you were allowed to enjoy it properly, but constant crashes make it just frustrating. Gameplay is pretty bad, combat out-of-sync, saves system random and annoying (save points are scarcely scattered so with all the crashes you can go from a big chunk of one chapter to a solid chunk of another and when you have a crash, you need to replay 20-30 minutes). No option to skip cut-scenes. Music weirdly stopping sometimes or playing from one speaker only. 
Avoid!

WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING

I must warn any potential buyers before this review that this game "as bought" here on Steam is busted and broken and a crashfest. Loading times are completely unreal and sometimes the game just freezes up for no reason for about 30 seconds.

Also get this... all the voices will come out of one side of the speaker so dont expect to use headphones.  They say there are fixes for this but I have not found a working one.  This is my warning to all potential buyers.
DISCLAIMER: This review is of it vanilla from Steam. No patch.  I hear the patch improves most all my complaints.  Besides, I truly enjoyed the core game.


NOW ON TO THE REVIEW
This is my first ever Silent Hill game.  Right off the bat Ill tell ya, I can see why the franchise so loved and from what Ive heard this is one of the worst! lol

The combat system while clunky actually works very well if you dodge at the right moment but keep in mind, sometimes the game just doesnt take your input.  You press dodge and the game says "nope".  WACK! Every single freaking time.

I pushed through and I found the game actually pretty darn good!  I enjoyed the combat after a while and the one dimensional characters kinda grew on me after a while.  It seems to be a rare moment of mediocrity actually not being so mediocre.  It helps if you go in with low or no expectations and get it on sale...

I loved the monster designs and found them unique and different than anything else Ive really seen.  They really mastered that body horror that is very sexual and fruedian.  All the puzzles are nearly an afterthought with all the answers usually close nearby.

I guess I just really enjoyed it because I really wanted to play a Silent Hill game.  I have Silent Hill 4 on GOG that I will be attending to next.  All in all, I would recommend this to someone who is up for some punishment which kinda fits the motive of the game.  I pretty much feel the game is cursed.  Had to kill the final boss three times to see the end because power went out each time.  On top of the 20+ crashes I had.  Was it worth it?  You know, I dont know.  I enjoyed it but maybe it was my mind made up before I even played it.  

Anyway, take it how you will.  7/10

column8: Silent Hill Homecoming é um jogo bom, muitos falam mal, mas pra mim é bom, a jogabilidade é fluida e gostosa, os monstros são criativos e diferentes, o mapa é bem feito, os gráficos são bonitos de acordo com a época, joguei muito na minha infância, porém não o recomendo para o pc, pq trava sempre nos mesmos pontos e fica minutos parados, as vezes cai o fps e a gente morre em cenas de clicktime adventure, fora que não têm conquista nenhuma e isso é quase padrão nos games da Steam.

Pros: 

•Horrific monsters

•Great soundtrack

•Decent story

Cons: 

•Freezes/Crashes (PC Steam Version)

•Not scary

•Poor combat

Conclusion:

Not as good as the first 4 games but still has a fairly decent story and plenty of morbid delights to enjoy. It’s a pity it made the same mistake as other horror games and focus more on action (Resident Evil), or even introduce co-op (Dead Space). The bugs are terrible too. I lost count how many times it freezed or crashed. Nevertheless, if you can tolerate the flaws and love survival horror, Silent Hill: Homecoming is worth playing.

column8:
Silent Hill: Homecoming — мультиплатформенная компьютерная игра в жанрах survival horror и приключенческого боевика, разработанная американской компанией Double Helix Games и изданная Konami. Представляет собой шестую часть серии Silent Hill. 
Ну что ж , пора сказать пару слов об переосмыслении серии в целом ... Игра необычная и совсем не страшная, атмосферная только из за музыки Акиры Ямаоки и всё .... Головоломок мало, экшена много и киноклише для фанатов фильма Сайлент Хилл , проходиться нудно и тупой отстрел врагов и неудобная боевая система работающая через одно место ... кхмм - 
Вердикт туманно и попахивает гавнец.... Но пропустить её не стоит , один раз пройти и удалить её нахрен )) По первым впечатлениям , ну для 2008 года она была крута в своё 
время ^_^ Если хотите её оценить визуально , то моё прохождение тут :
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLcKo67iptNtwroBAU3lOg3CpnxItEKUIS
А так среднячок - для фанатов Сайлент Хилла ... Новые игроки увыыы пройдут мимо
С Вами был Казоку, до новых встреч дамы и господа!!!
Aún con el parche de audio y de FPS el sonido sigue siendo malo, las caídas de FPS son brutales y en general el juego va terrible. Es una completa estafa este port.

column8: This game isn't worthy of being sold for money in its current state. It's a shameful scam. Even the PS3 version has obvious bugs. Although the unofficial patch 1.7 fixes a lot, the map is still broken. Yes, it's playable, somewhat, but is it worth it? Not really. You're probably better off with "alternative software", as nowadays they can upscale to 4K and unlock 60 FPS; It's what the patch aims to do, and it does, but it's still less than ideal. There's still no good way about SHV in 2022. The saddest thing is, again, it never worked correctly on any platform even back then.

column8:
Quase não tem bug kkkkkkkkkkkkkk 
Mas o jogo é daora

Luego de completar el juego puedo dar mi opinión.

Para empezar debo decir que el estado de este port es HORRIBLE, muuuy mal optimizado, el sonido funciona re mal, tiene muchos bugs, fallos gráficos y crasheos, también cuando quieres jugar con mando de Xbox o Playstation no te da la opción de usar sus botones (te salen números de colores) por lo cual es medio raro a la hora de interactuar en los comentarios donde te dan a elegir diferentes caminos de la historia, pero bueno, luego te acostumbras. 

Para evitar los bugs y demás tuve que utilizar como 4 o 5 parches de la comunidad que mas o menos lo mejoraron y terminó siendo jugable. Es una pena que sea así pero bueno, gracias a la comunidad es que podemos disfrutar de este gran juego.

Ahora mi opinión sobre el juego en si es: 
*La Historia: la historia es un 10/10, con varios finales diferentes que puedes elegir, toca temas muy serios y que puede que te sientas identificado con ellos (como en mi caso), la historia tiene algunos giros que te dejan re loco y alucinando, es imposible no reaccionar con cada susto, escena, o cosa que pasa en el juego porque está muy bien hecho eso, la historia es súper atrapante y ninguna parte se te hace tediosa o aburrida, al contrario, yo intenté disfrutar cada segundo del juego y tratando explorar cada rincón pero la historia me atrapaba muchísimo y cuando quería ver tenia 4 o 5 horas seguidas jugando.  Como todo Silent Hill en este ámbito es un 10, salen de la típica historia de horror y te entregan un guion excelente! 

Banda Sonora: La música es por mucho lo mejor del juego, intenté escuchar cada canción y sonido hasta el final porque la verdad que es gooood esa banda sonora, al igual que todos los Silent Hill. Hasta terminé creando una lista de reproducción en Spotify con todas sus canciones porque me encantaron. En mi opinión todos los SH tienen un 10 en banda sonora, es música de mi estilo y ojalá mas juegos tuvieran música como la de los SH. 

Jugabilidad: Creo que es la parte floja del juego, el combate es muy tosco y las peleas son tocar el boton de atacar muchas veces y listo, esquivar cuesta muchisimo y casi siempre esquivas y te agarran igual así que es medio al pedo. Lo que sí está muy bien es tener varias armas (como máximo 6) a las cuales podes mejorar pero bue, importa poco, casi siempre vas a melé para ahorrar balas. 

Enemigos: tiene muchos enemigos distintos y todos son brutales, los diseños son ultra turbios y te dan miedo. Los jefes ni hablar, son una joyita. 

Para concluir me ha encantado el juego, lo disfruté muchísimo y quiero seguir jugando el resto de la saga. Para quienes no lo hayan jugado se los recomiendo un montón! Usen los parches de la comunidad para que sea mas jugable y listo, a disfrutarlo! :)

The game crashes to much. I'm tired of games running poorly and TRYING to find fix's for it. Even if it did run smoothly, it's still a frustrating mess. The combat is mostly melee, and terribly clunky. The enemies can block your firearms (IF you can get ammo for it), and the loading is horrendous. What a waste. I LIKED having a choice in previous Silent Hill games as to HOW I can approach a situation. This game makes you melee or run, taking the fun out of it.

Rezalet bir pc portu. Ekran tazeleme sınırını ne kadar arttırırsanız arttırın 30 fps oynanıyor. Çoğu tuş çalışmıyor ve ekranda nerede hangi tuşa basacağınıza dair çıkan göstergelerde garip bir sembol var ve sürekli bunu gösteriyor. Sesler bozuk bazı ses efektleri sadece sağ kulaklıktan geliyor (karakterin yürüme efekti gibi). Ayrıca bir ses efektinin sürekli çıktığı bir odadan çok uzaklaşsanız dahi yanınızdaymış gibi ses gelmeye devam ediyor (herhangi bir azalma olmadan) başka bir odaya geçince tak diye gidiyor. Saldırma tuşu oyunun keyfine göre çalışıyor. Karşıma çıkan düşmana vurabilmek için birkaç kez onun bana vurması gerekti. Oyunun tüm bu sıkıntılarını düzelten bir yama varmış onu kurup deneyeceğim ama bu hali ile kesinlikle oynanmaz. Verdiğim paraya değil hayatımdan çalınan yarım saatime üzüldüm. Ayrıca ilk kapının şifresini bulabilmek için ne kadar çabalasam da bulamadım. Tam çözümü açtığımda yerinde var olması gereken bir kağıt parçasının olmadığını fark ettim :)

column8: Not bad, not bad!

L'unique Silent Hill disponible sur steam et de loin le pire jeu de la saga auquel j'ai pu joué.
Pourquoi ? Car ce portage sur pc est une arnaque et je pèse mes mots.
Entre :
-les crashs intempestifs (et vu le peu de points de sauvegarde du jeu, vous allez rager plus d'une fois)
-les sauvegardes bugées (allo le jeu qui me ramène à une cinématique précédente au lieu du mon save point ?)
- un gameplay vraiment mauvais et injuste renforcé par un jeu à la manette presque aléatoire...(les assignations de touches qui bugent dans les qte...)
- le jeu qui rame et bloqué à 30 fps, la map/objets tronquées en 1080p

C'est simple, on dirait que le jeu fait tout pour vous empêcher de jouer...alors autant passer son chemin.

column8:
寂静岭归乡这部作品被交给了美国的制作组Double Helix制作。角色的造型、场景很大程度上沿用了寂静岭电影版的设定，取消了打倒怪物后必须再踩一脚才死的设定，增加了连锁攻击。在人物塑造上，打破了“主角是普通人”的传统，虽然阿历克斯确实是普通人，却能流畅做出前后、左右滚翻，闪避反击等动作，和在某些情况下攀爬比自己高的平台等等。

科乐美以“本作品不适合日本市场”的原因，取消了在日本的发售， 官网中也没有归乡的位置。 因此在老派玩家间很多人认为归乡是外传，拒绝认为它是正统作品，而同时推出的资料集（欧洲官网的Alex Diary.pdf）也是不值得参考的。而且很多地方照搬寂静岭2、3，缺乏原创性。本作在众多媒体中的评价偏低，通常在寂静岭系列的倒数第2、3位。

本作比较成功的一点就是剧情和人物设计的巧妙：

男主阿历克斯一心寻找弟弟约书亚的踪迹，历经磨难，不断逼近真相，最终找回记忆，却发现实际是自己误杀了弟弟，而正是此次事件强烈刺激了阿历克斯的精神，造成他罹患精神分裂症，篡改了自己的记忆来逃避现实。

所以，“归乡”根本就不存在，他从未离开过家乡去参军和经历战争，而是一直呆在精神病医院被强迫治疗，这种故事和人物设定，相当精彩和具有黑色幽默，有莱昂纳多的电影《禁闭岛》的影子。

当阿历克斯真正第一次与父亲面对面，得到了关于自己的部分骇人真相，这种残酷性，隔着屏幕我都能深深感觉到，不得不说，这是游戏对故事和人物塑造的巨大成功。

除了关于男主经历的秘密，游戏解密的另一条主线，就是阿历克斯揭开了关于牧羊人溪谷小镇“四大家族”的残酷秘密和骇人行径，这里就不剧透了。

这些故事背景和情节设计虽然极具张力，但一些重要逻辑性细节其实是经不起认真推敲的，毕竟游戏设计是以服务游戏性为主，这个完全可以理解。

游戏一共设计了多达6个不同结局：

完美结局：阿历克斯在战胜了内心的恐惧以后，与青梅竹马的艾尔一起离开了牧羊人溪谷小镇，去开启新生活。

从阿历克斯的经历来看（从小一直被父母冷落、虐待，不幸造成弟弟的死亡，而后罹患精神分裂，甚至被迫有“弑母”情节），可以说是寂静岭历代主角里面最悲惨的一位，这样的结局，我觉得才对得起这样颠沛流离、历经磨难的灵魂。

溺水结局：阿历克斯在家里被自己的父亲用浴缸溺毙，成为祭品，而通过父亲的说话可以得知，弟弟约书亚则是活了下来。

从整个故事背景来看，这个结局其实才是最黑暗的，这意味着牧羊人溪谷小镇的阴暗面和疯狂得以继续存在下去。

三角头结局：阿历克斯内心的邪恶抉择，最终让他彻底蜕变成了“三角头”怪物，这也代表了阿历克斯的内心彻底堕入了黑暗。

UFO结局：阿历克斯和艾尔被突然降临空中的UFO吸走，而威勒副警长也活了下来。

精神病院结局：阿历克斯在游戏过程中的选择仍然是极度不愿意面对现实，所以结局就是他仍是精神病人，实际仍在精神病院的手术室内接受残酷治疗，之前的一切经历都不过是他自己一厢情愿的幻想。

隐藏结局：阿历克斯在约书亚的房间发现约书亚仍然活着，发出一声惊叹。约书亚为阿历克斯照了一张“拍立得”，相片里的阿历克斯显然是个“精神病人”…这个结局蛮有希区柯克的风格。

这些截然不同的结局设计，强调了“因”与“果”之间的关系，你内心愿不愿意面对现实，愿不愿意作出改变的努力，作出“善”还是“恶”的决定，会让命运之路开始分叉，最结出截然不同的命运果实。

对人类个体心理创伤、潜意识世界和心灵生活的复杂性、冲突性、丰富性的微妙描绘和表现，一直是寂静岭系列的拿手好戏和永恒主题，也是寂静岭系列最大的价值所在，这种高段位的主题和表现力，可以毫不吝惜地讲，让寂静岭系列从艺术成就上要远高于一般的游戏作品。

人的信仰、勇气、自我反省、抉择与努力，可以决定自己的命运，人并非完全被命运无端摆弄之物，迷雾之中的心灵冒险背后这一核心主题，极富哲思，也相当迷人。

寂静岭归乡主要的问题在于差劲的优化、过于强调动作体验破坏了游戏的恐怖氛围，bug多。这个即使打齐了补丁还是有几率崩溃的，属于比较恶性的bug一类。

column8: O jogo em si é excelente o que atrapalha totalmente é o port porco dessa versão de PC. O jogo crasha em diversos momentos, loads demorados, os gráficos bugados e não atinge os 60 fps pois precisou uma equipe desenvolver um pack de correções pra essa versão. Essas coisas estragaram o jogo e até a experiencia, já que muitas das vezes passei raiva com o jogo fechando sozinho. Mas a trilha sonora composta por Akira Yamaoka e Mary Elizabeth MCGleen é tudo pra mim! Esse Silent Hill é um dos que possuem um dos designes mais incríveis para as criaturas e ambientação, a historia também é foda e com um plot incrível! Não recomendo por conta dos bugs, mas pelo valor em promoção as vezes ele compensa!

Escribir una reseña a éstas alturas lo veo un poco inútil pero aquí las traigo. Sé que éste juego no es gusto de muchos pero, para mi junto con las entregas 1 y 3 del mismo título son mis favoritos. Hace ya algunos años que lo jugué y no recuerdo cómo eran las mecánicas pero, quien haya jugado a SH sabrá que no varían entre sus entregas y la historia, para mi, es increíble. Juegazo y si tenéis oportunidad de probarlo, hacerlo.

***BUYER BEWARE - STAY AWAY FROM THIS BAD PORT!***

I should have listened when people told me this was a bad port.  A bad port is an understatement.  Its a COMPLETELY BROKEN PORT.  DO NOT BUY THIS GAME!

Graphics first. Game is locked to 30 FPS.  You can get the game to run at 60 FPS instead of 30 FPS via a mod that WAS NOT straight forward to install, but thats hardly the worst part of this port.  You will have to put in some SERIOUS EFFORT to get the port to even work halfway and even then its not worth it.  It requires a metric ton of tinkering to even get to be in a moderately playable state.

The audio is TOTALLY BROKEN and ONLY comes out of the right side speaker.  You can install a mod to fix this, but the mod itself usually isnt enough and you have to install some third party drivers to trick the game into thinking its running 5.1 surround (THE ONLY audio available).  Believe me, this alone is reason enough to stay away from this game.  Even with guides, mods, etc, the game STILL runs like hell and crashes frequently.  I was never able to get the audio problem fixed properly.  it was ALWAYS jacked up even AFTER installing the mods to get it to work.  It was a technical nightmare even for someone who knows what they are doing, trust me.  Also, getting a controller to work with the game is another nightmare altogether.  The keybinds are JACKED UP, and cant be rebound properly.  I was able to get around it by mapping the controller to keyboard binds, but thats a half assed solution AND it leaves you with keyboard prompts instead of button prompts...Seriously, TAKE MY WORD FOR IT, STAY AWAY FROM THIS PORT - ITS NOT WORTH IT.  

If you MUST play this game, you need to emulate it.  After spending WEEKS (yes, I MEAN WEEKS) tinkering with this game to get it into a somewhat playable state, i finally gave up and went the emulation route.  SO MUCH BETTER.  Just save yourself some serious heartache and dont purchase this god awful port.  I am NOT KIDDING, this is one of the worst ports of ANY game i have EVER seen.  I am baffled that Steam is even selling it on its platform considering its a totally broken game.

TL;DR - This game DOES NOT work out of the box, and even with a TON OF MODS and a TON OF TINKERING, it still just falls short and isnt worth your time.  I wouldnt even install this game FOR FREE - thats how bad this port is.

It requires a metric ton of tinkering to even get to be in a moderately playable state.

The audio is TOTALLY BROKEN and ONLY comes out of the right side speaker.  You can install a mod to fix this, but the mod itself usually isnt enough and you have to install some third party drivers to trick the game into thinking its running 5.1 surround (THE ONLY audio available).  Believe me, this alone is reason enough to stay away from this game.  Even with guides, mods, etc, the game STILL runs like hell and crashes frequently.  I was never able to get the audio problem fixed properly.  it was ALWAYS jacked up even AFTER installing the mods to get it to work.  It was a technical nightmare even for someone who knows what they are doing, trust me.  Also, getting a controller to work with the game is another nightmare altogether.  The keybinds are JACKED UP, and cant be rebound properly.  I was able to get around it by mapping the controller to keyboard binds, but thats a half assed solution AND it leaves you with keyboard prompts instead of button prompts...Seriously, TAKE MY WORD FOR IT, STAY AWAY FROM THIS PORT - ITS NOT WORTH IT.  

If you MUST play this game, you need to emulate it.  After spending WEEKS (yes, I MEAN WEEKS) tinkering with this game to get it into a somewhat playable state, i finally gave up and went the emulation route.  SO MUCH BETTER.  Just save yourself some serious heartache and dont purchase this god awful port.  I am NOT KIDDING, this is one of the worst ports of ANY game i have EVER seen.  I am baffled that Steam is even selling it on its platform considering its a totally broken game.

TL;DR - This game DOES NOT work out of the box, and even with a TON OF MODS and a TON OF TINKERING, it still just falls short and isnt worth your time.  I wouldnt even install this game FOR FREE - thats how bad this port is.

column8: HORRÍVEL!

Infelizmente, esse port é horrível! Você precisa utilizar dois mods para ter uma experiência próxima ao aceitável, pois crashs aleatórios ainda podem ocorrer.
Eu estava jogando tranquilamente, e tirando a remixagem de som, e alguns crashes aleatórios que aconteciam em situações X e que podiam ser evitados, tudo funcionava de boa... até eu simplesmente salvar o jogo + ou - na metade, e quando fui carregar o save... o jogo crashava, e não conseguia mais progredir (tendo, assim, que jogar o jogo todo de novo, e rezar para que o mesmo não ocorra após passar desse ponto... MAS EU NÃO VOU PERDER O MEU TEMPO!!!)
As únicas coisas boas do jogo são sua gameplay e trilha sonora, além da história desse Silent Hill ser interessante, porém, é apenas isso, os gráficos deixam muito a desejar, além da remixagem de som ser horrível, sendo quase impossível ouvir o que os personagens estão falando.
Fico feliz de ter gasto apenas 3 reais no jogo, pois assim, não saio no prejuízo, mas posso dizer, me arrependi muito nessa compra por conta desse problema que sofri, e eu estava curtindo o jogo, mas infelizmente, tenho que dizer, esse port NÃO VALE A PENA! Se quiser jogar o jogo, tente conseguir joga-lo em um PS3 ou X360, não tem tradução pra Português mas é menos pior do que ter que passar por esse sufoco com esse port mal feito!

column8:
Well, it started off strong, and I really liked it in the beginning. I always wanted to play all the Silent Hills, but there was no PC version. I still remember playing Silent Hill on my old Sony Ericsson phone some years (decades) ago, so I was hyped once I bought this game. But...

Oh well, let's start off with the goods, shall we? Let's not always look at the glass being half empty:
The story was pretty good, in my opinion. A little bit of history, mystery, surrealness etc. The soundtrack was also pretty cool, the monsters are unique and scary in their own way. There are no lame jump scares, but that doesn't mean the game is not scary. I wouldn't say it's Amnesia level of scary, but it's decent enough. Also puzzles to keep the game interesting.

...and now, the bads. And there are plenty of bads. Which is the reason I am giving it a negative review, although the game itself is pretty good:
The notorious crashes. I'm not sure if I even installed the patch for this game, but judging by other people's reviews and experiences, it looks like it doesn't even matter. It wouldn't be so annoying if the game had checkpoints or game saves that are frequent (or manual save for that matter), but in this game you sometimes have to look for a save point for 30-60 minutes, which is not very practical if you do not have a lot of free time: You feel bad for quitting without saving but then you're wondering when the hell is the next save point??
Also, it crashes at the worst possible times, I don't know how many boss battles I had to repeat because of crashes. It even crashed at the very end, literally before the ending cutscene, so I had to do the final boss battle twice, not to mention that it kinda ruined the moment....

So I guess that's why it's a horror game, nothing is scarier than the game freezing after it's been a while since you've saved the game.
The loading times are ridiculous, even for some small rooms. I feel like GTA V has a faster loading time for the whole map. The gameplay is clunky, the audio is stuttering, has uneven volume and randomly cutting out, sometimes only playing on one side of the headphones/speakers. Boss fights, or even regular combat is just weird sometimes, dodging doesn't always work, and don't even get me started on guns sometimes being completely useless because the enemies' hitboxes don't always register hits....

I mean.... I liked the game, kinda, but with all these issues present I simply cannot recommend anyone to play this version of the game.

The game is one of the worst I've played.  Audio skips, and dialogue break any immersion.  Along with that I made it 3 hours into the game just to find out that my guns have not been having any hit registering my entire play through making sections with this absolutely awful combat unbeatable.  Along withe story being one of the worst in the franchise and the combat more or less being spamming melee until it dies, the game loves to drop frames and freeze every few minutes.  Around 4 hours in and 4 total crashes so far, gotta cross your fingers at every loading screen in hopes it doesn't freeze.  Save your money.

column8:
Antes de tudo queria dizer que joguei o jogo de forma crua, ou seja, sem nenhum mod, patch ou configuração além do que o jogo oferecia.
Dito isso, dizer que eu recomendo o jogo assim de forma simples é um pouco demais, o mais correto seria dizer que eu recomendo apenas para pessoas que já jogaram ou viram algum Silent Hill antes e gostaram do universo. Não é um jogo recomendável de jogar para pessoas que vão ter a primeira experiência com a saga e aqui vão os motivos:

> O porte pro PC, valha-me Deus mas que porte horroroso. O jogo é travado a 30 FPS (o que não chega a ser um ponto negativo mas pra alguns possa ser), existem crash's constantes, até recomendo salvar o jogo sempre que puder mas não se assuste se demorar pra carregar os saves é o charme dele, cutscenes travam com frequência, o jogo trava em algumas áreas pra que ele possa carregar o resto, contudo não é algo leve de alguns milésimos, são alguns minutos. Não recomendo o uso de ALT TAB. 
> Existe uma variedade maneira de inimigos, onde cada um fica mais fácil com uma arma específica. MAS, o combate é ruim, muito duro (foi o que ela disse). O jogo tenta ter um combate dinâmico com esquivas e piruetas baseadas no treinamento militar do personagem principal porém fracassa, além de parecer dificultar ainda mais o jogo. O sistema de lock on no inimigo é bem precário e muitas vezes irritante (principalmente em lugares estreitos, a câmera vira o inimigo). Alguns inimigos te agarram e nem sempre o botão de ação, o qual tu tem que praticamente clicar como se estivesse jogando LoL, funciona.
> A história é legal apesar de curta, mas nada digno de roteiro do ano.
> A ambientação é um ponto forte, algo que sempre foi durante toda a saga Silent Hill. A trilha sonora é boa e ajuda a criar uma tensão. As vezes o áudio tem problemas de saída, como por exemplo em algumas cenas que o som sai apenas de um lado sendo que toda cena é centralizada.
>O gráfico é bom pra o ano que foi lançado. Um ponto que vale a pena mencionar são os olhos dos personagens, são bem expressivos e o movimento deles correspondem muito bem com a situação da conversa ou do ambiente. A boca falha um pouco em questão de relação com as palavras as vezes até continuam se mexendo quando não tem nenhum áudio.

De forma geral, eu dou uma nota 5, apenas por ser um Silent Hill e eu ser um fã da saga, se não poderia ser bem pior. E vale dizer que seria bom comprar ele apenas em promoção, pagar preço cheio nesse game é triste demais.

Game takes about 9-10 hours. with crashes and BS glitches caused me to spend 16+ hours on this garbo game... usually i wouldn't complain spending little money like 3$ or so on this but the fact the game is just so poorly made. its causing me to tell others not to just save 3$ but to potentially save yourself from such a terrible game. its insane because i like 1-3 SH games. terrible port.

**Notes for buyers**
Do u like planning to play for hours and than have the game crash before u had a chance to save??? 
Terrible story for that matter,
 Cant tab the game or it crashes,
 Game randomly glitches out wont let u swap weapons or keep a weapon out when u swap weapons while mid play thru.
sometimes when you're lost ( or so u think u are ) you're not..
 your in the right spot just terrible PS2 era shit were you're on top of it spamming X to pick it up and yet u don't pick it up so u think u cant obtain it just to find out u need to move to the right a little or left to get the item....

column8: no hablo ingles

Nie rozumiem hejtu na tą grę. Ok, jest spartolona technicznie. Mnie też wywalała do pulpitu przy ładowaniu save-ów (tylko) i częstowała freezami trwającymi nawet kilkadziesiąt sekund. ale...
Jest wielkie ale...
Jak pominiemy problemy techniczne to jest to jeden z lepszych survival horrorów z kamerą zza pleców bohatera.
Przez większość czasu utrzymuje klimat napięcia, nagradza rozsądne gospodarowanie zasobami i karze za zbytnią rozrzutność. Fabuła ma ciekawy plot twist, ba nawet piramidogłowy tutaj pasuje i przyzna to każdy znający symbolikę tej postaci.
Reasumując: Nie mogę gry polecić bezkrytycznie bo jednak ma poważne problemy techniczne, ale na jakiejś promocji tak do 20 zł warto ja wyrwać i ograć.

There isn't much to like about SH: Homecoming, unless you have a genuine interest in broken combat, an underwhelming storyline, and a game that requires a patch to even run for the first time after purchasing. No, the patch isn't included, so you will have to turn to Google for that. After I managed to get this game running, it was fun for about 20 minutes. Once you make it to the later stages of the game, combat becomes more and more frustrating. The dodge mechanic is useless, and does nothing to save you from being struck by an enemy about 75-80% of the time. This just isn't a Silent Hill game I can recommend adding to your library. It is frustrating, dull, and bug-riddled. Watch a play-through if you are really curious about the story, but you aren't missing anything if you have already played Silent Hill 2.

column8:
[h1] Una experiencia de horror interminable [/h1]

Este Silent Hill es de lejos el peor título de la saga que haya jugado. Empecemos por lo básico; el juego de base está roto, nada más instalarlo y empezar a jugar, vas a notar problemas en tema configuraciones gráficas, de sonido y ni hablar de los controles que de hecho el juego no es capaz de reconocer un control de Xbox One ni de PlayStation. Por cierto, también ¡crashea todo el maldito tiempo!

Dejando de lado este tipo de problemas (graves) la historia es pobre, es obvio que la gente de Double Helix Games no entendió del todo la saga y lo que significa el lore de la misma, los personajes son bastante olvidables, quizás el único punto rescatable es el diseño de monstruos y escenarios, pero no compensa todos sus puntos negativos.

Solo lo recomendaría si realmente eres fan de esta saga y estás jugando todos los títulos disponibles que tiene. Pero eso sí, prepárate para hacer corajes y lidiar con ¡LOS MALDITOS CRASHEOS DEL DEMONIO!
İnsanlar nasıl beceriyor bilmiyorum ama bu oyun oynanmıyor. Start düğmesine bastığım an sonsuz yükleme ekranına giriyor w10'da ve w11 de denedim durum değişmedi.

UMA BOSTA!! Eu acho que a história até que é legal, mas a versão de PC é simplesmente HEDIONDA! Os controles não funcionam direito, o jogo é travado a 30 FPS (Podendo cair pra 15), a dublagem é desconexa com os personagens e o combate é A PIOR COISA DO BRASIL! Não gastem dinheiro com esse jogo, pois a Konami não merece seu dinheiro suado e honesto.
Yep, still terrible and unplayable.
column9: Yep, still terrible and unplayable.

column8: Najlepszy Silent Hill na steam (do czasu remake SH2)

vengo a salvarle la vida,a las personas que tengan dificultades con la version de PC...
tomen,aca esta:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2880836707

la verdad,instalando este parche,es un poco mas estable que la version normal/vanilla...
avance bastante y crasheo un par de veces nomas (algo que es un logro,porque la version normal tiene sus problemas)...

aunque recomiendo mas jugar a las versiones de PS3 y XBOX360, igualmente... es un buen juego, no es tan malo como se piensa, esta entretenido, dale una oportunidad.

instalar el parche no son muchas vueltas, solo copiar, pegar y remplazar archivos (y modificar algunos), puede tomar su tiempo y puede ser un poco ´´tosco´´ configurarlo, pero despues de eso, el juego funciona mucho mejor que el juego base sin ninguna modificación externa.



(creditos a el creador original del parche: [b]unknownproject[/b])

J'ai gardé de très bon souvenirs des jeux silent hill. Malheureusement Steam ne propose que silent hill homecoming que je ne connaissais pas .
J'ai été tenté par celui ci, je dois avouer qu'il est plutôt compliqué (peu de munition, peu de vie) parfois on se perd sans savoir ou aller et j'ai constaté que les ennemis apparaissent en grand nombre.
Néanmoins malgré cela il pourrait rester jouable mais c'était sans compter les nombreux "Bugs", le jeu plante régulièrement, certaines des énigmes sont également planté, cela devient vite problématique et je ne peux même pas arriver à la fin du jeu.
Ce genre de jeu absolument pas fini d'être programmé il faut les éviter et surtout ne pas les acheter pour faire comprendre qu'on est pas des pigeon, de plus que Steam ne rembourse pas même si le jeu ne peut pas être joué normalement car les 2h de jeu ont été dépassés
Hay que ser hijo de puta para recomendar este port.

¡PERO QUE TERRIBLE PORT PARA PC! MUY MAL OPTIMIZADO!!!

NO TIRES TU DINERO, AHORA ESTÁN EN OFERTA VARIOS JUEGOS POR HALLOWEEN Y TIENES MEJORES OPCIONES QUE ESTE TERRIBLE PORT PARA PC. 

Pensé que los comentarios estaban mal y decidí comprarlo por que esta en oferta.

Tengo un core i5 10th y una tarjeta de vídeo gtx 1650, puedo jugar gow 5 a 90fps en gráficos medios/altos, recientemente me baje Alan wake y me va a 120fps en gráficos altos.

Pero con este y aun que sus gráficos son terribles, tiene unas caídas terribles de FPS. 

Te da la opción de ponerlo como máximo 144fps y aun así, apenas logras los 30fps y con unas caídas terribles a 20fps.

Es increíble que steam tenga este tipo de ports para pc.

Antes que nada quiero aclarar que entiendo que este Silent Hill en pc esta muy mal optimizado y contiene entre bugs y otras cosas mas que pueden molestar la experiencia de juego. Pero de los 53 minutos que he jugado y siento que eh avanzado bastante en ese tiempo solo me a ocurrido un error, el de que se cierra el juego. Y eso la verdad no me molesta nada. Puede molestar algunas veces porque el juego pudo haberse cerrado y no habias guardado tu partida o en un momento desafortunado en el juego. Pero como digo de lo que voy del juego ese fue mi unico error. Es totalmente jugable, OJO, hasta el momento, quien sabe que despues empeora la situacion y aparecen mas errores. Hablando del juego tienen buena historia, diferente a los otros Silent Hills pero tiene su esencia que lo hace unico. Recomiendo este juego ademas ahora que estan las ofertas de Halloween esta a mil pesitos asi que denle una oportunidad. Cabe resaltar que si el juego estaria con su precio original no lo compraria por todas sus reseñas variadas que tiene. Eso queso

ecxelente juego pero muy mal port para steam con bugs y crasheos 
pero aun asi logre terminarlo me gusto la historia en general un 7.5 de 10

[h1] silent hill: homecoming is a good game and here is why [/h1]
* i played it without downloading any fixes ...
it's not the best of the series but it's far from the worst, it's a slightly above average game 
just think of it as a sequel for the movies rather than the games.

[h1] positives [/h1]

1. the story is good and there is good attention to detail.
2. the best bosses in a Silent Hill game from fight mechanics and every boss has symbolism behind him 
    and the second boss reminds me of Dark Souls.
3. combat is improved and it's fun when it works properly.
4. the weapons have different uses outside combat and you get better versions as you play.
5. nearly all the other word segments are done very well
6. the art and music is good

[h1] negatives [/h1]

0. this is a major one, characters have weird looking teeth.
1. the game crashes, it crashed for me only two times the first time I started it, and on the loading screen of 
    the second boss but I died a lot of times so maybe its a feature like when you open Clash of Clans for a long time and it tells you to get some rest from the game in this logic I think they were the first to implement this feature and I like to thank them personally for thinking for the player mental health when they die a lot and I hope the team behind Serious Sam 3 learn from them.
2. this is a major problem that will affect your game it freezes a lot every time I want to save it freeze and when 
    cutscene starts and at random times but it does not take a long time to recover 30-40 sec.
3. I don't know if the dodging is not that good or I'm just that bad at the game.
4. sometimes the monster will lock attack on you and you can't go out of it in tight areas usually.
5. not a major thing but picking items up looks weird and there are edges to the item display.
6. you can choose what to say and it will not change anything so it's pointless.
7. the endings of the game are very bad and they have you can get the joke ending in the first playthrough.
8. no idea why they put pyramid head in the game removing him will not change anything.

[h1] conclusion [/h1]

if you can expect this game as a sequel to the movies and see yourself not getting affected by the freezes and especially the [b] weird looking teeth [/b] I recommend this game and buying it at a discount ( try to find a fix to the freezes )
and to be honest my expectations of the game were below 0 maybe it affects my opinion
[b] I give it 10/6.5  [/b]
.

column8:
A deeply inept, accidentally funny clown shoes-wearing horror game that just so happens to have the Silent Hill name. The PC version is notoriously busted, but it's fine because the game itself is this very clunky 360-era action horror thing neither good at action nor horror. It's just... really bad? 

At the very least the Akira Yamaoka soundtrack is good.

column8: no es un silent hill 2 , pero tampoco esta tan mal la verdad :)

Having recently played every Silent Hill game up to this point on pc (almost every single one was a pain to get fully set up) I expected the ONE Silent Hill game that was actually released on steam to be the easiest to get working, if you know anything about the pc port of this game, you know how wrong I was. I'll start out by saying that from the very little I have actually played of the game I have been enjoying it a fair bit, It's nothing amazing, especially compared to the first 4 games but it is still an enjoyable experience nonetheless. HOWEVER, this port of the game is possibly the most atrocious port of a video game I have ever played. It says a lot about how much care went into this port when you need to download a community made patch and pray that the game decides to work WITH the patch installed. The FPS dips? I can handle those just fine but everything else is terrible. If nothing else the audio will be bugged out so its pretty much only coming out of one speaker and you can barely even hear any of the characters talk. If you don't want to play in fullscreen you have to download that same patch just to be able to go into the config file of the game and change to windowed. Also if you are in fullscreen and you decide to alt tab out of the game...oops its now crashed. But the worst offender of this godawful port is even with all of these patches installed, if by some miracle you actually manage to get the game working, every single time theres a loading screen you better pray to whatever higher power you believe in that it wont crash. The crashes on loading screens are so frequent I'd almost think they coded in a 50/50 chance to crash the game when loading into a new area. It's obvious there was little to no play testing on this port. If you're thinking about buying this game at full price on steam, do not. Get the game on original hardware because its about $20 cheaper, or maybe even try emulating the console version of the game. I doubt it could be much worse than this version.

column8:
My negative review is not of the game itself (while it is not the BEST Silent Hill installment), but rather the absolute headache it gives you just trying to play. It frequently would freeze and often times crashed leaving me to redo boss battles over and over again. Every time I would try to save, I had to cross my fingers and hope that just initializing the saving screen didn't break everything and crash the game again.

That being said, the story itself was alright. I was engaged, and had a decent time... when I wasn't sighing through progress crippling crashes.

column8:
Adoro la saga Silent Hill, pero NO puedo recomendar este juego. Lo único que conseguirás intentando jugarlo será un terrible dolor de cabeza. 

Desde el momento en el que ejecuté el juego, comenzaron los errores. Ya ha llegado un punto en el que es imposible jugarlo, ya que se cierra solo constantemente y no se puede guardar partida hasta encontrar un punto de guardado. Por lo tanto, te quedas atrapado en un bucle en el cual apareces en el último punto de guardado y cuando intentas avanzar para llegar a la siguiente zona de guardado, se cierra sin más.

No lo compres. Luego te devanarás los sesos buscando un parche para poder sobrellevar la partida con la esperanza de que no se cierre en cualquier momento.

He tratado de pedir el reembolso del producto, pero me han mandado un mensaje automático que dice que he "jugado" 5 horas. Y según la política de Steam, solo hacen devoluciones si has jugado menos de 2 horas. 

Me toca comérmelo con patatas. 20€ que se quedan por la cara...
one of the best silent hill games i have ever played 9.5/10 Alex Shepherd his a pretty cool guy

column8: Mt bom, eu mesmo fiquei um pouco viciado no jogo. Ele não tem muito a apresentar com o sistema de combate mas ainda sim não deixa de ser divertido. Os puzzles tbm são divertidos o suficiente para vc quebrar a cabeça e ainda sim conseguir resolve-los. A historia ... melhor ainda, realmente são muitas possibilidades ja que são diversos finais. Resumo da historia: Crente é tudo fia da puta.

I would love to have the other Silent Hill games on here. They're not nostalgic  for me, since I was like in 2nd grade when this game came out and probably wasn't even in school for the older games. Despite this, I think the game has really cool lore with an old cult, religious demons, and human sacrifice. Seeing a world build off this sort of lore is something that just doesn't exist in contemporary media.

I learned Pyramid Head is a recurring figure which would make my heart giddy every time I could see him in a separate game within the franchise. As for the story in this game, the ending could've been a bit better and I wish the game dragged out more of the lore because I know nothing about it. 

FREE PSYCHOLOGY: The psychic significance of human sacrifice is maintaining psychic equilibrium (a primitive form of adaptation) by giving the senses a sort of medium for enabling a group of people to unite under an unconscious autonomous complex (providing psychological comfort and arbitrary moral justification). The sacrifice of human children, in particular, represents a disregard for change and morality, a stasis for one form of control above all; a rejection of innocence, love and hope for power.

Despite nearly everyone else complaining about crashing, I had only crashed at one part of the game over and over again which was the first boss battle. The game's performance for being a game that was made when I was 8 is actually really good and still fun to play.
column9:
I would love to have the other Silent Hill games on here. They're not nostalgic  for me, since I was like in 2nd grade when this game came out and probably wasn't even in school for the older games. Despite this, I think the game has really cool lore with an old cult, religious demons, and human sacrifice. Seeing a world build off this sort of lore is something that just doesn't exist in contemporary media.

I learned Pyramid Head is a recurring figure which would make my heart giddy every time I could see him in a separate game within the franchise. As for the story in this game, the ending could've been a bit better and I wish the game dragged out more of the lore because I know nothing about it. 

FREE PSYCHOLOGY: The psychic significance of human sacrifice is maintaining psychic equilibrium (a primitive form of adaptation) by giving the senses a sort of medium for enabling a group of people to unite under an unconscious autonomous complex (providing psychological comfort and arbitrary moral justification). The sacrifice of human children, in particular, represents a disregard for change and morality, a stasis for one form of control above all; a rejection of innocence, love and hope for power.

Despite nearly everyone else complaining about crashing, I had only crashed at one part of the game over and over again which was the first boss battle. The game's performance for being a game that was made when I was 8 is actually really good and still fun to play.

column8: Absolutely horrible Silent Hill game. Zero exploration, every door is locked, a fucking terrible combat system with zero invincibility frames, no block button, glitchy spacing issues, knife spam, one hit kill enemies, bipolar difficulty curves, and a snoozefest of a story. You might find some entertainment if you've never played a Silent Hill game before, but you'd be better off playing 1 - 4 over this garbage. Oh, and did I mention the CONSTANT crashing? Have fun eeking by a tough encounter only for the game to crash. Fuck this shit.

I'm a hardcore Silent Hill fan, and I think this game has a lot of potential to be fun! Unfortunately, constant stuttering, freezes, and crashes render it extremely difficult to play. If you want to try your luck, you might be better off getting a pirated version online or looking up some fan-made patches. 
A lot of the classic Silent Hill charm shines through the swamp of buggy code--the soundtrack is amazing, as ever, and the story itself is captivating. It's just too bogged down by the gameplay to reach its full potential

o jogo é bom sim mas o tanto de bug que existe deixa a experiencia ruim, não vale nem os 3.50 pela dor de cabeça de ficar correndo atrás de patch de fix pra fazer funcionar. que alias você vai precisar se quiser jogar então se for comprar [url=https://github.com/unknownproject/Silent_Hill_Homecoming] AQUI [/url] você vai achar os fix necessarios pra conseguir jogar.

Pelo o que pude jogar em 5 horas de gameplay, e ainda não estou nem perto do fim do jogo, Sh Homecoming consegue ser um bom jogo, mas não chega perto das obras de arte feita pela Team Silent, com um combate interessante, graficos com aos meus olhos é ok para 2008, a trilha sonora é boa mas nada comparada aos jogos anteriores e é cheio de referências aos primeiros games da franquia, mas pega elementos do filme também, que não tem ligação nenhum com os jogos oque faz o jogo não se encaixar na cronologia. Minha maior critica é os problemas de desempenho, o port feito para PC é mediocre, tendo os graficos um pouco inferiores aos lançados para consoles, problemas no som, fps caindo a cada 10 segundos, o jogo chega a fechar em certas ocasiões e muitos bugs, há um patch de correção feito por um fã, recomendo baixarem caso estejam afim de comprar o jogo, também recomendo pegar numa promoção, por exemplo eu paguei 3 reais neste jogo, resumidamente, é um jogo mediano, mas dá para se divertir.

Not that this was ever a good game by any means being the most mediocre entry in the entirety of the Silent Hill franchise, but this PC Port is inexcusably bad. Riddled with tons of bugs and graphical errors not to mention it crashes just about every 2 minutes. 
It's almost entirely next to unplayable.

column8: El juego en sí está muy bien, tiene una buena historia y bueno, es un Silent Hill y por eso no se ha de juzgarlo por sus gráficos ni jugabilidad, es decente. Lo que no se puede tolerar el malísimo port que se hizo de consolas a pc; tirones jajaja, tirones con tirones más bien, crasea y hasta en muchas ocasiones a Steam le cuesta iniciar el juego, cada vez que me encuentro un guardado pues bueno..., tarda mucho en cargarte las partidas guardadas como si estuviese jugando en PS1 al Final Fantasy 7 y me cargase las partidas de la memory card o peor. Suerte que lo compré el otro día por 2 euros con el descuento ya que el port está tan mal hecho que deberían dejar ese precio como oficial. No se va a arreglar y así lo dejarán ya que Konami se dedica a otras cosas. Lo voy a seguir jugando hasta pasarmelo por la historia y como dije el juego en sí no está mal, una pena por ese port tan malo que hace que el juego esté en unas condiciones tan contradictorias que ni se debió lanzarse.

column8: I almost didn't buy this based on the negative reviews about crashing and whatnot. Glad I didn't listen. This game might have issues, I don't know because a short little search into the reported problems led me to a fan made patch by Unknown Project's Lair that apparently fixes all those problems. Then there's a YouTuber called Izzy Techguy that has a simple tutorial on how to install. I did the patch after install and I've had ZERO ISSUES after nearly 6 hrs of gameplay! NOT ONE! And I dont have a seriously jacked system either. A little ASUS laptop with Win10 64bit, Intel i7 7500 2.70-2.90gh, Nvidia Geforce MTX940 and 12 gb RAM. Hardly a bruiser. So buy with confidence because this is one of the better IPs of the franschise IMO. And I've played them all. SH>RE all day!
