column8:
O jogo tem uma historia muito boa, pena que tenha demasiados bugs e a jobabilidade seja extremamente lenta. Tentei jogar até o fim, mas os bugs não deixaram, vou tentar a versão pra console, talvez seja possivel jogar até o fim.

Não recomendo comprar esse jogo no PC, você vai se estressar muito com tamanha quantidade de bugs, por exemplo o jogo fecha do nada ao você tentar salvar, o jogo fecha do nada antes, durante ou depois de uma cut scene ou até mesmo o jogo fecha do nada sem nada mesmo, só fecha e você perde todo o progresso não salvo.

Nem sei o que dizer pra senhora Konami que lança um jogo desse jeito, que apenas faz queimar o nome da franquia Silent Hill, apesar que os problemas não são do enredo e sim do porte.

el juego me a decepcionado bien

HISTORIA: no pude acabarme el juego hasta el final cosa que explicare mas adelante pero de lo poco que pude jugar la verdad es que me a parecido bastante aburrida la historia no genera ese sentimiento de querer seguir jugando y ver que pasa e jugado otros silent hill con historia mejor y que vaya que enganchan 

GRAFICOS:los graficos pos digamos que estan bien no tengo mucho que decir aqui

OPTIMIZACION: la razon por la cual no me pude pasar el juego fue su mala optmizacion y sus constantes crasheos el juego siempre estaba entre unos 20 - 30 fps y a veces se quedaba pegado el juego como 1 minutos de repente y lo que mas me irritaba era que estaba bastante avanzado en un nivel y de repente de la nada crasheaba el juego y pues cuando volvia a cargar la partida tenia que hacer desde el principio todo y no crasheaba de vez en cuando era practicamente cad 10 minutos me hubiese gustado acabar el juego pero es que asi no se puede

JUGABILIDAD:la jugabilidad nno me a gustado mucho combate algo lento movimiento algo raro la verdad pudieron haber mejorado mas la jugabilidad

BUGS: en cuanto a bugs me encontre BASTANTES que me da flojera decirlos xd

CONCLUSION Y PUNTUACION:juego con una historia no muy buena muchos bugs y muy mala optimizacion jugabilidad que pudo haber sido mejor la verdad es que no recomiendo para nada este juego es un port muy malo para pc al juego le doy un 1-10  es la primera vez que le doy a un juego una calificacion tan baja xd

[b]Тихий Холм: Возвращение домой[/b]

[h1]«Война — это ад, но есть вещи и похуже. Война меняет тебя, и никто из тех, кто остался дома, этого не поймет»[/h1]

Разрабы больше всего  вдохновлялись экранизацией самой игры, причем это одна из лучших и удачных. Согласитесь, пирамидыч в фильме не плох. Да, да, почему бы и не  воспользоваться, чтобы привлечь другую часть аудиторию.

Silent Hill  всегда славился прекрасным саундтреком, атмосферой безнадежности, головоломками, стишками и секретами, большим количеством концовок, открываемых после многочисленных прохожденний, вдобавок для серии было особенно важно двусмысленность, чтобы имело различные интерпретации, теорий. Этот часть не исключение. 

Впервые в серии они решили перейди на объемный звук, конечно, это помогает атмосфере, но, в конечном итоге, вызвало множество проблем с портом. Добавили улучшенную боевую систему и удобное управление. Сюжет мудреный, дают выбр реплики, понять все детали с первого раза трудновато, хотя и выглядит с первого взгляда простым. Музыка одна из лучших качества игры, но они глубоко ошиблись с выбором заглавной темы саунда в меню.

Большой  недостаток заключается в том, что не чувствуешь героя, не чувствуешь, что город живой, все накрылось однотонным одеялом... Пусто... За их диалогами и действиями и не чувствуешь эмоций, чувств... отчасти это  претензии к звуку, из-за плохого порта, скудной лицевой анимации... 
После повторной, и прочитанных записей, все больше склоняюсь к помутнение рассудка у персонажа.

Что за политика у Конами, из-за чего запретили покупать Homecoming в других странах, у серии так много фанатов, а они вот так наплевали и плюют в лицо. 

Как большой фанат серии Silent Hill и как любитель жанра survival horror, от всего сообщество говорю- переиздайте классические части франшизы в Steam. Konami послушайте фанов уже, и сделайте следующий часть качественными, перестаньте ерундой заниматься. Не подведите нас, и будьте уверены - мы вас точно не подведем. それをやる.

Предлагаю прочитать предысторию игры в виде дневников. В них освещаются наиболее важные аспекты жизни Алекса и города... ценные события для понимания сюжета. 
[spoiler]Итого. 8.4/10[/spoiler]

column8: história muito boa,jogabilidade mais ou menos e um game super mal-otimizado,se for comprar tenha ciência de que vai passar raiva com algumas travas e quedas de fps.
se jeux est un chef d'euvre manifique comme les resident evil

Beautiful and unique atmosphere and graphics, puzzles never require any thinking and the game is definitely too easy.
Combat is sometimes unbalanced but generally good, probably the best in the the series. Also, the game feel too short and as soon as you get comfortable with it, it ends.
The boss battles are between the best ever, innovative and fun, and the bosses look beautiful.
The final/second part of the game seems rushed and is absolutely worse, the design and environment aren't as good as the first part.
The Plot is foreseeable and overall just decent, even if there is strong nonsense all around.
The game is plagued by technical problems on PC, that caused hangs, crashes, unfair deaths and so on. It's also quite buggy overall.
Controls are decent but there is a lot of room for improvements (interactions with objects are clunky).
Overall the game is fun and a please to play, it is rarely true psychological horror as you don't really feel threatened, but it's gruesome enough.
Unfortunately, it just never elevates to a higher level, it just stays good, but not great.

Note: My game time is low because i used a tool to run the game in borderless fullscreen.

column8:
La mecánica de combate es tan divertida como hacer footing con un palo metido por el culo, la historia es interesante al principio pero luego se desinfla como un globo para acabar siendo aburrida y poco elaborada. Los actores de doblaje son mejores que los de los anteriores juegos, que parecían sacados de una peli porno, pero a mi gusto eso le quita personalidad.

 En resumidas cuentas, el juego en sí se siente como un esfuerzo por exprimir un poco más de dinero de una franquicia que ya estaba en decadencia y si lo que quieres es jugar un Silent Hill este quizás no sea tu juego y te salga más rentable emular las anteriores entregas.

pd: Fvck Konami

I can recommend this game only to hardcore Silent Hill fans who are willing to put up with some nuiseances.
Story and atmosphere is just like previous SH games, very well done...
Combat is rather cumbersome - sometimes very frustrating until you find out which weapons are effective against enemies. Some weapons are quick but weak, other are strong but slow. Using proper weapons is like day'n'night difference. It often involves proper timing for dodge and attack, and it's only fun afterwards...
The worst about this game is probably technical part of the game - sound mostly comes from right speaker(although there is fan-made patch to fix this), plenty of people whine about 30fps cap, and from time to time you'll experience several second stutter when new area is loading...
If you're starved for more SH games, just don't expect too much, you can enjoy this. Better buy when it's on sale...

column8:
Non comprendo le ragioni di tutte queste valutazioni negative. SH Homecoming vale la pena di essere giocato. L'ambientazione, l'atmosfera, le situazioni sono in grado di incuriosire (e di spaventare). Buona la storia e anche la grafica.
Consigliato. Auspico che anche gli altri episodi arrivino presto a onorare Steam.

TL;DR
Stay away from this god-awful game, it's a dysfunctional mess that's not even worth $1


This is absolute console port trash. The framerate is capped at 30fps, looks identical to a Nintendo64 game, and crashes every 5 minutes unless you spend 5 hours researching about how to get it to crash only every 30 minutes, and finally, the story is absolute dogshit. Don't even get me started on the bugs in this game, I could write an entire 100 page novel about all the glitches, bugs, and technological issues with this game. They actually expect someone to pay $40 for a game that's not even worth $5. This game is a disgrace to the Silent Hill legacy. You'd be better off buying Resident Evil 6. RE6 is garbage too, but at least you can laugh at it, and at least it actually functions. Playing Silent Hill Homecoming is just painful, you can't even mock it. The game will just mock you, as you spent $40 for it. I got this on sale for $5, and I still feel like I've been robbed. I only have about 15 minutes of play time on this, however, I have beaten the game twice on Xbox, and in just 15 minutes, and looking at the reviews, I can tell this is the worst version of the game that exists. This is a contender for worst PC port ever, or at least that I have seen. I understand that this post is rambling, but I don't care enough about the game to actually write out a coherent review. I urge you to stay away from this nightmare of a game. You will only waste your time on this, and you can't get a refund on that.

There is one good thing about this game. The music was done by Akira Yamaoka, so if you've played any Silent Hill game before Origins, then you know exactly what to expect.

Serinin ilk üvey evladı ilan edilen Silent Hill Homecoming sizi daha oyuna başlamadan soğutan birçok eleştiri ile karşınıza çıkıyor. Bu eleştirilerin bir kısmının gayet haklı konular iken diğer bir kısmı ise delinin teki kuyuya bir taş atmış hadi biz de atalım mantığı kokuyor. Tabii bunların hakkında daha fazla odur,budur,şudur diyerek bir kargaşa da ben yaratmayacağım. Onun yerine bir şans vermenizi rica ederek yavaşça oyunun konusuna geçeceğim.

Her oyununda olduğu gibi bu oyunun da kendine has bir girişe, o giriş kadar da enteresan bir karaktere sahip. Ben o karaktere 'Bay Evet Efendim' demeyi tercih etsem de kendilerinin asıl adı Alex Shepherd olmakta. Alex'i seride ilginç kılan ilk şey önceki serilerdeki karakterlerin hepsi sıradan insanlar iken onun asker olmasıdır. Lakin asker olmasına rağmen çokta sert ve otoriter bir kişiliği olduğunu söyleyemem. Tabii bu karakterin kendinden ziyade benim zorumla oluşturulmuş bir yanılgı da olabilir. Çünkü oyun içerisinde Alex'in seçimlerine doğrudan siz karar verebiliyorsunuz. Kısaca Bay Evet Efendimin affedici,umursamazlığı veya vicdansız biri olması sizin ellerinizde. Ben sanırım birazcık pamuk şeker kıvamında takılmış olabilirim.

Bolca patlama çatlama seslerinin ardından gözlerinizi açtığınız hastane size iyileşmekten ziyada öleceğiniz yermiş gibi gelebilir. Merak etmeyin ölmeden önce yapmanız gereken çok şey var. Mesela işe orada ne halt yediği bilinmez ama kardeşiniz Joshua'ın oyuncağını arayarak başlayabilirsiniz. Ararken de artık bir sembol haline gelmiş hemşirelerden kaçmayı sakın ama sakın unutmayın. Kısa bir uğrasın ardında bindiğiniz asansörde üzerinize doğru gelen kesici bir aletle zaten gördüğünüz kabustan uyanıyorsunuz. İşte tam o sırada karşımıza mübarek kamyonu ile bizi memleketimize taşıyan Travis abimiz çıkıyor. Bazılarınız bu ismi tanıdı öyle değil mi. Gerçi tanısanız da tanımasanız da ben oyunu anlatmayı burada kesmek zorundayım. Sonra alıp oynamak için bir nedeniniz kalmayacak.

Kalkıp size zaten herhangi bir Silent Hill yaratığından ya da bossundan bahsetmeme gerek yoktur herhalde. Ne de olsa her ne kadar üvey evlat diye giriş yapmış olsakta bu konuda laf edemeyiz. Gerek tasarımları gerek zorlukları gayet tatmin edici bence. Hele ki o bossların da hikayeye yedirilişine girecek olursak işin içinden ancak 'adamlar iyi düşünmüş usta' diyerek çıkarız. Birde tabii müzik konusu var ama hani iyi ya da kötü demek yerine tek bir isim versem yeterli olacaktır. -Akira Yamaoka-

column8:
Um dos piores port´s que eu já vi na vida. O jogo é bom, mas muito mal optimizado e convertido, simplesmente terrível !

Aviso para quem for comprar:

- Congelamento do jogo. (Não é toda hora, mas acontece).
- O jogo é travado em 30 fps com micro travamentos e fluidez horrível.
- Opções gráficas nulas.
- Configuração do controle com bug´s e quase inviável utilização, apresentando um slow motion ao virar a câmera verticalmente. Quem for comprar tem que fazer pensando em jogar no teclado e mouse.

É uma pena, pois o jogo em si vale a pena...

After seeing the trailer of Silent Hill 2 remaster I decided to check on this game again, mostly by reading since last time I played it it was still broken.
It is true that this game doesn't connect the dots in the storyline properly... It is true that the developers just wanted to shove everything Silent hill 2 and 3 had into this one, making it feel less unique and symbolic.
However, it was still an entertaining game and it completely outclasses every other silent hill game in combat.

I don't care how many silent hill 2 soyboys come after me saying "waaah silent hill homecoming's combat is awful, waaaaah"
Silent hill: Homecoming has the best combat compared to any other game in the franchise.
My reason to say this is simple:
Would you rather be stuck smacking a monster with a stick with the same lame animation for about 10 minutes until it dies?
Literally, Silent hill combat from 1 to 3, including Origins, shattered memories and others I forgor about. You can apply the "Bonk" meme... that's all there is to combat. a looped "bonk" until they die.

In silent hill homecoming while you get some overly exagerated combat movements, it gives you that chance of screwing up melee attacks. It keeps you focused on timing dodges or swings. Instead of, again, just standing still spamming m1 keeping the enemy stuck on a damage loop until it falls down.
The range weapons are also beautiful in this game, when you save enough ammo and a fight with multiple enemies arrives, it's just so pleasurable to shoot them down instead of having to risk being split in half from facing them.

What this game lacks in story, it makes up in action. It's true that silent hill is all about the story and I agree that this one is a bit wacky.
But people hate on it too much, even blindly in most cases. Just because the flock says silent hill 2 better, they barely even give this one a chance.

It's not the best, but it's not as bad as all the soyboys say it is.

Why am I giving it a thumbs down?
Because it's broken. This port is bad and everything glitches out or freezes. Unfortunately making this game unplayable in some cases. 

I love this game and I would play it all over again if they ever fixed it. 
I am not discouraging people from trying it out, it's still worth exploring it a bit.
But other than that, the biggest problem is just that... a bad port.

Did I say this game has a superior combat than any other silent hill game?

column8:
https://youtu.be/yuI82ik4kTY

Very hard to give this game a positive review just becuase of the number of technical issues you are likely to encounter. This game is the poster child of poor console port. From framerate drops to the random crashes and cumbersome controls. 

Also playing with M&K is quite frustrating owing to its console origins, with the need to 'lock' onto targets in combat mode before you can attack. If you do buy it I would recommend that you play with a controller as it a much easier experience.

However with that said the combat itself is pretty awful and quite repetative - and there is a lot of it. In fact you are often railroaded into large combat sections with multiple enemies. Survival horror the beat em up edition. This might not have been so bad if there were plenty of checkpoints to save at. Unfortunatley they are quite rare, and the game will randomly crash when loading a new area forcing you to repeat the entire section before you can save again. 

It is a shame because environment wise the game is pretty good and the visuals and voice acting are also well done. But no amount of glitz and atmosphere can make up for the endless tedious combat and random crashes, and certainly not at a nearly twenty pounds purchase price.

column8:
Badly ported from playstation 3/xbox360, difficult to get a stable crash free balance between refresh rate + resolution and high texture quality mode is not reccomended.

After much tinkering got it semi stable on 1366x768 60hz (70-75hz doesnt seem to take 4 me)

Button Patch reccomended for xbox360 controller for windows or playstation3 controller for windows

https://steamcommunity.com/app/19000/discussions/0/618459931320393870/

Also edit vars_pc.cfg file increaseing fps changeing fpslimit=30 and maxFPSLimit=30 to what ever frame rate you desire

Also reccomend enb graphics mod with some file edits

edit file enbseries.ini under bin, bin/nvidia and bin/radeon folders changeing PixelShaderLimit=500 to read PixelShaderLimit=4096 , UseVertexTextureFetch=0 to read UseVertexTextureFetch=1 and DelayTime=0 to read DelayTime=50.

game play seems good to me its just badly ported.
Game developers should work on the game for pc from scratch instead of being lazy and modifying from a console to pc think this is probably botched rush job to get it made quicker. 

STEAM Game so why no Achievements :(

column8: Silent Hill is easily one of the greatest horror franchises to ever exist, and Silent Hill: Homecoming successfully brings that world into the modern era in beautiful detail. Having said that, it does lack the originality and psychological terror the original quadrilogy. Instead this game is much like a greatest hits. It shows you all of the amazing monsters in a modern gaming engine, with the sites and sounds of the original game. Even the story is heavily influenced by Silent Hill 2. This alone means it stands out as an amazing game, especially in a modern era dominated by MMO's and lootboxes. Now, at the time of it's release it did seem like a step backward. It revisted Silent Hill rather then reinvent it as each game before it did. It's biggest failing was not jumping off the rails, and be something new and unique, but for me, I'm a little thankful. I love having a modern Silent Hill to casually play through, and experiance the creepy monsters that hide inside. Without a doubt I think time has shown just how amazing this game was. It might not have been the best Silent Hill game, but then again, improving on perfection is a difficult task.

column8: Malos controles.

The scariest thing about this game is the horrific quality of the port.

It rivals Saints Row 2's port, though not quite as bad. I could overlook the game running at 30FPS if it actually kept a solid non-stuttery 30FPS. I could forgive the fact the game doesn't look as good as it could if there weren't glaring graphical glitches like objects having lines through them and random super bright bloom balls randomly floating around, rarely, but it does happen. I could forgive the lack of proper M+KB controls if getting an X360 controller to work wasn't such a janky process. (Have to start game with controller plugged in, go into options and select the option to use the XInput controller and then back all the way out, let it save and then restart the game to be able to use your 360 controller, guess I should be glad the option even exists.) The map and item inspection is broken on anything higher than 720p as well. I've also heard horror stories of the game randomly crashing, so far, out of 2 hours the worst that's happened to me is the bloom balls, lines in objects and stutter that makes it feel slower than 30FPS even though my framerate counter is showing 30FPS solid.

Despite all that, I still recommend it. Why? Well, it's a good game. I've played every Silent Hill game aside from Book of Memories and the arcade games since 2000 and I still like this game and while the story is weird and breaks the SH lore, it's a good stand alone SH title with some really creepy monster designs that are very welcome over Downpour's mediocre creature designs. The combat is also fun, I almost completed it on Xbox without getting hit, failed when it came to the cult members and their cheap tactics though. This port is PLAYABLE but I think the best experience would be if they added it as a backwards compat title to Xbox One. (Downpour is and Homecoming has a large number of voters but alas, no Homecoming on xbox one yet.) If not, the PC version I think is still more superior than the console versions as it DOES look better. (Graphical glitches aside.) And it does look pretty great to be fair, I wasn't expecting a huge difference but there's a clear upgrade in quality over the console versions. I have this on 360 as well and it was great on there but it looks even better on PC, I can make out many more details and textures look way better on PC with full texture filtering at 1080p. It really makes the game pop, the completely dynamic shadow system is great as well, it's really a wonderful looking game that could hold up today if it wasn't for some of the graphical glitches.

Double Helix tends to have a bad rep when it comes to PC ports. MX vs ATV Reflex, also ported by DH while not confirmed on Wikipedia but it is in the game credits is a completely broken mess for a lot of people. It's a shame too because the ground work is there, for both games, MvA: Reflex and Silent Hill: HC. They just need a LITTLE more polish and they'd both be great ports. But for whatever reason, THQ(THQ/Nordic)/Rainbow Studios are stupid and so is Konami (No surprise there.) and to be quite frank, so is Double Helix for leaving the games broken in the first place.

I WISH I could give this a "meh" review for the quality of the port mixed with this actually being a good game but a recommended will have to do. Hopefully this helps spark some interest in getting the game fixed and/or maybe getting some of the games re-released on Steam as there are PC ports of quite a few SH games including SH2, SH3, SH4:TR and this one. There was even a planned PC release for Shattered Memories but instead they decided to focus on the PS2 and the Wii for whatever strange reason. Though it's worth noting the Wii version can be played pretty easily on PC via Dolphin and a PC compatible/modded IR bar and standard BT dongle or one of the combo units sold by Mayflash.

O que dizer de Silent Hill?
Que o amo demais por sua grandeza no quesito terror e complexidade? Pelo menos dá pra começar por aí.

[b]Silent Hill Homecoming é o jogo da franquia que merece seu destaque por algumas novidades, tanto na história (enredo), passando pela sua jogabilidade (elemento de destaque no jogo), até chegar na trilha sonora, que é muito boa por sinal[/b].

A trama é uma das mais simples porém é interessante e instiga o jogador a saber o que acontece no final do jogo, até os mínimos detalhes.

[b]O único contra é o horrível porte para PC que é porcamente otimizado, com alguns problemas bem irritantes e que realmente atrapalham a experiência do jogador de certa forma[/b].

No mais, recomendo.

Silent Hill: Homecoming possui um feeling muito bom, mas nada de extraordinário. Se você espera uma experiência revolucionária como os primeiros jogos da série, pode esquecer, Homecoming tenta inovar, mas sem ser muito ambicioso, reciclando várias idéias dos jogos anteriores. 

Melhor que Alone in the Dark, jogo que segue o mesmo estilo e lançado recentemente. Apresenta gráficos medianos, uma boa jogabilidade e uma excelente trilha sonora. Um bom jogo, mas por ter outra equipe de produção, não possui as grandes características que o fizeram famoso, como o clima e atmosfera de terror. Mas tem os seus momentos inspirados, irá agradar jogadores novatos e talvez desapontar um pouco os fãs mais antigos.

Probably the least compelling Silent Hill game, further dragged down by a crappy PC port. I really tried to like it and made many attempts to finish it over the years but every time I got really bored with it or just stumbled upon a game breaking bug that tipped me over the edge and made me stop playing.

What baffles me the most, though, is how horrible the sound quality is in this version. Sound was always one of the most important aspects of Silent Hill games so I just can't believe that they let this shit slip and released the game as it is.

Anyway, I guess there are some positive aspects to Homecoming and you could probably enjoy it for what it is if it wasn't associated with such a cult series but since that's not the case, there are just too many things that drag the experience down for me, personally. Weirdly placed musical queues, predictable story, zero buildup and lack of any scares or a proper mood, annoying combat system that forces you to mow down almost every enemy on your path... The list goes on.

I can only sum it up as a total lack of understanding for what made past SH titles unique and scary. Those games were clever, a great example of a psychological horror with deep mythos and engaging storylines that were always open to interpretation. Homecoming is just dumb. A saturday night horror movie version of Silent Hill with shoehorned references and recycled ideas.

The only thing that I actually enjoyed is the soundtrack by Akira Yamaoka, who even at his worst can produce something that's miles above the rest of this game in terms of quality.

Bueno primero que nada, yo jugue y me termine este juego en la 360. Me eh pasado todos los silent hill, asi que mi opinión importa:

Pesimo port, se congela y tiene errores que matan la experiencia de golpe.

-Este es un silent hill distinto, en los cotidianos eres una persona normal. Aqui eres un veterano de guerra, eres experto en armas y combate cuerpo a cuerpo, peleas contra los monstruos (eso parece que a la gente noss le entra en la cabeza).
-No hay enemigos originales, son fanservies... aunque igual dan cuco.
-La música es muy buena, el juego da miedo (aunque la version de steam la caga)
-Compralo si tienes un pc decente y tienes paciencia.
XOXO

column8: O jogo é muioto bom, as analises negativas em sí são basicamente por causa de problemas técnicos de hardware, como travamentos mesmo vc tendo o hardware mais poderoso do mundo, mas, apesar de irritarem as vezes, não é nada q estrague a magia do jogo, o jogo é muito bom.
Volvió a la tienda un juego de mi saga favorita!!!! aproveche y compre ya, no se arrepentira.... o bueno, cuando se asuste quizas se arrepienta un poquito

Muchos dicen que este es uno de los peores Silent Hill, quizás tengan razón xD pero a mi este videojuego me encantó la primera vez que lo jugué, quizás el cambio fue bastante notorio, distinta manera de luchar, lugares un poco más abiertos, quizás unos lugares un poco aburridos, pero su historia es bastante buena, la trama del ex soldado Alex Sheperd, volviendo a su ciudad natal y darse cuenta que todo lo que había antes ya no existe, todos los personajes ocultan algo acerca del pueblo Shepherd's Glen, incluso su propia familia, más la extraña desaparición de su hermano Joshua (que es el principal objetivo del juego, ir en busca de tu hermano perdido). El juego en sí es difícil en comparación de los antiguos Silent Hill, escasos botiquines y munición, la manera de enfrentar a los enemigos tienes que esquivarlos y saber en que momento atacar, si no pasarás unos malos ratos. si eres fan de la saga Silent Hill, Homecoming merece ser jugado, insisto este juego no es malo, solo que fue distinto a los demás.

6 / 10

column8: Très bon jeu ce petit Silent Hill, bon ok la config touches manette n'est pas au poil et j'ai rencontré quelques bugs mineurs, quel jeu n'en a pas? c'est la deuxième fois que je le fait avec 4 ans d'écarts je l'ai donc redécouvert et je dois dire que j'ai vraiment bien aimé. En hard, le jeu est un peu rude par moment mais rien d'insurmontable. Je n'ai pas capté toutes les mauvaises critiques car on est bien dans un Silent hill, l'ambiance général, l'histoire, la musique, les lumières, le sound design, même si son moteur graphique accuse le coup des années ce jeu est très sympa, c'est du tout bon, Dommage que les précédents épisodes ne soient pas disponibles sur le net à la vente, une bonne licence qui aurait méritée de perdurer.

Nearly every time I try to open up my browser and then go back into the game, it crashes. About 50% of the time if I die and hit 'continue' it crashes. Sometimes just opening it on steam will cause it to instantly crash. It freezes way too often, especially when trying to save or entering a new area, occasionally followed by crashing.
All of that I've been able to work around by just being patient as hell and saving a LOT. But I'm well past the halfway point of the game and all of a sudden, the guns don't even fucking work anymore. Seems like a great game
For the xbox360 or ps3. Do not waste $40 to be constantly fighting with this buggy shit.

Vamos lá, 7 anos depois refazendo a análise desse game. É bom? seria se o jogo não ficasse crashando. Não recomendo nem na promoção. Não adianta ter o game e ele crashar. Agora fica a minha crítica: falta os games bons da franquia silent hill disponíveis aqui na steam. Cadê o silent hill 1, 2 e 3 (até mesmo o 4)... Acho que ficou faltando... Pegaram um dos piores games da franquia (que é bonzinho mas não se compara com os outros) e foi oq disponibilizaram... Espero que no futuro haja algum remaster dos primeiros jogos e que fiquem disponíveis na steam... (Não custa sonhar)

I have 26 hours played on the PC version. I was able to fix some of the issues, however the two major ones I still run into every now and again are.
Loading screen freezes: Every loading screen I pray the game won't crash because I never save it.
Random crashes: At times the game will just decide to crash while doing something randomly, this can be minimized to only happen during random loading screens
I have to play this game on a 600x800 window with the absolute lowest graphics, I run a i76300 and a 1070 yet the game will be unreliable outside of these settings.
If you can play on an Xbox 360 or a PS3 do it, this is an awful port. The best version is the Xbox 360 one since it highly reduces the load time, but PS3 still isn't bad and was how I originally played.
Controller support can work and the actual graphics and button mapping can be changed with an installer that can be found in the forums to suit the controller being used.

If this game is about $5 on sale only buy if you have no other means of playing this game.

Oh. My. GOD. 
 Okay. I'm a HUGE Silent Hill fan. I've absolutely loved the series for....well, a long ass time. Since i was like 11. I've made more fanart and theroies and roleplays and whatnot more for this series than i ever have anything ever. But jesus christ, Konami, you really wanged it this time.
 Silent Hill Homecoming is a an absolute mistake. Here's why.
[list]
    [*]No fucking tutorial. Does not tell you what youre supposed to be hitting. Had to go to the controls menu everytime.
    [*]Terrible story. This is a SILENT HILL game! A series KNOWN for its compelling story! WHERE THE FUCK IS IT!
    [*]Monster design is....so shitty. I feel like the god awful people who made this game did not know anything about Silent hill before making this, instead they googled the game and used the most popular results from images. Fuck this.
    [*] I feel terrible Akira Yamaoka was dragged from the realm of Good Video Games to make amazing music for this shit show.
    [*] Took me 30 minutes to boot up this 2008 game with my gtx 1060. 
    [*] 30 FPS lock because we want our video game to look Bad and Ugly
    [*] HEY GUYS DO YOU REMEMBER ALEX IS A MILITARY MAN DO YOU REMEMBER ALEX IS A MILITARY MAN DO YOU R
    [*] Im begging you. Go play Silent Hill 2. Just fuck this game. Fuck this. Go watch Monster Factory. Do not buy. 
[/list]
 Konami, i want my five dollars and Silent Hills back.

column8:
After the sheer brilliance of Silent Hill 1 - 4, the series has slowly fizzled out. Homecoming is by no means a bad game but it's certainly nothing special. The story and enemies straight up do not work with the canonical story and the attempt at refining the combat only leads to more frustration, with clunky mechanics and controls. Not all is bad, however, and the exploration side of the game remains enjoyable despite the fact that the oppressive, terrifying atmosphere from the original games is mostly lacking. Overall, game's a solid 6/10... IF YOU'RE PLAYING THE CONSOLE VERSION.

The PC version is awful. I'm not exaggerating when I say this is one of the worst PC ports I have ever had the displeasure of enduring. The game stutters, crashes and freezes extremely frequently. Wanna save your game? Well you gotta wait for 10 - 20 seconds for the game to unfreeze itself and allow you to do so. I've had cutscenes bug out and play the audio with no visual, freezes whilst walking through the gameworld, and constant framerate drops during combat. 

If you are interested in trying Homecoming, despite it's flaws, PLEASE do yourself a favour and do not play the PC version.

column8:
Silent Hill Homecoming possui uma ótima história, acompanhada de um sistema de combate aprimorado, se comparado aos jogos mais antigos da saga; e entretem de maneira satisfatória. Porém, traz sérios problemas de otimização para a versão de PC, com crashs e travamentos constantes, que podem frustar a experiência do game; além disso, o melhor sistema de combate pode tirar um pouco do terror do game, pela maior facilidade de se derrotar os inimigos.

No todo, vale a experiência, desde que se tenha paciência quanto à má otimização do game.

column8:
I have 64bit windows 10, a GTX1080, some i7 cpu and 16GB of Ram and I get super long 5-10 minute loading times, insane fps drops, freezes afer and before cutsceeenes where I sometimes have to wait up to a minute before the cutscene starts or ends, the maps don't show up corectly, it shows up too far in the left corner of the screen and a portion of the right side of the maps are allways cut off and even if I zoom in (and it zooms in way too much) I still can't see the right part of the map that is cut off. 
This game is completely unplayable for me on PC. 
Horrible port. 
I do not reccomend buying this port. 
The game is decent enough on PS3 or Xbox360 but if you're looking for the better game, the Original Silent Hill games 1-4 are way better

column8:
Silent Hill é uma obra de arte em forma de jogo. A forma como a trama lhe envolve e toda a psicologia escondida por trás de cada aspecto do jogo e excelente muito phoda para ser mais exato este jogo e um ecstase. Alguns vem como apenas "mais um" mais e preciso ver como "o jogo" é preciso olhar com olhos de artista para enxergar a arte e toda a psicologia por trás de SIlent Hill, a trilha sonora composta pelo mestre Akira Yamaoka é pesada e tão profunda a ponto de rasgar sua alma e deixala em pedaços sendo algo proximo a perfeição.




[Obs" isto não e uma analise deste jogo em sí mais para toda a obra ou talvez não uma analise mais só uma carta lhe convidando para conhecer o meu lugar preferido, Silent Hill]

Silent Hill fanlarının 4'ten sonra en nefret ettiği oyundur kendisi. Ama bana sorarsanız bu kadar da yerden yere vurulmamalıydı bu oyun. (+) Yılına göre grafikleri oldukça güzel, dövüş mekanikleri pek Silent Hill tarzı değil ama alışması kolay, hikayesi idare eder, karakterler hep alışık tarzdan insanlar sokakta görebileceğiniz tiplerden, yaratıklar oldukça güzel tasarlanmış ve Pyramid Head'ın bu oyunda (Cameo olarak) gözükmesi şahsen beni mutlu etti. (-) Oyunda ara sıra kasmalar yaşanabiliyor (Canavar PC olsa bile), Josh'ın sesi biraz aptalca olmuş şahsen daha güzel bir seslendirici getirebilirlerdi, save alanları çok az oyun içinde manuel bir şekilde save sistemi olsaydı daha iyi olabilirdi (2 ve 3'teki gibi), Pyramid Head olayı güzel hoş olmuş ama onunla sadece alt tarafı göz göze gelmek yerine onunla savaşabilseydik belki bu oyun fanlar tarafından oldukça hypelanabilirdi ve Konami kendine gelip Team Silent'ı tekrar işe alabilirdi (Öyle bir şey asla gerçekleşmeyecek). Ve bu oyuna son olarak verdiğim puan: 7/10.

Non riesco a giocarci perchè ogni volta che vengono caricate le partite mi si riporta al desktop e quindi non posso salvarle. 

Mi vedrò costretto a richiedere il rimborso.

column8: Una buena historia sin dudas, los monstruos Uff únicos y que si te hacen tener miedo, pero en cuanto a jugabilidad en PC muy mal, pésima, si lo vas a jugar jugalo en consola, un juego muy mal optimizado, a pesar de tener la opción de jugarlo en mando esta lleno de errores, y eso que mi PC cumple con los requisitos y hasta sobran, aun asi los errores nunca faltaron, no lo recomiendo jugarlo en PC.

Yanlış bilmiyorsam Team Silent'ın yapmadığı ilk Silent Hill oyunu olarak ,çıktığı zaman dev eleştirilerle yerlerde süründürülmüş ,ağzı burnu kırılmış olmasına rağmen ben ilk oynadığımda gayet de beğenmiştim. Neden bitirmeden yarım bıraktığımı hatırlamıyorum ,muhtemelen bir yerde takılıp bırakmışımdır.

 Steam indiriminde karşıma çıktığında oyunu beğendiğimi hatırladım ve neden olmasın diye aldım.

 Kendisiyle ilk birkaç saatim çok nezih geçti. Kendi kendime "neden bu oyunu bitirmemişim ,niye beğenilmemişti ki bu" diye sorarken ve mutlu mesut yaratıklardan kaça kaça ilerlerken oyunumun ilk çöküşüne şahit oldum. Problem değil ne olacak önceki kayıttan oynarım diye düşünürken bir önceki kayıtın neredeyse oyunun başında olduğunu görünce bir anda neden oyunu yarım bıraktığımı tahmin etmeye başladım. Neyse olabilir diyip o sinirle yaratıklara elimdeki kurşunları sıka sıka bir daha geçtiğim yerleri kaçmaya kasmadan geçerim rahat rahat diye düşündüm ve gerçekten dediğim gibi de yaptım ta ki 2. boss savaşına kadar. Elimde doğru düzgün ne cephane ne de sağlık kalmadığı için saatlerce uğraşmama rağmen kendisini geçemedim. Ama ok yaydan çıkmıştı bir kere gerisin geri ilk kayıta dönüp boss a kadar kurşun ve sağlık harcamadan bir daha geldim ve kolayca geçtim. Eh iyi bari artık dikkatli gideyim de bitireyim" diye giderken bir puzzle de 1 saat takıldım ve tam çözecekken oyun gene çöktü. Ya sabır çekip oynamaya devam ettim bu sefer bir bulmaca da bug a denk geldim gene önceki kayıta döndüm gene bulmacaya geldim ve bugsız geçtim yaklaşık yarım saat sonra oyun gene kilitlendi...

 Başka bir şey yazmanın anlamsızlığına kapıldım bir anda ve 28 saat oynamış olduğum bu oyunu beni Silent Hill'in o tekinsiz ,gergin ,insanı içine kapatan atmosferine daha değişik bir boyutta soktuğu için tebrik ediyor ve ardıma bakmadan kaçıyorum.

 (İncelemenizin kaydı sırasında bir hata oluştu. Lütfen daha sonra tekrar deneyin.)

If that's supposed to be your first Silent Hill game then it's ok. Just be aware PC version isn't good, you'll encounter bugs, freezes and long loading screenes.
If you've played previous Silent Hill games you might be disappointed.
The story is okay, but it's not as surprising and emotional as previous games, especially 2 and 4.
Fighting system is okay, but enemies designs are very weak, except for bosses, they're incredible.
Ambients are weak comparing to previous games, especially 3, but some songs are really good, like "This Sacred Line" and "One more soul to the call".

column8:
Bugs and glitches I have encountered after just 3 hrs of gameplay: 

> In game freezes (for about 20-30 seconds)
> Locked camera bug (after NPC chat the camera remains fixed and won't "follow" the character and he goes off the screen - I am serious :) all you can do is reload a save game - in my case 40 minutes of a gameplay lost)
> Lagged cut-scenes (1-5 fps) - almost all of them
> Sound and voice out of any sync (especially in cut-scenes) - terribly out of sync resulting in voice played with a chopped mechanical echo and still being played after the cut scene is already finished
> Broken savegames (yes, the saves can be corrupted sometimes and you CAN'T load them !!!)
> Missing character sprite (invisible character) - even after restarting the game, same thing - reload previous save (if you were lucky to save on different slots)
> Random crashes - just like that, a crazy lottery of crashes for no particular reasons
> Various glitches - camera stuck, missing textures, missing characters, etc

You have been informed. 

Overall score: 2/10 - it's a terrible port, completely unplayable, so your money will be gone and no fun will be had. The only point or two is for the story which, was ok and the SH atmosphere was present. Apart from that it is an huge disastear and should be avoided at all cost (I mean all cost for this rubish should be avoided). 

Amen.

column8:
I do and don't recommend this game for multiple reasons:

-  It isn't worth the $40 that it costs.

 It is a very wonderful game on the PS3, but on PC, it just isn't right. It's like they tried to emulate it, but forgot to swat a little bit of bugs in the way.

- Sometimes, you can get stuck on a puzzle and some mouse clicks will not register. 

You can't skip cutscenes, and there is NO cloud back-up. I've had to start the game over many times because I either uninstalled it or got a new computer. It's absolutely ridiculous. On another note, it crashes if you try minimizing the window and going back to the game. 

My friends have also reported trying to stream it, but find it highly impossible to due to the crashing or the stream not being compatible with the game.

- The story line is good. Alex is a complex character dealing with the loss of his brother and his own guilt. The music is heartfelt and amazing, but the controls are iffy, and some things are still buggy.

What would be absolutely wonderful is if THEY COULD [b] PUT THE REST OF THE SILENT HILL SERIES [/b] up for purchase. I'd buy it in a heartbeat.

Ambiente horror fantastico, bello quasi quanto i suoi primi tre, e superiori al 4 e downpour.
Bella la grafica, bello il level design, bella la storia.

Sarebbe bello se facessero anche la versione Steam dei vecchi Silent Hill.

Es bueno en si el juego, tiene buena historia y controles. siempre he querido jugar cualquier juego de silent hill y tuve la oportunidad de jugar este y se ve que es buena la saga. hay alguno que otro falla en el juego pero eso no te quita la diversión

No mesmo estilo de resident evil, sillent hill é uma boa opção pra quem gosta de jogos do gênero.
senti um pouco de raiva principalmente na parte de matar a scarlet, (boneca do capeta) mais valeu apena insistir até consegir finalizar o jogo. 
Só encontrei esse jogo até agora disponivel. A steam deveria colocar a venda os outros capitulos da serie, mas
mesmo só tendo esse sillent, ainda sim Eu recomendo.

Tout d'abords, techniquement ce jeu est médiocre, de nombreux crash ou freez, alors que ma config est largement suffisante pour ce jeu.

Après niveau contenu, j'étais septiques quant à l'achat de ce jeu suite à toutes les critiques qu'il a pu subir. Mais finalement ça vallait le détour car l'histoire est plutôt bien ficelé (grandement inspiré de silent hill 2 faut dire), le level design fidèle à la série.
Graphiquement c'est pas une claque, mais ça reste correct pour son époque (même si Silent Hill 3 étais plus réussi sur cet aspect).
Niveau gameplay, ça reprend la recette classique des silent hill, avec en plus la possibilité d'esquiver les attaques, ce qui rend les combats beaucoup trop facile, et casse un peu le côté survival-horror sur la fin, car une fois les esquives maitrisés ce jeu devient d'une simplicité... Au début le jeu est bien corsé et c'est vraiment un plaisir, dommage que la difficulté disparaisse au fil des heures de jeu.

Pour résumé, c'est un bon survival-horror, mais pas un bon Silent Hill. Tout de même à faire car il existe des soit-disant survival-horro bien pire à tous les niveaux.

I love SIlent HIll series (special 1,2,3,4), but this is one of the worst game I've ever played.
- terrible combat system, 30fps lock, glitches, 
  random crashes, sound comes only from right speaker, 
  awful animations of characters. 3/10

EDIT: I finally finished this game and found out that is was pretty good, after almost 3 years, with fix on 60fps and with no crashes. The twist of the story is actually pretty interesting, better than I though (cuz this is one of the worst rated Silent Hill game so I didn't expect it would be good). The new fighting system is pretty unusuall in this series but you can get used it after few hours. I recommend this game BUT firstly get some patches (60fps, film grain etc.....). Final verdict 7,5/10

column8:
Its ok. Its not really silent hill. It has everything but the secret ingredient. The ingredient that made 1-4 (the titles created by original team silent) the best horror game series ever created. When I played this game on the PS3 I played straight through it. It was a decent game gameplay-wise  and the updated graphics were cool. 

I feel like I need to say that I have not been able to play this on PC. The visuals are somehow worse than the ps3 version and  the controls are terrible. crashes alot. I guess what I'm getting at is that this is a terrible port. No one is working to fix it. there will not be an update. ever. 

If you are interested in playing silent hill/ have never played silent hill, start with the first one for ps1 find an emulator or something (be legal about it *wink*) and turn off the lights. if that does not sate you play two, then three, then 'the room', then sign yourself up for counselling. 

After all of that, if you still need your silent hill (if your like me you know what i mean), then try this on the ps3 if possible. it will diapoint you but its kind of like seeing a close freind after a long time apart, you remember the good times and how they made you feel but you know that things can never be the same. things are different now so you shake hands and part ways. 

This game is a goodbye handshake to a dear friend.

ready for the cliche rating...

here we go...

nostalgia/10

wow that was bad. peace.

column8: Primeira vez jogando esse jogo no PC, porém a experiencia é praticamente a mesma dejogá-lo no Xbox 360... As vezes os comandos parecem não ser tão precisos e isso pode ser meio complicado em determinados inimigos, a munição escassa é outra dificuldade, mas esse fato é normal na franquia, porém em outros títulos, você quase não usava armas de fogo por causa do comando das armas brancas ser bem simplis e preciso, e nesse Silent Hill em questão, muitos inimigos precisam ser atingidos com tiros... Não o melhor Silent Hill ja lançado, mas ainda sim quem é fã da franquia pode aproveitar ele... Não entendo o motivo da Konami não ter colocado outros jogos da franquia a venda aqui na steam, como Silent Hill 4 - The Room(que inclusive tem uma versão de PC, só não esta disponibilizada aqui na loja), ou então Silent Hill Downpour(que não teve tantas avaliações positivas, mas eu particularmente ja zerei duas vezes e considero um dos melhores da série, e que por sinal, não está aqui também, porque se tivesse, eu compraria COM TODA CERTEZA) outra grande perda para os fãs da série, se trata do Silent Hill HD Collection ( que foi o 2 e o 3 com o grafico um pouco melhorado e foi lançado pra PS3 e X360, mas uma vez a Konami boicotou o PC). Konami ajuda nois aí né... Eu com TODA CERTEZA toparia comprar de novo Silent hill HD Collection, 4, Downpour, para o meu PC então Konami, da um help ai...
Can't believe this shit is on here but not the rest
column9: Can't believe this shit is on here but not the rest

column8: The home coming happens like right away.  It's pretty easy to get to your house from the truck.  Anyways, always call first or your parents will be in the middle of doing weird cult stuff when you come home.

column8:
OK so I can't recommened this. I just CAN'T!! Terrible port! You can read all the negative reviews and see for yourself. They aren't exagerating. I'll simply leave you some KEY POINT CONS that you either have to deal with or just not play the game. For myself, these cons are too awful for me to bare:

RESOLUTION ISSUES - If you play this game on a 4k TV the best you can do is 1920 x 1080 BUT!!! The map will still be a little off, like a portion of it will be cut. And items you pick up (when they pop up on the screen for you to examine) will be warped/distored. The reccomended setting is a resolution of 720 and you wont have these problems...but most of your screen won't be getting used LOL PC monitor should be tolerable.

GAME FREEZE DURING LOADING SCREENS - Solution - You better play this game on Windowed mode, yes, with borders.

SOUND ISSUES WITH EARPHONES- Sound effects only play through the right side of your earphones. Solution? There aint one because the only two solutions are is to A: use 1.5 surround...which I dont think exists anymore?? At least not for me. I have only 1.7 surround on Realteck and use Kraken Headphones. OR B: don't use headphones that use USB....And who the hell still uses headphone jacks unless youre super old school??

XBOX ONE CONTROLLER USER?? - Like to play your games from the comfort of your sofa on your big screen TV? You might have problems from the very start. It took me 2 HOURS to figure out why the controls were screwed to hell. Fix? In your steam controller settings use the preset controller setting called "GAMEPAD" its reccomended for the XBOX One Controller. That works perfectly, for me. OH there is also a MOD you should grab that enables XBOX button Icons to show during gameplay and option to turn off screen grain effect.

RANDOM STARTUP FAILS - Sometimes, no LOTS of times lol, the game won't start up upon first try. You'll get a black screen and it just sits there. Fix? Usually starting the game directly through Steam bares no startup fails.

CAMERA - Shepherd's head/torso is constantly in the way of what you're trying to look at or pick up. I keep getting this urge to like...want to push him out of the way somehow with the camera but it just aint happening LOL

Overall, after all the reasearch and fixes I had to go trhough, the major killers for me is the sound and camera issues. Its highly annoying and bothers me big time that effects are only playing in my right ear and there is nothing I can do about it. I refuse to play atmospheric games like this without headphones, I mean come on!

IF you can tolerate these problems, by all means, try to enjoy this game. But its a very bad port so run through the fixes soon as you can to see how you manage and don't wait too long to get your refund if nothing works. Forty bucks is INSANE!!! I got this on sale for 5 bucks, I think, so I'm not sore missing my refund. But I'm very dissapointed. I'm a Silent Hill fan!!!

column8: Silent Hill Homecoming es un buen juego, digno de la saga de Silent Hill. Adopta un nuevo modo de pelea, siendo estás más interactiva. En cuanto a esta adaptación en pc debo decir que tiene sus fallas, el juego se cae mucho, pero no lo vuelve injugable, lo que si es el fastidio de volver a jugar todo lo que no se guardó.
chi pensa che questo sia un bel gioco probabilmente non ha mai provato nessun altro silent hill

Jogo sofre com constantes micro travadas após determiando momento do jogo. Ja vi que isso afeta muitos jogadores e nunca foi solucionado. Estava gostando do jogo devido a ambientação horripilante caracteristica da série, mas por mais que eu seja fã da franquia, não dá pra recomendar um produto que não funciona... Nota 0.

Bueno...
Tengo que decir que no le doy negativo ni a la historia ni a los graficos, sino al port horrible, los primeros checkpoint no hubo problema, fue despues de salir de una casa cuando la pantalla se puso negra, por si fuera poco no pude hacer nada quedo en primer plano y tuve que apretar el boton de reinicio, compralo en una oferta! 6/10

Non sarà il miglior capitolo della serie ma paragonato agli "horror" attuali sta cento passi avanti. Sicuramente diverso e particolare rispetto ai predecessori, più movimentato e combattivo con un protagonista che può andare in giro a fare capriole manco fosse Tomb Raider, ma l'atmosfera di Silent Hill c'è tutta. Più fedele al film che ai precedenti titoli nel tentativo di arruffianarsi gli spettatori più giovani, con le stesse sexy infermiere come le abbiamo viste al cinema, ma nel complesso è altamente godibile come gioco. È un Silent Hill diverso e va preso così, un avventura assolutamente nuova, senza doverlo paragonare ai capolavori che hanno segnato la saga. Lo consiglio, sia ai fans che ai neofiti. 
Il gioco è sottotitolato in italiano, non vi ho trovato bug e se non riuscite a metterlo a schermo intero è sufficiente cambiare i settaggi nel file vars_pc.cfg che trovate nella cartella Engine.

I am only updating this review since we are getting more Silent Hill games on Steam now. If you want to play a Silent Hill game don't play this. This is just Loud Mountain AND the games functionality and quality are poor even before mentioning that the PC port is also dodgy.
I have extensively played every Silent Hill released officially and unofficially on PC and I must say this is REALLY bad.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1105559139
Before I get to the game let me get to it's price. The game is usually too expensive at 39.99 (Formerly 49.99 and before that 59.99) but for 5.99 I knew it was time to replay this infamous turd on PC. I knew I was getting myself into a bad game with a crap port that costs way too much but I guess I just had to see if it was as bad as I remembered. The game is capped at thirty (cant be fixed via mods), a little buggier than it is on consoles and is just as ugly whilst also being unable to be played at a higher resolution because it will cause more issues with the HUD and etc. The game crashes a lot (it froze on consoles too) and loves to load for ages. Often secretly crashing behind said loading screen even though the images continue to cycle. The story is awful too and it seems to take inspiration from the awful first movie in addition to ripping off the monsters from Silent Hill 2 and 3. The controls are also terrible whether you use a mouse and keyboard or a controller. Settings aside the actual models for people and props are just terrible, looking worse than any of the prior PS2 games. One of the worst games of 08 and possibly the worst Silent Hill game.

column8: I really like silent hill. and Ive enjoyed what this game is, I loved the early silent hill games and like the later ones more than alot of people have. But there are several porting issues with the pc version, because I know this was a console game before this was pc. Example: If you change your controls, it will work at first, and then after that you have to go into the games logs to change your controls. otherwise it will only let you use the default controls, which honestly arent the best. Then, to top it off, the targetting system gets really glitchy at times. You will be targetted onto something, but you cant switch your targets because you are supposed to use your mouse but it just doesnt read right, and then you end up stuck targetting something that you cant even hit and you cant get yourself to not target the wrong enemy and you just cant do anything and you jsut die. Dont get me wrong, I love silent hill, and this is not a bad game. Just the targetting mechanics could be alot better and the pc version probobly should have had a little bit more work, especially considering this game is not 40$ on console it is generally cheaper, where it works alot better, but is 40$ on steam, where it does not work so well. For this, I recomend this game, just not on computer, I actually recomend the console version, if it is possible for you to obtain. If not, this is still a very good game, just beware you will encounter some random crashes, and alot of random glitchyness. But if your someone who is capable of ignoring those, then you will like this game because it really is a very solid game at heart.

column8: Apenas es injusto el juego este de los cojones, la historia es muy lineal y se siente inmediatamente que no está hecho por el equipo original de Silent hill, Ojo, no cambies de pestaña si no quieres que se te crashee el juego, y que le den a Josh, vaya niño más molesto, pantallas de carga y de nivel muy lentas y a veces trabandose, juegalo sólo por ser un Silent hill, con lo tanto que me gusta la saga, que si no hubiera sido uno, lo hubiera dejado.
I spent more time trying to configure my controls than playing the game. Even then, the game froze on me after a minute or so. Sadly, I waited too long to ask for a refund.

column8: L'ho appena cominciato, sembra carino solo che ora devo configurare i tasti della tastiera col controller , peccato non abbia almeno un supporto per giocarci col controller...

Oh boy, I shouldn't have let my curiosity take the best of me because it lead me to play this trainwreck. Silent Hill: Homecoming tries to emulate the old Silent Hill formula of Silent Hills 1-3 but ends up falling down and breaking its nose. Let me cut straight to the chase. I am keeping this review [b]spoiler free[/b] so don't worry about those. Keep in mind also that this is a review from a person who has only played Silent Hills 1-3.

[h1]Story[/h1]

Much like previous installments in the Silent Hill franchise, it follows a protagonist who ends up in Silent Hill not much out of curiosity but due to being in pursuit of a person. It is practically the story trope of Silent Hill by this point but I am kind of glad that they didn't try anything worse instead of playing safe. However it doesn't feel so polished and the themes it tries to convey do not feel as remarkable or deep as the ones in the previous games. I never really felt that emotionally invested in what was going on and mostly felt quite indifferent. The choices you make during your journey do matter however and it is good that they are clearly presented to the player so that there is no possibility to accidentally make a choice that you didn't want to make. The endings that you get based on these choices however are really disappointing. They are way too short and feel extremely rushed. There are 5 different endings in total but I wouldn't count them adding any replayability for what they offer. You are just better off playing it once through and looking up the other endings on Youtube.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]

The gameplay is the Silent Hill standard: [i]explore area A enough until you find what you were looking for then proceed to area B etc. etc. Fight a boss, solve a few puzzles here and there.[/i] However I can't help but feel that this is much more linear than the previous installments. It seems as if you will mostly find everything that there is to get by just going forward. Don't get me wrong, I do know that Silent Hills are known as the broken door simulators but my gripe is the fact that some areas just feel too barren and linear. The puzzles are also too easy and there is no way to adjust the level of their difficulty so that's a bummer as well.

[h1]The Combat System...[/h1]

*sigh* It's like they held a meeting with Konami America, in which Konami said to Double Helix Games: "I bet you can't mess up the decent and unintrusive combat system which Team Silent developed." and Double Helix devs looked back at them with faces full of so much [i]challenge accepted[/i] that it wasn't even subtle. Jokes aside, I get that they were trying to make the combat feel more immersive with the dodge mechanics and all, but it is apparent that the whole system was not polished enough. It feels... broken and that's the best way to describe it. Sometimes dodging works, sometimes it doesn't. Sometimes our lovely protagonist dodges in the direction he feels like rather than what you are trying to input. Counterattacks are a mixed bag as well, sometimes they connect but sometimes they just don't. This was mostly apparrent during boss fights, in which Alex would blatantly miss hits even though the boss' model was in the weapon's reach. Credit where credit's due though, the mutilating animations you get after finishing an enemy off with a heavy attack feel quite satisfying. However, in trying to make the combat feel different, they have just developed another way into making it as monotone as it was in the previous games. I found that the easiest way to go about things is to do the same combo over and over again with a melee weapon until the enemy dies, or in some cases just mash heavy attack because for some reason that works too. What takes the cake though is that unlike in the previous games combat is quite mandatory way too often. I would mostly choose to avoid combat in the previous games, but in this one you just have to fight in some situations. What also does not help is the fact that most enemies take way too many hits so it makes the encounters feel even more tedious and even more of a pacebreaker. Free aiming with guns could have also potentially been a great inclusion but here it just feels as clumsy as the rolling and dodging mechanics.

[h1]Music and sound design[/h1]

The good old, and might I add, quite nostalgic sound effects are back. The ambiance however is not as strong as what the predecessors had to offer. Akira Yamaoka still knows how to make Silent Hill sound like Silent Hill but there was never really that feeling of anxiety and nervousness, which at least a one or two tracks caused in Silent Hills 1-3. It is not terrible by any means but not really that awe-inspiring either. Also the use of royalty free screams in a couple of points just made me mostly chuckle rather than feel fear.

[h1]A god-awful PC port[/h1]

Where do I even start with this... Let me just list all the issues that I encountered so you get the idea:

-Missing, mistimed or muffled sound during cutscenes.
-Freezing caused by loading and this can happen at any time. At the start of a cutscene, in the middle of a cutscene, during gameplay, before saving, you name it.
-Crashes when loading the next area which became much more frequent as the game progressed.
-Bugged maps when the resolution is above 1280x720. This means that you are not able to see the whole map but rather a portion of it which results in having to zoom and scroll through the map to see where you are going.
-Unable to see photos and drawings you have collected when the resolution is above 1280x720.
-Loop problems in the ambiance.
-Sound playing from only one speaker.

Also there are loads of unskippable cutscenes which is apparently in every version of the game but it is really annoying as well. [b]Getting a game over because you failed a quicktime event? Don't worry, here's the 5 minutes of cutscene that you watched one more time so that you can really feel the frustration if you fail the quicktime event yet again.[/b]

[h1]Questionable choices[/h1]

I had to make a section about this because some decisions which the developers made feel a bit off. For instance, I don't understand the big emphasis on combat in a horror game. We are not playing through a horror game to experience the same monotone encounters with enemies that take way too many hits. As I stated before, you are able to avoid most encounters in Silent Hills 1-3, but here it is downright forced because I guess they want to showcase how "cool" and "epic" the new mechanics are. But they are not. And I don't understand how neither the developers, nor playtesters saw this. Also the depiction of Silent Hill has taken way too much "bad influence" from the movies. Mostly prominent being the inclusion of Pyramid Head. I do understand that Pyramid Head is iconic for Silent Hill but why exactly is it even here. Silent Hill (at least in the previous games) changed in correlation to the visitor's psyche. That is why in Silent Hill 2 James Sunderland was chased by the Pyramid Head because he felt guilty and Pyramid Head was trying to exact punishment for that guilt. Here however Pyramid Head has no role whatsoever, he's just there to remind that "Hey! This is a Silent Hill game because I am here.". That's the exact same novelty purpose as what it had in the films but it just doesn't work here and feels way too bothersome. It is also a really lazy way to avoid designing something new. Something which the whole game suffers from: [b]Being too much of the same old, same old.[/b]

[h1]tl;dr[/h1]

Silent Hill Homecoming tries to be a good Silent Hill game but fails to deliver that ambition due to a lackluster story and an awful combat system. It does not try enough to be different and the areas it tried to make different feel either broken or uninspired. If you want to play this game, do not buy the PC version. It is riddled with bugs and instability.

As I stated before, you are able to avoid most encounters in Silent Hills 1-3, but here it is downright forced because I guess they want to showcase how "cool" and "epic" the new mechanics are. But they are not. And I don't understand how neither the developers, nor playtesters saw this. Also the depiction of Silent Hill has taken way too much "bad influence" from the movies. Mostly prominent being the inclusion of Pyramid Head. I do understand that Pyramid Head is iconic for Silent Hill but why exactly is it even here. Silent Hill (at least in the previous games) changed in correlation to the visitor's psyche. That is why in Silent Hill 2 James Sunderland was chased by the Pyramid Head because he felt guilty and Pyramid Head was trying to exact punishment for that guilt. Here however Pyramid Head has no role whatsoever, he's just there to remind that "Hey! This is a Silent Hill game because I am here.". That's the exact same novelty purpose as what it had in the films but it just doesn't work here and feels way too bothersome. It is also a really lazy way to avoid designing something new. Something which the whole game suffers from: [b]Being too much of the same old, same old.[/b]

[h1]tl;dr[/h1]

Silent Hill Homecoming tries to be a good Silent Hill game but fails to deliver that ambition due to a lackluster story and an awful combat system. It does not try enough to be different and the areas it tried to make different feel either broken or uninspired. If you want to play this game, do not buy the PC version. It is riddled with bugs and instability.

column8: Jogo bom, mas o port foi muito mal feito e o jogo fecha aleatoriamente! Isso é bem irritante!
Curti o game, até o momento, este silent hill esta sendo o mais legal que joguei, com os melhoreres controles.
I love this game
column9: I love this game

column8:
First and foremost, there is no doubt in my mind when I say this is one hell of a buggy port and isn't really worth playing unless you go ahead and patch it first (or emulate it) so...

Unknownproject's patch install tutorial - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CZu1E_jfZY4&t=855s

Side notes:
. Change audio configuration to 5.1 surround sound (this game hates 7.1)
. Do not alt tab, trust me.

I think this entry in the franchise gets an unnecessarily bad rep, and I can see why because in comparison to the masterpieces that were the OG quad-trilogy (SH4 is great fight me) it doesn't compare as it introduces significant changes in areas such as catering to horror movie tropes and cliche's, and just being kinda goofy at times taking away from the dark and disturbing psychological immersion a SH game typically should have to offer, and the story writing just having a lot of loose ends by the end of it. However, that does not mean this is a 'bad game' it's just not exactly a great 'Silent Hill' game if you get me. 

It has a lot going for it, I personally loved and felt like the overall atmosphere, soundtrack and monster designs were all features that the game nailed and did good justice to retain those core factors that make a good fun SH experience enjoyable on paper, oh and another big improvement is the combat no longer feeling clunky as hell and actually having some sort of fluidity for once (I actually cannot stand the combat in older silent hill games generally so this gets big points from me)

Where the game falls short is simply all the other core factors that are expected to be done just as well as the other things I mentioned earlier, such as the story, the attention to detail in the writing being lacklustre and flawed in a few areas, strange and sometimes pointless level design, just not being nearly as imaginative and interesting as any of the older titles, which is a big deal when you're talking about these games of course.

I wish this game got a directors cut release or something because I do like it, but it just feels a bit unfinished by the end of it.

All in all, I genuinely do not think Homecoming is as bad as everyone says it is, if you're an avid fan and if you can grab it on a sale, go for it.

Just do yourself a massive favour and actually try patch the game first before playing instead of these morons who pay full price for it and boot it up, then immediately leave a bad review and refund because it crashed or something.

column8:
A terrible console port of a pretty solid game.
The most terrifying thing about this game is that you never know when it's gonna crash back to desktop. To make the things worse, the save points are very frequent - sometimes you have to play 20-30 minutes between them. Performance wise it is also a nightmare - there is some places where fps drops to ~20 and I'm playing this on i3-2100, GeForce 660 GTX at 720p resolution. So yeah, this is a real technical mess.

Still, I recomend this game, because it's really fun to play. The combat system feels solid and the small amounts of health items and ammunition helps to build the feeling of tension. Not the best title from the series, but definitely better than Silent Hill 4 or Silent Hill Downpour.

column8:
Konami'nin, "Biz konsollarda iyiyiz!" dedikten sonra hayran kitlesinin bilgisayar için kıvranışını düşünüp "E tamam yaparız herhalde....." deyip, "Yok bu olmadı," demelerine rağmen yayınladıkları,bilgisayar sistemi üzerinde tükürükle yapıştırılmış gibi oturtulmaya çalışılmış,doğru düzgün sistemi çalışmayan oyun. Nurse'un göğüslerinin resmen jiggle-jiggle olması için jöle titreşimi animasyonu yapmışlar ama engine için hiç uğraşmamışlar. Böyle gömercesine başlattım ama aslında tek solukta bitirilesi oyundu.


Hikaye; Hikaye konusunda her zaman Silent Hill'a güvenin. Bu oyun da zaten hikaye konusunda güveninizi kırmayacak. (Ayrıca,hikaye konusunda kafanızda soru işareti kalan yerler varsa,internette Silent Hill adına açılmış fanwiki'ye bakmanızı tavsiye ediyorum. Her şeyin aklınıza gelmeyecek en küçük detayına kadar bilgisi var o wikide.)
Hikayeye muhtemelen herkes ortalama 4/5 verir. 

Karakterler; Silent Hill'da karakterler her zaman sizden bizden biri gibi olurlar. Karakterlerin sesleri için çok tanınan ve profesyonel sanatçılar çağırılmaz (SH-HD dışında), karakterlerin görünümleri çok zorlanmış olmaz,mesela mükemmel kalçalar veya çok kaslı bir vücut gibi. Bunda da öyleydi,karakterler dışarıya çıktığınızda görebileceğiniz insanlar gibilerdi ve bu oldukça güzel bir şey. 5/5

Seslendirme ve NPC hareketleri; Öne çıkarılmış karakter tepkileri var. Bunu deme sebebim Silent Hill'ın 4.oyununda Henry put gibi durup konuşurken,bir oyun sonrası,yani Homecoming'de, (minik bir SPOILER,ama 4f♥cksake oyunun ilk bölümü neredeyse) Alex ve *** konuşurken,***'ın "Onları kurtaramazsın." demesinden sonra Alex'in "ne diyon amk" bakışlarıyla "sonnuvabitch" demesi,normalde Silent Hill'daki karakterlerin bir yaratığa verdiği tepki (çoğunlukla "aaa canavar.") yerine daha insancıl bir tepki olması,dile getirilmeye değer bir detay bana kalırsa. Sonunda kontrol ettiğimiz karakter yaşıyor ve duyguları var! Bu yazdığımı abartı olarak buluyorsanız,Silent Hill 3 ve 4'te öldüğünüz zaman ana karakterin  attığı çığlıkları dinlemeniz yeterli bana kalırsa. (Alex'in ölümü bile güzel allahallah) Sesler de karakterlere yakışmış zaten,tek Josh'un sesini beğenmedim,seslendirilmesi için 12 yaşında edgy bir çocuk çağırmışlar sanırım.  5/5

Yaratıklar(?); Bu oyunda cameo karakter olarak Pyramid Head'in olması beni sevindirdi. (Tam olarak cameo değil,ama cameo deme sebebim genel olarak oyun içerisinde cutscene dışında etkileşime girmememiz) Zaten 5 (1 tane de bonus sahne) farklı sondan birinin Pyramid Head ile ilgili olması,hayran kitlesini çok hypelamış. Hemşire hakkında hiçbir şey söylemek istemiyorum,yüzünü kapattığınız an fıstık gibi bir şey oluyor. Yaratıkların tasarımları konusunda bir şey diyemem,baktığınızda "¯\_(ツ)_/¯ Silent Hill." diyorsunuz yani. 5/5 <-- sırf Nurse için.afiyet olsun.

Bosslar; Book of Memories'teki gibi,bu oyunda bosslar resmen her seviye sonunda vardı ve bana göre Silent Hill serisindeki en zor bosslardan ikisi de bu oyunda,Scarlet ve Amnion. Oyunu bitirmediyseniz ikisini de araştırmayın. Boss zorlukları kişiden kişiye değişir ama bosslar,özellikle bahsettiğim ikisi,çok uzun sürüyorlardı ve çok fazla birikim gerektiriyorlardı (med-kit,mermi gibi),tabi taktiğini öğrendiğinizde kolaylaşıyorlar. Daha ürkütücü olabilirlerdi ama eğlenceli ve gericiydiler. 4,7/5 

Bulmacalar; Silent Hill zaten bulmacalar ve gizli şeylerin ortaya çıkartılması üzerine işleyen bir korku oyunu temasına sahip,ama sizin için bulmacaları çözmek çok önemliyse ve oynadığınız oyunda karmaşık bulmacalar arıyorsanız,bu oyun size göre değil. Basit puzzlelar vardı. Ben puzzle değil aksiyon ve hikayesi üzerine oynuyorum Silent Hill'ı,bu yüzden benim için pek sorun olmadı. Tam tadındaydı bana kalırsa bulmacaları. 5/5

Kontroller; Alışılması biraz zor. Ben tam olarak kullanabilmeye başladığım zaman ikinci kısımdaydım. Konsolda daha kolay olduğunu söylüyorlar. Ben klavyede oynadım,başlarda işkence gibi gelmişti. Ama dediğim gibi,alışıyorsunuz.Bir karşılaşma sırasında dodgelamak biraz sinir bozucu olabiliyor,özellikle Amnionla savaşırken,ama onun dışında normal yani. 3,8/5
(Amnion oyunun son bossu. Araştırmayın,tekrar söylüyorum. Oyunun hikayesinin büyük bir çoğunluğunu size spoiller.) 

Kayıt sistemi; Oyundaki ilerleyiş, duvardaki bir Halo of the Sun,yani Order'ın simgesiyle kayıt ediliyor. Ama bir süre sonra resmen bir korku unsuru oluyor bu. İlginç bir şekilde bölümler arası kayıt noktasının mesafesi bazen o kadar fazla oluyor ki,oyuncu çok geriliyor. Optimizasyon kusurlu olduğu için iki kayıt noktası arası oyunu oynarken yaratıklardan ve olaylardan çok oyunun kapanmasından korkar hale geldim. Ve aynı sebepten dolayı oyunda kayıt noktası bulduktan sonra kaydetmek isteyip tıkladığınızda bile oyun kapanıyor bazen,orada da bir sıkıntı var yani. Onun dışında,5 tane kaydedebiliyorsunuz bir oyun boyunca. Pardon? Ne? Nasıl yani? Ya ben belli bir bölümü oynamak istiyorsam? Sanırım onlar için böyle bir dünya yok. Eğer belli bir bölümü oynamak istiyorsanız oyunu baştan oynamak zorunda kalıyorsunuz.(Ya da internetten bölümlerin save dosyalarını bulabilirsiniz,ben öyle yaptım bir ara.) Bütün oyunlarda ne güzel 50 slot vardı neredeyse,bunda neden 5 anlamadım. 3,6/5

Müzikler; Akira Yamaoka tam bir dahi ve ben onu çok seviyorum. 10/5 ,ama bir şeye de değinmem gerek,genel olarak SH soundtracklerine baktığımızda bununkiler biraz sönük kalmış. Ama gene de bnne. Ben sevdim. (Tamamen taraflı veriyorum bu notu jfgkjfg)

Atmosfer; Oyun size, çok da gidilebilecek bir alan olmasa da ve her yer Feral-Lurker kaynasa da,gene de free-roam şansı tanımış. Çok da yapabileceğiniz bir şey yok ama caddelerde sisin içerisinde tek başınıza dolaşırken o Silent Hill'ın kendi vibe'ını hissediyorsunuz. Bunu verebilmiş olmaları çok güzel. Bu oyunda da neredeyse hepsinde olduğu gibi yanınızda ve kalbinizde ( </3 ) kimsenin olmaması,sizi zaten olduğunuzdan daha da yalnız hissettiriyor. 5/5

PC üzerine oturmamış,en azından bende öyleydi. 
Genel olarak PC optimizasyonu; 3/5

Şimdi düşündüm de,Silent Hills'ın iptal edilmesi gerçekten de çok kötü. Silent Hill'a "yeni nesil" bir oyun şart. 
Hayran kitlesi oyunların ikinci oyundan sonra bozduğunu ortak karar kılmış ama ben buna katılmıyorum. Silent Hill serisini seven herkesin oynaması gereken bir oyun bana kalırsa. 

bb.
Exelente jogo, joguei ele no xbxo 360, e agora estou jogando pc, mt bom cara mt bom

Como jogo da franquia Silent Hill, mostra grande potencial, porém o jogo é repleto de bugs e travamentos, além de uma péssima implementação de suporte a controles, parece ser mais um "port safado". Lamentável.

column9: Fking Good .. Godd music Too !!

column8: I liked SH: Homecoming. It was a pleasant return to Silent Hill. There's a solid adventure here that took over 10 hours to beat. There's a fair amount of puzzle solving, which I appreciated. They weren't that difficult, but when I didn't know where I was going next, exploring the dangerous streets could be a gamble. The combat definitely took some time getting used to. There are a lot of tough fights. There's a decent variety to the enemies. Most of the combat is melee fighting. There is light use of firearms. At no point did I feel over-powering. The problem with a lot of survival horror games is that by the end the player has a stock pile of powerful weapons. Maintaining tension requires the player to feel vulnerable. Thankfully, SHH keeps this going by keeping the weapons moderately effective. Although, there is one enemy type relied upon too heavily during the end that was considerably easier to defeat than the standard monster. The story takes you through many of the locations in the small town its set in. It breaks up the town into sectioned off areas so it can be a challenge to quickly get where you want to. I liked how the world dissolves away, like in the films, when being transported to the Silent Hill version of reality. The image is filtered through a film-grain effect too, which looks good. The only problem with this part is that it's too sanitary. The place just looks like a rusty, over-sized boiler room instead of blood and corpses everywhere.  The game still looks pretty good for being so old now. There were some technical issues that were annoying, but shouldn't keep someone from playing the game. The load screens and saving each time were way longer than they should've been. Sometimes the game would just freeze for a solid 30 seconds too. This isn't the best port it could've been, but it's sufficient. Overall, I liked Silent Hill Homecoming a lot. It was a good adventure with all the good stuff that makes up a solid survival horror game.
